A tahw hǝn nǝboŋ namǝkot, nǝvanuan sagw gail dereh limaskel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi mai naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile p̃isi.
Nǝboŋ lǝb̃itah gat gamito, kot hǝn gamito, samtinau masuṽ hǝn nǝsa mǝtb̃ikele. Len namityal enan mitikel nǝsa aGot b̃ikel mai gamit ŋai. Husur savi gamit mǝtb̃isor be aNunun aGot dereh tisor.
Nǝvanuan dereh teriŋ aṽan len navǝlan alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn b̃imat, atata dereh timagen hǝn anatun hǝn b̃imat, ale alahutai dereh lile mǝhat, pair dan analito mai atǝmalito hǝn nakotan b̃eriŋ alatmisoan gail lǝb̃imat.
Nǝvanuan p̃isi dereh lemǝtahun bun gamito bathut nahǝsagw mǝttokade. Avil avan ideh b̃idaŋ len ginau, b̃ikad nǝ-daŋ-b̃uri-an van vǝbar nagilen, dereh aGot tilav kuvi hǝn b̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai.
“Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris natit aGot tomǝtahun buni, natit tosa masuṽ tomǝdas bun natit isob̃ur, nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris toil len naut sanor hǝn toil lan, (gaiug gotoṽuruŋ nategai geṽuruŋ lǝboii), beti alat len naut a Jutea, ligam tutut vi lan naṽehuh gail.
Nǝvanuan b̃iŋavŋav mǝhat len navurun naim, timasgam tutut dan naim san, satevi pan hǝn b̃eb̃is lohoim hǝn b̃ilav kuv natideh.
Ale nǝvanuan b̃itoh marireu, satetǝlmam vahim hǝn b̃ilav nahurabat ideh.
Len nǝboŋ enan nǝmauran dereh tidaŋ vǝsa habat hǝn apǝhaṽut ideh totian o tovǝhasus.
Be mitisor tuṽ ke natgalenan salevisi len nahǝbati naut susus.
Husur len nǝboŋ natgalen lǝb̃evisi, na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an maienan savisi len natub̃atan hǝn natit p̃isi aGot togole nǝboŋ toum hǝn navile a pan van vǝbar nǝboŋ ta damǝŋai, ale asike evisi tǝtas am boŋ ideh.
Asike aGot tagol na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an tam̃idol len nǝboŋ galenan, nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝtǝmat. Avil aGot dereh tigol na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an sinǝvanuan p̃isi tem̃idol m̃os alat, gai tolekis hǝn galito, lotovi esan.
Beti avan ideh b̃ikel mai gamit ke, ‘Mǝteris, aKristo bogai!’ o ‘Gai saga!’ samtedǝlomi.
Husur akristo gǝgǝras gail mai ahai kelkel ur gǝgǝras gail dereh levisi. Dereh ligol namerikel gail nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃ip̃aŋ habat lan. Lǝtalǝboi lǝtagǝras nǝvanuan gail aGot tolekis hǝn galito, dereh lǝtagole len namerikel galenan.
Be gamit, mǝtelǝlǝgau! Nukel natit p̃isi mai gamit tia a tahw hǝn lǝb̃evisi.”
AYesu isor am, ike, “Be nǝboŋ na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an hǝn nǝboŋ galenan b̃inoŋ, ‘dereh namityal timotmot, mai nahǝbati asike em̃ial;
dereh nam̃eso gail lerus vi pan dan nǝmav mai natit gail lotokad nǝdaŋan len nǝmav dereh lekurkur habat.’
Beti dereh mǝteris nagǝman siNatun Nǝvanuan len nǝmavukasw len nab̃iltidaŋan mai nǝyalyalan.
Dereh tesǝvat aŋel san gail vi lan naut p̃isi len navile a pan kavkav hǝn lǝb̃itariv b̃onb̃on hǝn alat aGot tolekis hǝn galito hǝn lotovi esan.
“Ivoi hǝn mǝtb̃elǝboi sǝhot natsua nǝhai nafik b̃eṽusani: Nǝboŋ nǝpashǝt nafik sǝmasmas am be todum̃oh, mǝtolǝboii ke nahǝbati naut pudpud egǝm pǝpadaŋ.
Imagenan, nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris nǝsarpohan hǝn natgalen p̃isi notosor husuri, dereh mǝtelǝboii ke, natǝlmaman siNatun Nǝvanuan satogǝmai, ehum gai toil bopita tia.
Nukel nakitinan mai gamito, naur egai asike lumat vǝbar natgalen p̃isi lǝb̃isarpoh.
Nǝmav mai navile a pan dereh arimasig, be nasoruan sagw gail asike lumasig boŋ ideh.
“Nǝmariboŋ enan o namityal enan, avan ideh salǝboii. Aŋel gail len nǝmav mai aNatun aGot, galit lǝsalǝboii, avil aGot aTata, gai sǝb̃on ŋai elǝboii.
Mǝtelǝlǝgau! Mǝtehulahul! Husur mǝtsalǝboi namityal enan ke ŋais.
Nagǝman siNatun Nǝvanuan imaiegai ke: Ikad avan sua toyar len nǝyaran sua. Nǝboŋ toriŋ naim san, eriŋ natit p̃isi mai naut san len navǝlan naslev san gail. Ikel mai galit ṽisusua nauman salit sǝb̃olito, ale ikel buni mai naslev tokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn nabopita ke timashulahul.
Imagenan, mǝtehulahul! Husur mǝtsalǝboi namityal amahean naim b̃etǝlmam, len naut mǝdau, len natub̃loh len mariug, namityal natoulum̃an bekǝkǝraiko o len nadudulan som̃ilan.
Amahean naim b̃evisi vǝha-sua ŋai, satisab̃ gotopatmari.
Nǝsa notokel mai nǝvanuan p̃isi, nukel mai gamit am ke, mǝtehulahul!”
Ale nǝPasova mai Nǝhanan hǝn nabǝta sǝkad nayis lan aripat hois. Ab̃iltihai tutumav mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo, ludas p̃isal hǝn nagǝgǝrasan, hǝn lǝb̃itah gat aYesu hǝn lǝb̃igol b̃imat.
Be luke, “Sadatigole len nǝhanan hǝn nǝPasova hǝn asike nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃eluṽoh beti b̃al taṽtaṽor mǝdas natit gail.”
Len nǝboŋ enan, aYesu itoh len naut a Petani len naim seSimon tokad naleprosi a m̃o. AYesu ipat hǝn nǝgarin tarhǝtev. Ale napǝhaṽut sua tolav nab̃otel lotoum hǝni hǝn nǝvat topǝhw, egǝm hǝn aYesu. Nab̃otel enan epul hǝn naoil pǝhpǝhas tosusau, nǝvat han totibau, ale alitenan ilap̃ul nabuŋon nab̃otel, eb̃iri len nǝkadun aYesu.
Nǝvanuan galevis ei nǝlolit ipaŋpaŋ ale lusor mai galit gabag ke, “Eb̃ir kǝmas hǝn nǝhai pǝhas egai sil nǝsa?
Tap̃ur hǝni, tǝlav nǝvat tasǝhor nap̃urp̃uran hǝn nasihau tosua ale taviol hǝni mai namǝsal gail.” Ale losivoh masuṽ len alitenan.
Ris aYesu toke, “Samtekǝmaien hǝni! Imabe mǝtomǝdasi! Gai igol natit tokab hǝn ginau.
Husur namǝsal gail lutoh akis mai gamito, ale nǝboŋ mǝtb̃elǝŋoni mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃igol navoian van hǝn galito. Be ginau, asike nutoh tabtab mai gamito.
Len nǝsa tokade ŋai, alitegai igol nǝsa tolǝboi b̃igole. Eb̃ir nǝhai pǝhas len nibegw hǝn b̃eutaut hǝni vir natǝtavunan sagw.
Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke, len naut p̃isi len navile a pan lotokel na-kel-uri-an tovoi lan, dereh linau gat nǝsa alitegai togole ale lihol husuri.”
Beti aJutas Iskariot, gai tosua len tosǝŋavur pisan toru, ivan hǝn nab̃iltihai tutumav gail hǝn b̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlalito.
Lohǝhaṽur hǝn lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, ale lukel gati ke dereh leviol hǝn nǝvat nasilva maii. Ŋa aJutas idas p̃isal hǝn b̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlalito.
Len nǝmariboŋ metǝkav hǝn Nǝhanan hǝn nabǝta sǝkad nayis lan, evi nǝboŋ hǝn natutumavan hǝn nasipsip NǝPasova. Ale ahai susur san gail lous aYesu ke, “Guke namtevi be hǝn namtb̃eutaut hǝn nǝhanan hǝn nǝPasova hǝn gǝb̃ihani?”
Ale aYesu esǝvat ahai susur san eru, ikel mai gǝlar ke, “Mǝrevi lan nab̃iltivile, dereh mǝrebubur mai naulum̃an topat nab̃iliwai, ale mǝrehusuri.
Naim ideh b̃eb̃is lan, mirikel mai amahean naim ke, ‘Ahai p̃usan eusi ke, “Narum̃ simetb̃os gai be? Nuke nihan Nǝhanian hǝn nǝPasova mai ahai susur sagw gail ei.”’
Atenan dereh teṽusan gamǝru hǝn nab̃iltirum̃ a mǝhat tokad natit p̃isi dattolǝŋoni. Mǝreutaut vir gidat ei.”
Alaruenan aruvan dani, arob̃is len nab̃iltivile, ale arusab̃ natit p̃isi hum aYesu tokel mai gǝlaru. Ale aroutaut hǝn nǝhanan hǝn nǝPasova.
Nǝboŋ namityal tomasur aYesu mai ahai susur lotovi 12 lubar naim enan.
Nǝboŋ lotopat tarhǝgarilito tǝban natev, luhan ale aYesu ike, “Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke, gamit sua tohan mai ginau dereh teriŋ ginau len navǝlan aenemi sagw gail.”
Lolǝŋon isa habat ale galit ṽisusua lousi ke, “Ginamit ta be lai? Savi ginau a?”
Ale ikel mai galit ke, “Evi gamit sua mǝttovi 12. Gamit sua tohan katǝp̃ol mai ginau len nasiloh.
ANatun Nǝvanuan dereh timasmat hum lototos husuri a m̃o, avil atenan b̃eriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan aenemi san gail, nǝmauran san tisa vǝsa tibatbat! Dereh tipanis habat. Tavoi am hǝn atenan ke anan asike tǝpasi!”
Nǝboŋ lotohanhan sal, aYesu ilav nabǝta, ale esipa lan, eb̃uri, beti ilavi mai galito, ike, “Lavi; nibegw bogai.”
Ale nǝboŋ tolav nab̃iliwai topul hǝn nǝwain, esipa hǝni. Ilavi mai galito, ale galit p̃isi lomun lan.
Ale ikel mai galit ke, “Nǝda hagw bogai, aGot tota gat na-kel-gati-an san lan mai nǝvanuan san gail. Nǝda eg hagw dereh tisel len nǝmatan sagw m̃os nǝvanuan tosob̃ur.
Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke, nǝwain egai, len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot, nǝwain eg dereh tiveveu, ale gagai van asike nomun nǝwain egai van vǝbar nǝboŋ nǝb̃emuni mai gamit ei.”
Beti lokǝkai hǝn nǝb̃e hǝn nalotuan ale lovivile, lovi lan Naṽehuh Oliv.
Ale aYesu ikel mai galit ke, “Gamit p̃isi dereh mitigam dan ginau. Husur natosian siGot ike, “‘Dereh niṽabun nǝvanuan nasipsip, ale nasipsip gail ligam ṽisusua.’
Be nǝboŋ nǝb̃imat ale aGot b̃igol nǝb̃ile mǝhat dan nǝmatan, dereh neil a m̃o hǝn gamito vi lan naut a Kalili.”
Be aPita ikel maii ke, “Naut kǝmas galit p̃isi lǝb̃igam dan gaiug, asike nigole!”
AYesu isor vari ke, “Nukel nakitinan mai gaiug ke, damǝŋai, len nalenmariug egai, a tahw hǝn natoulum̃an b̃ekǝkǝraiko vǝha-ru, dereh gikel vǝha-tor hǝni ke gǝsalǝboi ginau.”
Be aPita isor tǝvah ke, “Aoa! Sss! Naut kǝmas nǝb̃imat mai gaiug, asike nukel ke nǝsalǝboi gaiug!” Ale galit p̃isi am lokǝmaienan.
Len nǝyaran salito lubar naut nalilioliv, nahǝsan naut enan Ketsemane. Ale aYesu ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Mǝtebǝtah gegai, nia sor tuṽ.”
Esǝhar aPita, aJemes mai aJon van ale nǝnauan san etub̃at tuhatuh habat, nǝlon isa vǝsa.
Ale ikel mai galit ke, “Nulolosa masuṽ! Ehum nalolosaan sagw etǝgau gat nǝlogw van numat! Mititoh gegai, mitilele!”
Nǝboŋ toyar van kǝkereh am, ipat len tan ale isor tuṽ. AYesu eus nap̃isal ideh hǝn b̃imakuv dan namityal hǝn na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an.
Ike, “Appa, Ita, golǝboi gǝb̃igol natit p̃isi. Lav kuv nab̃iliwai hǝn na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an egai dan ginau. Wake sagigol nǝsa notolǝŋoni, gigol nǝsa gaiug gotolǝŋoni ŋai.”
Beti etǝlmam van hǝn ahai susur lototor, isab̃ lotopatmari. Ale ikel mai aPita ke, “Simon, gupatmari a? Gǝsalǝboi gǝb̃ilele len nǝhaua tosua ŋa?
Mǝtehulahul. Mitisor tuṽ hǝn asike mǝtb̃iteh len nǝsaan totaltal ke mǝtehusuri. Naut kǝmas nǝlomito elǝŋon b̃igol nǝsa tonor, nibemit sǝdaŋ, edǝdasi.”
Ale ivan vasor tuṽ tǝtas am. Na-sor-tuṽ-an san ep̃itoṽ hǝn tomadhakele.
Nǝboŋ tosor tuṽ tonoŋ etǝlmam tǝtas, isab̃ lotopatmari husur namǝtalit inoṽ masuṽ. Evǝŋon galito, be lǝsalǝboi nǝsa lǝb̃ikel maii.
Len natǝlmaman na-vǝha-tor-an siYesu, ikel mai galit ke, “Mǝtupat, mǝtuŋavŋav sal a? Nǝpatan tinoŋ! Namityal egǝm tia. Mǝteris, avan sua dereh teriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan nǝvanuan nǝsaan gail ta bogai.
Mitile mǝhat, dativan. Mǝteris, atenan b̃eriŋ ginau len navǝlalito satogǝm pǝpadaŋ.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tosorsor sal, aJutas tosua len tosǝŋavur pisan toru, egǝmai. Itah mai naluṽoh lototǝgau nab̃u nǝb̃alan mai nǝbatw gail. Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn naJu gail losǝvat naluṽoh enan.
Ale aJutas isor utaut hǝn naṽusanian sua mai galit a m̃o, ike, “Nǝboŋ nǝb̃esum̃ nǝtarhon atenan, gai bolai. Tah gati. Sǝhari van, satigam yav.”
Vǝha-sua ŋai aJutas ivan hǝn aYesu, ike, “Ivoi Hai p̃usan!” ale esum̃ nǝtarhon.
Ale logǝm hǝn aYesu, lutah gati.
Be len galit lototah mai aYesu, sua eliv kuv nab̃u nǝb̃alan san, eb̃il hǝni van hǝn naslev seb̃iltihai tutumav, ita kotov nǝdariŋan.
Beti aYesu ikel mai galit ke, “Imabe mǝtogǝm, lav nab̃u nǝb̃alan mai nǝbatw gail gǝmai, hǝn mǝtb̃itah gat ginau hum notovi vanuan nǝb̃alan tob̃al mai alat lotoil a m̃o?
Len nǝmariboŋ p̃isi nutah mai gamito, nop̃usan len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot. Imabe mǝtsǝtah gat ginau ei? Avil timasmagenan hǝn natosian siGot b̃isarpoh.”
Beti ahai susur p̃isi san loriŋi, lugam dani.
Ikad nǝmantuhmar sua tohusur aYesu ei, toruŋ gol gai tia hǝn nǝkaliko nalinen. Nǝboŋ lototah gati,
igam b̃ur malmal dan galito, riŋ nǝkaliko san ipat mai galito.
Beti naluṽoh losǝhar aYesu van hǝn naim seb̃iltihai tutumav. Ale ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn naJu gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo lub̃onb̃on ei.
Be aPita ehusuri, iyar a tut dani vǝbar tob̃is len naholǝvat todar vis naim seb̃iltihai tutumav. Ale ebǝtah ei, etitileh mai alat lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn naim siGot.
Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai nǝSanhitrin p̃isi ludas kel-koti-an ideh toke aYesu tob̃ur kotov nalo hǝn b̃imat sile. Be lǝsǝsab̃ ideh.
Nǝvanuan isob̃ur lolibliboŋ husur aYesu be nǝSanhitrin isab̃i ke nakelean salit gail lǝsap̃itoṽ.
Galevis loil vi mǝhat, lukel nalibliboŋan egai husur aYesu,
luke, “Namtosǝsǝloŋ hǝn ategai toke, ‘Ginau dereh nilap̃up̃ul naim siGot egai nǝvanuan lotoum hǝni, ale dereh neum tǝtas hǝn tile len nǝmariboŋ titor, nǝvanuan lotodǝdas lǝb̃eum hǝni.’”
Be nakelean salit gail am lǝsap̃itoṽ.
Beti ab̃iltihai tutumav ile mǝhat rivuh len galito. Ikel mai aYesu ke, “Imabe gǝsakel natideh hǝn gǝb̃etǝtas gole gaiug? Nǝsa lotokele ekitin a?”
Be aYesu sasor, sasor vari. Ale ab̃iltihai tutumav eusi ke, “Govi aKristo a? Govi aNatun Atenan tonor hǝn nǝ-sal-suhi-an a?”
AYesu ike “Ginau bogai. Ale dereh mǝteris aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃ebǝtah len navǝlan nǝmatu siGot tovi aB̃iltidaŋan. Dereh mǝteris b̃egǝmai len nǝmavukasw hǝn nǝmav.”
Beti ab̃iltihai tutumav, nǝhon emǝkanun taṽtaṽor, itar nahurabat san hǝn b̃eṽusan tomǝtahun nasoruan enan siYesu. Ike, “Imabe datolǝŋon nǝvanuan ideh am hǝn b̃ikel kot nǝsaan sitegai?
Gamit mǝtosǝsǝloŋ hǝn tosor mǝdas aGot! Gamit mǝtunau mab hǝni?” Galit p̃isi lusab̃ sǝhoti ke tonor hǝn b̃imasmat.
Beti galevis lotub̃at ṽulai aYesu, lukabut gol nǝhon, lotuhi, lukel maii ke, “Gepǝhav utaut!” Ale alat lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn naim siGot luṽosi, lotuhi.
Len namityal enan, aPita itoh a pan sal len naholǝvat todar vis naim. Ale natǝbarehreh sua tovi slev seb̃iltihai tutumav iyar tukot.
Nǝboŋ toris aPita totitileh, ekǝta bunus vahvahuri ale ike, “Gaiug gutah mai aYesu ta Nasaret.”
Be aPita ike sakitin. Ike, “Nǝsalǝboi nǝsa gotosor husuri! Nǝsalǝboi sǝhoti.” Ale iyar van hǝn nametlǝkau. Beti natoulum̃an ekǝkǝraiko.
Nǝboŋ alitenan tovi slev torisi ei, etub̃at kel tasi am mai alat lotoil ei ke, “Ategai evi galit sua.”
Be aPita ikel tǝtas hǝni ke sakitin. Sǝdareh alat lotoil pǝpadaŋ lukel mai a Pita ke, “Ekitin, gaiug govi galit sua, husur gaiug am govi auleKalili.”
APita ikel tasi ke sakitin, ita gati ke nǝsa tikele evi nakitinan. Ike, “Len nahǝsan aGot nokitin, ginau nǝsalǝboi atenan mǝttosor husuri. Asike nǝb̃ekitin, aGot tipansem ginau!”
Vǝha-sua ŋai natoulum̃an ekǝkǝraiko tǝtas am. Beti aPita inau tǝlmam hǝn nǝsa aYesu tokel maii ke, “A tahw hǝn natoulum̃an b̃ekǝkǝraiko vǝha-ru, dereh gikel vǝha-tor hǝni ke gǝsalǝboi ginau.” Ale nǝlon aPita isa, itaŋ.
Pelan han, dudulan som̃ilan, ab̃iltihai tutumav gail, alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn naJu gail, mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo; nǝSanhitrin kavkav lub̃onb̃on hǝn lǝb̃isor utaut. Lubaŋis gat aYesu, losǝhari van hǝn aPilate, loriŋi len navǝlan.
APilate eus aYesu ke, “Gaiug govi Kiŋ seJu gail a?” AYesu isor vari ke, “Gai bol gotokele.”
Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail loil hirhir ke aYesu togol natit isob̃ur tosa.
Ŋa aPilate eus tasi ke, “Asike gusor var natgaleg a? Imabe? Gǝsasǝsǝloŋ hǝn natit tosob̃ur lotosor tas gaiug hǝni a?”
Be aYesu sakel na-sor-vari-an ideh am, gol aPilate ip̃aŋ lan.
Len Nǝhanan nǝPasova p̃isi, nǝgavna ikad naṽide sua. Idam̃ hǝn avan totoh len naim bǝbaŋis b̃evivile husur nalǝŋonian sinaluṽoh.
Ikad naulum̃an sua, nahǝsan aParappas lotobaŋisi len naim bǝbaŋis mai alat lotob̃al mai nǝgavmen, lotogol nǝvanuan lotomat len nǝb̃alan mai alat aRom.
Naluṽoh logǝm hǝn aPilate, lousi hǝn b̃ehusur naṽide san m̃os galito, hǝn b̃esua b̃evivile.
Be aPilate eus galit ke, “Mǝtuke nigol aKiŋ seJu tevivile van hǝn gamit a?”
Ekǝmaienan bathut elǝboii ke ab̃iltihai tutumav gail lotoriŋ aYesu len navǝlan husur lutab̃ulol bulosi.
Be ab̃iltihai tutumav lusorsor mai naluṽoh hǝn lǝb̃ehusur nǝnauan salito, us aPilate hǝn b̃igol aParappas b̃evivile, savi aYesu.
Be Pilate isor var galit tǝtas ke, “B̃imagenan, mǝtolǝŋon ke nigol nǝsa hǝn ategai mǝttokisi hǝn aKiŋ seJu?”
Luvari, lukai ke, “Timat len nǝhai balbal!”
APilate eus naluṽoh ke, “Sil nǝsa? Igol nǝsa tosa?” Be lukai habat van am ke, “Timat len nǝhai balbal!”
Ŋa aPilate toke tetǝŋov nǝlon naluṽoh tevi pan, eriŋ aParappas evivile van hǝn galito. Ike nasoltia san gail lobilas habat hǝn aYesu, beti eriŋi len navǝlan nasoltia gail hǝn lǝb̃ip̃os gati len nǝhai balbal.
Beti nasoltia gail losǝhar aYesu vab̃is len naholǝvat todar vis naim sisoltia gail, ale lokis p̃is navǝshǝsoltia lub̃onb̃on.
Lukol nahurabat toboŋboŋ len aYesu, ale lovisvis hǝn nǝhau tokad nasunite tohum nab̃ulgǝgau, ale loriŋi len nǝkadun aYesu hum nǝkraun sekiŋ.
Lotub̃at kai van hǝni ke, “Namtusal suh gaiug, Kiŋ seJu gail!”
Luṽasi, ṽasi, ṽas nǝkadun hǝn nǝhai, ale loṽulaii, ale lotǝŋedur bathurien.
Nǝboŋ lotosor vilesi tonoŋ, lukol nahurabat toboŋboŋ dani, lukol nahurabat san tǝlmam lan. Beti losǝhari vivile hǝn lǝb̃ip̃os gati len nǝhai balbal.
Ikad auleSairin sua, nahǝsan aSimon, atǝman alarmiṽan, aAleksada mai aRufus. Atenan egǝm len nǝmarireu lotodar vis nab̃iltivile, imadhaṽot. Ale nasoltia lukele hǝn atenan ke tipat nǝhai balbal siYesu, ale ipati.
Ale losǝhar aYesu van vǝbar naut a Kolkota, namilen nǝhes enan Naut hǝn Nabǝlashukadhutǝmat.
Lulav nǝwain lotobul hǝn namǝr lan maii, be aYesu emǝtahuni.
Beti nasoltia lup̃os gati len nǝhai balbal. Lopǝpehun nahurabat san, bar hǝn nǝvat hǝn lǝb̃isab̃ ase b̃ilav nahurabat ṽisusua.
Namityal emǝlapat dudulan nǝboŋ lotogol totahǝtah len nǝhai balbal.
Lutos gat nǝsa lotokot hǝn aYesu sile, ale loriŋ na-kel-uri-an enan len nǝhai balbal a mǝhat hǝn nǝkadun, toke, “AKiŋ seJu gail.”
Nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah artogolgol nasǝnahan len nǝvanuan, lup̃os gat gǝlaru arutahǝtah mai aYesu. Sual itahǝtah len nǝhai balbal len nǝmatu siYesu, togon len nǝmair san.
<range>
Nǝvanuan gail lotoṽot, lohǝlas aYesu, sor mǝdas nahǝsan. Loŋit nǝholit van hǝni, luke, “Gaiug golǝboi gǝb̃igol naim siGot b̃imasirsir, ale um tǝlmam hǝni len nǝmariboŋ b̃itor a?
B̃imagenan, gilav kuv gaiug gabag dan nǝmatan! Gimariŋ dan nǝhai balbal!”
Len naṽide tomaienan, ab̃iltihai tutumav gail, alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo lusor viles aYesu mai galit gabag, luke, “Gai ilav kuv nǝvanuan tile gail be edǝdas b̃ilav kuv gai!
Ategai tonau ke gai aKristo, aKiŋ seIsrael, timariŋ dan nǝhai balbal ale dereh datedǝlomi ke gai tovi kiŋ.” Alaruenan artotahǝtah tǝban aYesu, gǝlar am arokǝmaienan, arusor isa hǝni.
Len natub̃lial, nǝmargobut ikabut gol p̃is naut kavkav van vǝbar namityal totor ut mǝdau.
Ale len namityal totor enan, aYesu ikai habat ke, “Eloi, eloi, lema sapahtani!” namilen ke, “Got sagw, Got sagw, goriŋ gab̃ulan ginau sil nǝsa?”
Nǝboŋ nǝvanuan galevis lotoil pǝpadaŋ ei lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, luke, “Sǝsǝloŋ, ekis aElijah.”
Avan sua igam, ilav nasponts, igol epul hǝn nǝwain tokon, ale esii len nǝhai, esuhuni van hǝn aYesu hǝn b̃emuni. Ike, “Riŋi. Datebunusi bai ke, aElijah dereh tegǝm lav kuvi vi pan o teb̃uer.”
Beti aYesu ikai habat, emǝsol, imat.
Len namityal enan ŋai, nǝkaliko mǝtortor totahǝtah len naim siGot, tub̃at a mǝhat, emǝtar vǝbar naut a pan, igol nahudhut eru.
Nǝboŋ nasenturion toil pǝpadaŋ len nǝhon aYesu toris ke tomat maienan, ike, “Kitin, ategai evi aNatun aGot!”
Len naut enan ikad napǝhaṽut galevis lotoil a tut dan nǝhai balbal, lotokǝta ris nǝsa tovisi. Galit galevis lovi aMeri ta Maktala; togon aMeri anan atuhJemes mai aJoses; togon aSalome.
Len naut a Kalili alatenan lohushusur aYesu, lokǝtkǝta tǝban. Napǝhaṽut tosob̃ur am lototah mai aYesu len nǝyaran san vi Jerusalem, loil ei.
Nǝmariboŋ enan evi Nǝboŋ hǝn Nautautan, ale len namityal enan nǝSappat pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃etub̃at. Nǝboŋ namityal pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃imasur ut mǝdau,
aJosef ta Arimatea egǝmai. AJosef evi b̃iltivanuan sua len nǝSanhitrin, itoh vir natohan pipihabǝlan aGot, ale len na-il-b̃uri-an, ivan hǝn aPilate, eus niben aYesu.
APilate esǝhoṽut hǝn aYesu tomat tia, ŋa ekis nasenturion gǝmai, eusi ke, “AYesu imat tia ŋa?”
Nasenturion ike tomat tia, ale aPilate idam̃ hǝn niben aYesu mai aJosef.
Ŋa aJosef ipat kuv aYesu vi pan, ilav nǝkaliko nalinen, eruŋ gol niben len nǝkaliko enan, ale eriŋ aYesu len nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan lotota p̃up̃uli tia. Beti erib hǝn nǝvat hǝn b̃ipat gol nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan.
Ale aMeri ta Maktala mai aMeri anan aJoses arokǝta ris naut lotoriŋ niben aYesu topat lan.
Nǝboŋ nǝSappat tonoŋ, aMeri ta Maktala, aMeri anan aJemes, mai aSalome loṽur nǝhai pǝhas hǝn lǝb̃evǝhas niben aYesu.
Len nǝmariboŋ metǝkav hǝn nawik, dudulan som̃ilan, lovi lan nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan,
ale lous galit gabag ke, “Gidat datsǝnav. Ase terib hǝn nab̃iltivat enan dan nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan?”
Be nǝboŋ lotokǝta van hǝn nab̃iltivat enan, loris ke, naut kǝmas tovi b̃iltivat, sǝpat gol nab̃ur am, ehum avan sua torib hǝni tia.
Ale nǝboŋ lotob̃is len nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan, loris nǝmantuhmar sua tobǝtah len navǝlan nǝmatu, tosun nahurabat topǝhapǝhw. Lumaŋmaŋ habat lan, lomǝtahw.
Ike, “Samtemǝtahw! Mǝtudoŋ aYesu ta Nasaret tomat len nǝhai balbal. Ile mǝhat tia! Satoh gegai. Mǝtekǝta ris naut lotoriŋi topat lan.
Mitivan. Mitikel mai ahai susur san gail mai aPita ke, ‘Eil a m̃o hǝn gamito vi Kalili. Dereh mǝterisi ei, hum tokel mai gamit tia.’”
Latpǝhaṽut galenan lotovivile, lupab, lodǝdarŋab̃u, lugam dan nab̃ur. Lǝsakel mai avan ideh husur lotomǝtahw.
Nǝboŋ aYesu tole mǝhat dudulan som̃ilan len nǝmariboŋ metǝkav hǝn nawik, nǝvanuan tovisi hǝni metǝkav, aMeri ta Maktala. Evi aMeri enan, aYesu tohut natǝmat tomǝlevru dani.
AMeri ivan, ikel uri mai alat lototah mai aYesu, lotololosa, lototaŋ.
Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn aYesu tomaur tǝlmam, ale aMeri toke torisi, lǝsadǝlomi.
A tahw, aYesu evisi hǝn ahai susur eru san artoyar husur nap̃isal dan naut a Jerusalem. Be len nǝboŋ enan, ehum niben totile.
Alaruenan arotǝlmam vi Jerusalem, lukel ur nǝsa tovisi mai ahai susur lotosuh ei. Be lǝsadǝlom nǝsa gǝlar am artokele.
A tahw tǝtas am, nǝboŋ ahai susur tosǝŋavur pisan tosua lotohan, aYesu evisi hǝn galito. Isor len galito husur lotopar dǝlomian mai nǝkadulit tohaihai husur lǝsadǝlom na-kel-uri-an silat lotorisi.
Beti ikel mai galito ke, “Mǝtevi lan naut p̃isi len navile a pan, mitikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi mai nǝvanuan gail p̃isi.
Nǝvanuan todǝlom na-kel-uri-an tovoi, tobaptais, aGot dereh tilav kuvi dan nǝsaan san. Avil nǝvanuan sadǝlomi, aGot dereh tisab̃ sǝhoti ke timaspanis.
Ale namerikel galegai dereh levisi mai alat lotokad nadǝlomian: len nahǝsagw dereh lehut natǝmat gail, lisor len nasoruan veveu gail.
Dereh lipat nǝm̃at gail, tǝgau hǝn navǝlalito; lǝb̃emun nabehi hǝn nǝmatan, asike emǝdas galito. Dereh leriŋ navǝlalito len alat lotomǝsah, ale limaur.”
Nǝboŋ Nasub̃ aYesu tokǝmaienan mai galit tonoŋ, aGot ilavi vi mǝhat vi lan nǝmav, ale ebǝtah tarhǝt len nǝmatu siGot.
Beti ahai susur gail luvan, lukel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi len naut p̃isi. AGot eum mai galito, len namerikel gail igol imasil ke nasoruan san ekitin.
Ikad nǝvanuan isob̃ur tokel ur natit gail tosarpoh len gidato, hum ahai kelkel ur gail lotokele. Lutos nǝsa nǝvanuan gail lotorisi mai lotokel uri mai ginamito.
Hum ke alat len natub̃atan lotoris natit p̃isi tovisi, ale lotogǝm vi vanuan na-vi-tarhǝte-an gail hǝn nasoruan, imaienan lukel uri mai ginamito.
Ginau am nunau ke, ivoi ke, notokǝta kitev natit p̃isi len natub̃atan, tuani, ale tos husuri van hǝn gaiug Nasub̃ Teofilus,
hǝn gǝb̃elǝboi nakitinan husur aYesu, mai nǝsa lotoṽusani hǝn gaiug. Nǝb̃ol egai imagegai:
Nǝboŋ aHerot tovi kiŋ len naut a Jutea, ikad ahai tutumav sua nahǝsan aSekariah. Ikad nahǝmar sua nahǝsan aApijah, aSekariah tovi galit sua. Bareab san, nahǝsan aElisapet, gai am esua len nǝpasusan siAron.
Gǝlaru aruvoi, arunor len nǝhon Nasub̃ aGot bathut arugol husur masuṽ hǝn natit p̃isi tokele.
Be anatularu eb̃uer husur aElisapet ebutoh, mai arovi haṽut tia.
Boŋ sua nahǝmar siSekariah loum siGot. ASekariah eum len nǝhon aGot hum ahai tutumav.
Hum naṽide sihai tutumav gail, lubar hǝn nǝvat hǝn lotosab̃ aSekariah hǝn b̃epǝŋas nǝhai pǝhas len naim siNasub̃ aGot. Boŋ sua aSekariah eb̃is lan,
len nǝboŋ enan nab̃iltiluṽoh lusor tuṽ vivile.
Ale aŋel siNasub̃ evisi hǝni, eil ben nǝmel tutumavan tarhǝt nǝmatu.
Nǝboŋ aSekariah toris aŋel enan, emǝtahw, ninen epil.
Ris aŋel toke, “Sagemǝtahw aSekariah, husur aGot esǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-sor-tuṽ-an sam̃. Ale asoam̃ aElisapet dereh tipas anatum̃ ulum̃an. Geriŋ nǝhes Jon lan.
Ale gaiug gehǝhaṽur habat mai nǝlom̃ tivoi masuṽ hǝni. Nǝvanuan isob̃ur dereh lehǝhaṽur hǝn nǝboŋ b̃evisi,
bathut tiyalyal len nǝhon aGot balai. Asike emun nǝwain mai nǝwai todaŋ, ale tepul hǝn aNunun aGot nǝboŋ topat sal len nabǝhaṽun anan.
Ale tipair tǝlmam hǝn anatun seIsrael tisob̃ur van hǝn Nasub̃, aGot salito.
Len nanunun mai nǝdaŋan siElijah, dereh teil a m̃o hǝn Nasub̃ hǝn b̃ipair tǝlmam hǝn nǝlon atǝmalit van hǝn anatulito, pair tǝlmam hǝn nǝlon alat lǝsagol husur nǝsa aGot tokele, van hǝn nap̃isal silat lotonor, lotokad namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor. Imaiegai, aJon dereh teutaut hǝn nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃eutaut vir Nasub̃.”
Beti aSekariah ikel mai aŋel ke, “Nelǝboi mab hǝn natgalegai? Husur novi haṽut tia mai asoagw evi bareab tia.”
Aŋel isor vari ke, “Nahǝsagw aKapriel notoil len nǝhon aGot tosǝvat ginau m̃os nǝb̃isor mai gaiug, hǝn nǝb̃ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi hǝn natgalegai.
Be husur gǝsadǝlom nǝsa notokele, gaiug dereh geb̃ut, gedǝdas gǝb̃isor van vǝbar nǝboŋ natgalegai b̃evisi. Natit p̃isi dereh tevisi sum̃an notokele.”
Len nǝboŋ enan naluṽoh lutoh vir aSekariah, ale lup̃aŋ lan husur evǝlo len naim siGot.
Nǝboŋ tovivile, salǝboi b̃isor mai galito, ale lolǝboii ke, eris na-kǝta-risi-an sua togǝm len nǝmav len naim siGot, husur eb̃utb̃ut be ike tisor len navǝlan.
Len nǝboŋ hǝn nauman sinahǝmar san gail tonoŋ, eriŋ naut a Jerusalem, ivahim san.
Husur nǝboŋ enan abareab san, aElisapet etian ale husur nahǝbati torim esusuan gai gabag, ike,
“Egai nǝsa Nasub̃ aGot togole m̃os ginau nǝboŋ tohǝhaṽur hǝn ginau. Ilav kuv nahur sasa sagw notodaŋ b̃uri len nǝhon nǝvanuan sagw gail.”
Ale len nahǝbati tomǝlevtes siElisapet, aGot esǝvat aŋel Kapriel vi Nasaret, navile sua a Kalili
hǝn b̃isor mai navensus sua, nahǝsan aMeri. Ikad avan sua len nahǝmar siTevit, nahǝsan aJosef, ale gǝlaru arukel gati ke arilah.
Aŋel ivan hǝn aMeri, ike, “Ivoi. Nasub̃ aGot eputsan gaiug, itoh mai gaiug.”
Be aMeri, nǝlon etuhatuh hǝn nasoruan en san, inau sob̃uer hǝn namilen nasoruan aŋel tokele.
Beti aŋel ikel maii ke, “Sagemǝtahw Meri, aGot ehǝhaṽur hǝn gaiug tia, eputsan gaiug.
Asike idareh gaiug dereh getian, ale gipas anatum̃ ulum̃an sua, geriŋ nǝhes Yesu lan.
Gai dereh tiyalyal balai, lekisi hǝn anatun aGot a mǝhat buni, ale Nasub̃ aGot dereh tigol tilav namilen aTevit atǝman ta sutuai tovi kiŋ.
Nǝpasusan siJakop dereh litoh pipihabǝlan vi sutuai; nanoŋan han eb̃uer.”
Ris aMeri tokel mai aŋel ke, “Imabe? Avan ideh sǝbar nibegw sal!”
Aŋel isor vari ke, “ANunun aGot dereh tegǝm len gaiug, nǝdaŋan siGot a mǝhat buni tikabut gol gaiug hum nǝm̃ol. Husur enan ategai gǝb̃ipasi, dereh tevi siGot, ale lekisi hǝn aNatun aGot.
Geris amaheam̃ aElisapet. Alitenan am etian, ikad anatun ulum̃an naut kǝmas ke tovi bareab tia. Ale egai nahǝbati san tomǝlevtes, gai lotokisi ke tobutoh.
Bathut aGot satǝtan hǝn b̃igol natideh.”
Ale aMeri ike, “Ginau novi natǝbarehreh nauman siNasub̃. Ivoi len ginau hum gotokǝmaienan.” Ale aŋel ivan dani.
Sǝdareh aMeri ile mǝhat, iŋad vi lan nab̃iltivile sua a Jutea, naut enan tobaŋ ṽehuh.
Nǝboŋ tobar naut enan evi lohoim siSekariah, ike, “Ivoi,” mai aElisapet.
Nǝboŋ aElisapet tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-ke-ivoi-an san, anatun ekurkur len nabǝhaṽun, ale aElisapet epul hǝn aNunun aGot.
Beti ikai habat ke, “AGot igol navoian van hǝn gaiug sǝhor alatpǝhaṽut, igol navoian am van hǝn anatum̃ gǝb̃ipasi.
Imab hǝn nategai tovisi hǝn ginau, ke anana siMasta sagw togǝm hǝn ginau?
Husur nǝboŋ notosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nadolom̃, anatugw ekurkur hǝn nahǝhaṽuran san len nabǝhaṽugw.
AGot gatogol navoian van hǝn gaiug, husur ke gaiug godǝlomi ke tigol nǝsa tokel gati mai gaiug.”
Beti aMeri ike: “Nǝlogw eputsan Nasub̃,
Nanunugw ikemkem hǝn aGot sagw gai tolav kuv ginau dan nǝsaan.
Husur eris natǝbarehreh san tovi ut kǝmas, ale vi sutuai naur p̃isi lekiskis ginau ke alitenan navoian topat lan.
AGot todaŋ buni igol natgalevis tovoi buni hǝn ginau, gai sǝb̃on, nahǝsan esǝhor nǝhes p̃isi.
Ilolosa hǝn naur p̃isi ta sutuai vi sutuai lotomǝtahw len nǝyalyalan san.
Eṽusan nǝdaŋan san hǝn navǝlan tia, ehut alat lotoṽiv, lumap̃ip̃iriah, alatenan lotopatpat galit mǝhat len nǝlolito.
Isah sur alat lotoyalyal vi pan dan namilelito, ale eputsan alat lotovi ut kǝmas.
Evǝŋan alat lotomalkǝkat, luhanukub, avil esǝvat alat lotokad natit p̃isi, luvan sǝsǝlav.
Evi tarhǝt silat a Israel lotovi vanuan san gail, inau gati hǝn b̃igol nalolosaan mai navoian hǝn galito,
hum tokel gati mai atǝmadat gail, mai aApraham mai nǝpasusan san van van vi sutuai.”
AMeri itoh mai aElisapet pǝpadaŋ hǝn nahǝbati itor, beti etǝlmam vahim.
Len nǝboŋ aElisapet topas naulum̃an san,
amahean gail mai alat lototoh pǝpadaŋ hǝni, losǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke Nasub̃ aGot ivoi buni hǝni, ale lohǝhaṽur maii.
Len nǝmariboŋ tomǝlevtor logǝm hǝn lǝb̃etiv dalus anatun ale luke leriŋ nahǝsan atǝman aSekariah lan.
Avil anan ikai ke, “Aoa, nahǝsan m̃au aJon!”
Ris lotokel maii ke, “Amaheam̃ gail, nǝhes enan eb̃uer len galito.”
Ale lusor len navǝlalit mai aSekariah hǝn lǝb̃isab̃ nǝhes aSekariah toke tekisi hǝni.
ASekariah isor len navǝlan, eus natit hǝn b̃itos lan ale itosi ke, “Nahǝsan aJon.” Galit p̃isi lup̃aŋ lan.
Vǝha-sua ŋai elǝboi b̃isor tǝtas, ale etub̃at hǝn b̃isal suh aGot.
Alat lototoh pǝpadaŋ hǝni, lumaŋmaŋ, lomǝtahw, mai alat a Jutea, naut enan tobaŋ ṽehuh, luhol husur natgalegai.
Nǝvanuan gail p̃isi lunau masuṽ hǝn nǝsa lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, ale luke, “Natǝtai egai dereh timabe?” Husur navǝlan aGot ipat tin lan.
Atǝman aJon, aSekariah epul hǝn aNunun aGot beti ikel ur nǝsa aGot tokel maii ke,
“Noputsan nahǝsan Nasub̃ aGot seIsrael, bathut egǝm hǝn togol nǝvanuan san gail lotovi slev lotomakuv,
ale esǝvat avan sua todaŋ len nǝpasusan sivanuan nauman san, aTevit, atenan dereh tilav kuv gidato dan nǝsaan sidato.
AGot ekǝmaienan len nabuŋon ahai kelkel ur san gail ta sutuai,
ke atenan b̃ilav kuv gidato dan aenemi sidat gail, dan navǝlan alat lotomǝtahun bun gidat habat.
Ilolosa hum tokel gati mai atǝmadat ta sutuai ale inau gat na-kel-gati-an san tokitin,
na-kel-gati-an tota gati len nahǝsan mai aApraham atǝmadat ta sutuai:
hǝn b̃ilav kuv gidato dan navǝlan aenemi sidat gail hǝn ke datb̃eum san, asike datukad namǝtahwan,
ale datb̃inor len nǝhon mai datb̃ivoi vǝbar nagilen nǝmauran sidato.
Gaiug m̃au anatugw, dereh lekis gaiug hǝn ahai kelkel ur siGot toyalyal buni; husur dereh gaiug geil a m̃o hǝn Nasub̃ hǝn gǝb̃eutaut hǝn nap̃isal san gail,
hǝn gǝb̃ilav mai nǝvanuan san gail nalǝboian hǝn nǝ-lav-kuvi-an dan nǝsaan len narub̃atian dan nǝsaan salito.
Nalolosaan mai navoian siGot sidato dereh tesun gidato sum̃an nǝyal tovisi len nǝmav,
tem̃ias alat lototoh len nǝmargobut, lotomǝtahw len nǝmatan, hǝn b̃esǝhar gidato len nap̃isal totǝm̃at.”
Ale natǝtai enan Jon, etibau, egǝm idaŋ len nanunun. Itoh len naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw vǝbar nǝboŋ togǝm visi len alat a Israel.
Len nǝboŋ galenan Sisa Aukustus ikel buni ke, tikad nap̃uruŋan hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi lototoh len navǝlan alat a Rom.
Nap̃uruŋan enan evi nametǝkav nǝboŋ aKwirinius tovi gavna len naprovens Siria.
Ale galit p̃isi lovi lan naut salit matmat hǝn lǝb̃itos gat nahǝsalito.
Ŋa aJosef am eriŋ naut a Nasaret a Kalili ale evi Petlehem a Jutea lotokisi hǝn nab̃iltivile siTevit, husur gai esua len nǝpasusan siTevit.
Gai mai aMeri, tokel gati ke arb̃ilah, arovi Petlehem hǝn arb̃itos gat nahǝsalaru be aMeri pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃ipasus.
Nǝboŋ artotoh len naut a Petlehem, aMeri ipasus.
Ipas ahai a m̃o san tovi ulum̃an. Eruŋ gole hǝn nahudhukaliko gail. Eriŋi ipat len naut nǝhanan sinarivatǝvat gail husur nahotel epul varirihit p̃isi.
Len mariug enan ikad alatevis lotosuh len nǝmarireu gail, lotokǝtkǝta tǝban navǝshǝsipsip pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Petlehem.
Nǝboŋ lototoh magenan, aŋel siNasub̃ evisi hǝn galito mai namǝnas siNasub̃ em̃ias galito ale lomǝtahw, lom̃inm̃inikot.
Ris aŋel tokel mai galito ke, “Samtemǝtahw, husur nukad na-kel-uri-an tovoi b̃igol nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝb̃ikemkem masuṽ.
Bathut damǝŋai len nab̃iltivile siTevit lupas natǝtai sua b̃ilav kuv nǝsaan samito, gai evi aKristo, Nasub̃, aGot totabtabuh lan.
Egai natit mǝtb̃eris lǝboii lan, ke: dereh mitisab̃ natǝtai lotoruŋ gole hǝn nahudhukaliko gail topat len naut nǝhanan sinarivatǝvat.”
Vǝha-sua ŋai ikad nab̃iltiluṽoh hǝn aŋel hǝn nǝmav lototah maii, lotoputsan aGot ke,
“Nalotuan van hǝn aGot toyalyal buni, mai len navile a pan, natǝm̃at van hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi, navoian siGot topat len galito.”
Nǝboŋ aŋel gail lotoriŋ galito hǝn lǝb̃etǝlmam vi lan nǝmav, nǝvanuan nasipsip lukel mai galit gabag ke, “Ivoi ke datevi Petlehem hǝn datb̃eris nategai tovisi, Nasub̃ tokele mai gidato.”
Ŋa lusaṽsaṽut van, lusab̃ aMeri mai aJosef, mai amas topat len naut nǝhanan sinarivatǝvat.
Nǝboŋ lotorisi tonoŋ, lukel ur nǝsa aŋel tokel husur natǝtai enan.
Ale nǝvanuan p̃isi lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, lup̃aŋp̃aŋ len nǝsa nǝvanuan nasipsip lotokele.
Be aMeri inau gat natgalen p̃isi, len nǝlon inaunau namilen.
Beti nǝvanuan nasipsip lotǝlmam, ale lusor sal suh nǝyalyalan siGot, loputsani husur natit p̃isi lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni mai lotorisi. Esum̃an ŋai aŋel tokel mai galito.
Nǝboŋ nǝmariboŋ tomǝlevtor simas tonoŋ, lotiv dalusi, ale loriŋ nǝhes Yesu lan. Nǝhes enan aŋel ikel uri nǝboŋ aMeri satian sal.
Ta sutuai aMoses itos nalo husur latpǝhaṽut lotopasus ke limastoh vir nǝmariboŋ tovi 40 ale legǝm veveu tǝtas len nǝhon aGot. Imaienan, nǝboŋ nǝmariboŋ hǝn aMeri b̃egǝm veveu buni tonoŋ, arupat aYesu vi Jerusalem hǝn arb̃eṽusani ke tovi siNasub̃ husur nalo siNasub̃ aGot aMoses totosi.
(Imaiegai, len nalo siNasub̃ aGot ike, “Hai a m̃o gail p̃isi lotovi ulum̃an, levi siNasub̃ aGot. AGot itabtabuh len galito hǝn lǝb̃evi esan.”)
Ale aruvan vǝpat nǝman eru hǝn natutumavan hum nalo siNasub̃ aGot tokele ke, “nǝtav eru o napijin eru.”
Len naut a Jerusalem ikad ahaṽut sua nahǝsan aSimeon. Atenan inor mai ehusur kitin hǝn nap̃isal siGot. Itoh vir avan sua b̃evi tarhǝt seIsrael, ale aNunun aGot itoh len gai.
ANunun eṽusani ke gai asike imat vǝbar b̃eris aKristo siNasub̃, aGot totabtabuh lan.
ANunun esǝhar aSimeon vab̃is len naim siGot. Nǝboŋ anan aYesu mai atǝman artopati vi lohoim hǝn arb̃igol nǝsa nalo siMoses tokele,
aSimeon ipati len navǝlan ale isal suh aGot ke,
“Masta, ginau notovi slev sam̃, gagai nǝlogw ikad natǝm̃at, riŋ ginau nimat hum nasoruan sam̃ tokele,
husur namǝtagw eris ategai b̃ilav kuv nǝvanuan sam̃ gail vi lan nǝmauran.
Goutaut hǝni len nakǝtaan sinǝvanuan gail p̃isi.
Gai evi nam̃ial b̃em̃ias nap̃isal sam̃ gail m̃os alat lǝsavi Ju, gai am dereh teputsan nahǝsan nǝvanuan sam̃ gail, aIsrael.”
Nǝboŋ anan mai atǝman artosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa aSimeon tohol husur aYesu, arup̃aŋ.
Beti aSimeon eus aGot hǝn b̃igol b̃ivoi hǝn gǝlaru, ale ikel mai aMeri, anan aYesu ke, “Ategai boh dereh tigol nǝvanuan tisob̃ur len naut a Israel levi ut kǝmas mai teputsan nahǝsan tisob̃ur am. Gai dereh tehum natsua nǝvanuan tosob̃ur lǝb̃isor tasi balai,
ale gai tisor vǝhot nǝnauan tosusuah len nǝlon nǝvanuan lotosob̃ur. Meri, gaiug am, dereh gelǝŋon tisa sum̃an nab̃u tokan tosar nǝlom̃.”
Ikad ahai kelkel ur sua, nahǝsan aAnna, anatvavin aFanuel, len nahǝmar siAser. Alitenan ilah len nasihau emǝlevru ŋai ale asoan imat. Egǝm vi bareab tia.
Evi batunau vǝbar nǝdam̃ han tovi 84. Gai sariŋ naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot avil ilotu len nalennǝyal mai nalenmariug p̃isi. Len nalotuan san, sǝhan, isor tuṽ ŋai.
Len namityal enan ŋai egǝm pǝpadaŋ ale ike sipa vi tǝban Nasub̃ aGot, ihol husur aYesu mai alat lototoh vir aGot b̃ilav kuv a Jerusalem hǝn b̃ikad nǝmakuvan.
Nǝboŋ aJosef mai aMeri artogol natit p̃isi nalo siNasub̃ aGot tokele tonoŋ, arotǝlmam vi Nasaret, navile sǝlaru len naut a Kalili.
Natǝtai etibau, egǝm idaŋ. Gai epul hǝn namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor mai naṽide tovoi, ale aGot ivoi buni hǝni, elǝmas buni.
Len nasihau gail p̃isi anan aYesu mai atǝman arovi Jerusalem hǝn Nǝhanan hǝn nǝPasova.
Nǝboŋ nǝdam̃ hiYesu tosǝŋavur pisan eru, evi mǝhat vi Jerusalem mai gǝlaru sum̃an naṽide hǝn nab̃iltihanan.
Nǝboŋ nǝhanan tonoŋ, lotub̃at vahim. Natǝtai, aYesu itoh a Jerusalem be arsalǝboii
husur arunau ke, totah mai alat lototǝlmam mai gǝlaru. Nǝboŋ nǝyaran hǝn nǝboŋ enan tonoŋ, gǝlaru arokǝta doŋi len amahealar gail mai nabubur salit gail sob̃uer.
Ale arotǝlmam vǝbar naut a Jerusalem hǝn arb̃ekǝta doŋi.
Husur nǝmariboŋ totor arusab̃i len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot. Ebǝtah mai ahai p̃usan gail, esǝsǝloŋ hǝn galito ale eus galito hǝn nausian gail.
Galit p̃isi lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn aYesu, lup̃aŋ len nalǝboian san mai na-sor-vari-an san.
Nǝboŋ artorisi, arup̃aŋ ale anan ikel maii ke, “Anatugw, imabe gotogol tomaiegai hǝn ginamǝru? Geris, atǝmam̃ mai ginau namrolǝŋon isa nǝboŋ namrtokǝta doŋ gaiug.”
Gai isor mai gǝlar ke, “Imabe mǝrtodoŋ ginau? Mǝrsalǝboii ke, nototoh len naim seTǝmagw ŋa?”
Avil arsalǝboi sǝhot nǝsa tokel mai gǝlaru.
Naut kǝmas, be iyar vi pan mai gǝlaru vǝbar naut a Nasaret, ale igol husur nǝsa artokele. Anan inaunau natgalenan len nǝlon.
Ale namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor mai naṽide tovoi siYesu evivi mǝhat. Etibau am ale aGot mai nǝvanuan gail lohǝhaṽur am tabtab hǝni.
Len nasihau tosǝŋavur pisan erim seTiperius tovi Sisa hǝn naut a Rom, nǝboŋ aPontius Pilate tovi gavna hǝn naprovens Jutea, nǝboŋ aHerot Antipas tovi vanuan totibau hǝn naut a Kalili, mai aṽan, nahǝsan aFilip tovi vanuan totibau hǝn naut a Iturea mai a Trakonitis, mai aLisanias tovi vanuan totibau hǝn naut a Apilin,
nǝboŋ aAnnas mai aKaiafas artovi b̃iltihai tutumav, nasoran siGot egǝm hǝn aJon anatun aSekariah len naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw.
Ŋa aJon iyar vi lan naut p̃isi todar vis Nawisel Jortan hǝn b̃ikel ur napisulan egai mai nǝvanuan gail ke, lipair dan nǝsaan salito mai lidam̃ hǝni ke tibaptais hǝn galito hǝn narub̃atian dan nǝsaan.
Ehum ahai kelkel ur aIsaiah totosi sutuai tia husur aJon ke: “Nadoldol sua satokai len naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw, ‘Mǝteutaut hǝn nap̃isal m̃os Nasub̃, gol nap̃isal san gail linor,
dereh nab̃ur madiŋdiŋ gail p̃isi tepul, naṽehuh gail p̃isi tipapav, nap̃isal tohab̃ taṽor tegǝm tinor mai nap̃isal tokutkutu temǝsoh balai.
Ale nǝvanuan gail p̃isi leris lǝboi nap̃isal hǝn nǝ-lav-kuvi-an dan nǝsaan salito, aGot togolgole.’”
Imagenan aJon ikel mai naluṽoh lotogǝm hǝn b̃ibaptais hǝn galito ke, “Anatun nǝm̃at gail! Ase ikel nalǝlǝgauan mai gamito hǝn mǝtb̃igam dan nab̃iltilol paŋpaŋ b̃egǝmai?
Len nǝmauran samito, mitiṽan hǝn naṽite tinor hǝn nǝpairan samito dan nǝsaan. Ale samtetub̃at sor mai gamit gabag ke, ‘Asike datupanis husur aApraham evi atǝmadato ta sutuai.’ Husur nukel mai gamit ke aGot elǝboi b̃ilav nǝvat galegai ale gol ke legǝm vi pasusan siApraham!
AGot esum̃an naulum̃an toutaut tia hǝn b̃itai nǝkadhuhai gail hǝn nakuvkuv; nǝhai p̃isi lǝsǝṽan hǝn naṽit tovoi, gai dereh titaii, bubulan gail vi lan nǝhab.”
Ale naluṽoh lousi ke, “Beti namtigol nǝsa?”
AJon isor var galit ke, “Avan tokad nahurabat toru, tilav tesua mai avan topar, ale avan tokad nǝhanian tigol timaienan.”
Alat lotovi vanuan nǝtaks, galevis am logǝm hǝn lǝb̃ibaptais. Ale lousi ke, “Hai p̃usan, ginamit, namtigol timabe?”
Ikel mai galit ke, “Samtilav kuv nǝvat tetibau sǝhor nǝsa nǝgavmen ta Rom tokele.”
Beti nasoltia galevis lousi ke, “Be ginamit am, namtimabe?” Isor var galito ke, “Samtitaltal hǝn nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃ilav nǝvat mai gamito, samtelibliboŋ husur galito len nakotan. Mǝtehǝhaṽur hǝn nap̃urp̃uran samit ŋai.”
Len nǝboŋ enan nǝvanuan gail lopul hǝn nǝ-vatvat-viri-an. Len nǝnauan salit lousus galit ke, “AJon, gai hum ma b̃evi aKristo, aGot totabtabuh lan a?”
Ale aJon isor var galit p̃isi ke, “Nubaptais hǝn gamit hǝn nǝwai ŋai. Avil avan sua todaŋ sǝhor ginau satogǝmgǝmai, ginau novi ut kǝmas ŋai, nǝsanor kasi hǝn nǝb̃isah rub̃at nǝhau hǝn naributbut san. Gai dereh tibaptais hǝn gamito hǝn aNunun aGot mai nǝhab.
Gai esum̃an naulum̃an topat nǝhai rivrivhai tia hǝn b̃epǝpehun namisurhuwit dan nǝbavhut tomasmas. Dereh tib̃on hǝn namisurhuwit len natuhim han, be tepǝŋas nasugut nawit tosa len nǝhab todǝdas b̃imat.”
Ŋa len naṽide tosob̃ur aJon isor idaŋ mai galito, ale ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi mai galito.
Be nǝboŋ aJon tosor tas nǝvanuan totibau, aHerot Antipas, husur tolah mai aHerotias tovi asoan aṽan, ale nǝboŋ aJon tosor tasi am husur natesasa p̃isi togole tia,
imagenan aHerot igol isa masuṽ sǝhor ta m̃o: ekǝkol gat aJon len naim bǝbaŋis.
Loriŋ aJon len naim bǝbaŋis a tahw, be nǝboŋ nǝvanuan gail p̃isi lotobaptais, aYesu am ibaptais. Nǝboŋ aYesu tosor mai aGot, nǝmav esǝŋav,
aNunun aGot evi pan tokad niben sum̃an nǝtav, itav len aYesu, ale nadoldol egǝm len nǝmav ke: “Gaiug govi anatugw ulum̃an sagw notolǝmas bun gaiug, nohǝhaṽur masuṽ hǝn gaiug.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu totub̃at hǝn nauman san, nǝdam̃ han evi 30. Nǝvanuan gail lunau ke evi anatun aJosef, siHeli,
siMattat, siLevi, siMelki, siJannai, siJosef,
siMattatias, siAmos, siNahum, siEsli, siNakkai,
siMaat, siMattatias, siSemein, siJosek, siJota,
siJoanan, siResa siSeruppapel, siSealtiel, siNeri,
siMelki, siAtti, siKosam, siElmatam, siEr,
siJosua, siElieser, siJorim, siMattat, siLevi,
seSimeon, seJutah, siJosef, siJonam, siEliakim,
siMelea, siMenna, siMattata, siNatan, siTevit,
siJesse, siOpet, siPoas, siSalmon, siNahson,
siAmminatap, siAtmin, siArni, siHesron, siPeres, seJutah,
siJakop, seIsak, siApraham, siTerah, siNahor,
siSeruk, siReu, siPelek, siEper, siSelah,
siKainan, siArfaksat, siSem, siNoah, siLamek,
siMetuselah, siEnok, siJaret, siMahalaleel, siKenan,
siEnos, siSet, siAtam, siGot.
Nǝboŋ aYesu totǝlmam dan Nawisel Jortan, epul hǝn aNunun aGot ale aNunun esǝhari len naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw.
Len naut enan, len nǝmariboŋ tovi 40, natǝmat italtal ke aYesu tigol nǝsaan. AYesu sǝhan natideh, ale len namǝkot hǝn nǝboŋ galenan, nǝmal ihati.
Ŋa natǝmat isor maii ke, “Gǝb̃evi aNatun aGot, kel mai nǝvat egai ke tegǝm vi bǝta.”
Ale aYesu isor vari ke, “Natosian siGot ike, ‘Nǝvanuan edǝdas b̃imaur len nabǝta ŋai.’”
Beti natǝmat esǝhari vi mǝhat ale eṽusan nǝkantri p̃isi len navile a pan hǝn aYesu len namityal tom̃idol ŋai.
Ale isor mai aYesu ke, “Dereh nigol gaiug gevi Masta a mǝhat hǝn natgalenan p̃isi, nǝyalyalan salito, nilavi mai gaiug, bathut nukad natgalenan tia ale nolǝboi nǝb̃ilavi mai avan ideh notolǝŋoni.
Imaienan, gǝb̃etǝŋedur, lotu hǝn ginau, natit p̃isi dereh tevi esam̃.”
AYesu isor vari ke, “Natosian siGot ike: ‘Gilotu hǝn Nasub̃ aGot sam̃ m̃au, gigol nalotuan van hǝn gai sǝb̃on.’”
Beti natǝmat esǝhari vi Jerusalem, eriŋi egilgile a mǝhat buni len naim siGot. Ikel maii ke, “Gǝb̃evi aNatun aGot, gigol gaiug gabag giteh vi pan,
husur natosian siGot ike, ‘AGot dereh tikele hǝn aŋel san gail hǝn lǝb̃ekǝtkǝta tǝban gaiug hǝn natideh satemǝdas gaiug.
Dereh lipat gaiug vi mǝhat len navǝlalito hǝn asike nariem̃ b̃esǝhot nǝvat!’”
AYesu isor vari ke, “Ikele am ke, ‘Sagitaltal kitev nǝdaŋan siNasub̃ aGot sam̃ ke timabe.’”
Nǝboŋ natǝmat totaltal sob̃uer hǝn aYesu, eriŋ aYesu vir nǝboŋ tile tovoi am.
Ale aYesu etǝlmam vi Kalili len nǝdaŋan seNunun aGot, ale nǝvanuan gail luhol husur gai len naut p̃isi todar vis naut enan.
Ep̃usan len naut nab̃onb̃onan seJu gail, ale galit p̃isi lusor sal suhi len naholan salito.
Evi Nasaret, naut enan gai totibau lan, ale len nǝSappat eb̃is len naim nab̃onb̃onan hum naṽide san akis. Ale eil hǝn b̃eṽuruŋ natosian siGot.
Lulav nalob̃ulat tobul maii, nalob̃ulat ahai kelkel ur, aIsaiah totosi. Ale evuhe, isab̃ naut aIsaiah totosi ke:
“ANunun aGot eb̃is len ginau, bathut gatovǝhas ginau hǝn b̃itabtabuh len ginau, hǝn nǝb̃ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi mai namǝsal gail. Gatosǝvat ginau hǝn nǝb̃ikel ur navivilean van hǝn alat lotobǝbaŋis, nakǝtaan van hǝn ametb̃esw gail, nǝmakuvan van hǝn alat, nǝvanuan gail lotogol tosa habat hǝn galito,
mai hǝn nǝb̃ikel ur nasihau Nasub̃ aGot b̃igol b̃ivoi masuṽ van hǝn nǝvanuan san gail lan.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu toṽuruŋi tonoŋ, ebul gat nalob̃ulat, ilav tǝlmam hǝni mai avanuan na-vi-tarhǝte-an, ale ebǝtah. Nǝmet p̃isi len naim nab̃onb̃onan lokǝta mǝtaltal hǝni,
ale etub̃at sor mai galit ke, “Damǝŋai len na-sǝsǝloŋ-hǝni-an samito, natosian egai siGot imadhasarpoh.”
Galit p̃isi lusor ivoi husuri. Lup̃aŋ len nasoruan togomah aYesu tokele, ale lousus galit gabag ke, “Ategai savi anatun aJosef a?”
Ale aYesu isor mai galit ke, “Dereh gamit mitikel nasoruan kǝta egai mai ginau ke, ‘Hai rererer girer hǝn gaiug gimaur! Gole len naut matmat sam̃ hun namtosǝsǝloŋ hǝn gotogole len navile a Kapernaum.’”
AYesu isor am ke, “Ganan, nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke, sǝkad ahai kelkel ur ideh lotohǝhaṽur hǝni len naut a im san, lomǝtahuni.
Nukel nakitinan ke, len nǝboŋ siElijah naut a Israel ikad nǝbatunau pǝhaṽut isob̃ur. Len naut enan ipar us len nasihau totor mai nahǝbati tomǝlevtes. Len naut p̃isi nǝhanian eb̃uer.
Be aGot sasǝvat aElijah van hǝn nǝbatunau ideh ei, ao, esǝvati van hǝn nǝbatunau sual a Sarefat pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Siton.
Ale Len nǝboŋ siElisah tovi hai kelkel ur len naut a Israel, alat lotokad naleprosi lusob̃ur, avil aGot sagol galit ideh sǝmaur, igol aNaaman, uleSiria ŋai imaur.”
Nǝboŋ alat lotosuh len naim nab̃onb̃onan lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn tokǝmaienan, nǝlolit p̃isi ipaŋpaŋ masuṽ.
Lule mǝhat, hut aYesu dan navile enan, ale sǝhari van hǝn nabuŋon hǝn naṽehuh, naut enan topat lan, hǝn lǝb̃ibar hǝni vi pan.
Be aYesu egis tur len naluṽoh, iyar vi tut.
Beti evi pan vi Kapernaum a Kalili ale len nǝSappat eṽusan nǝvanuan gail.
Lup̃aŋ len nap̃usanan san husur nasoruan san ikad nǝdaŋan hǝn namitisau mai na-il-a-m̃o-an.
Len naim nab̃onb̃onan ikad naulum̃an, nanunun nǝmargobut setǝmat totoh lan. Ikai habat ke,
“Wii! Imab gotuh gaiug hǝn ginamit, aYesu ta Nasaret? Gogǝm hǝn gǝb̃igol namteb̃uer a? Ginau nolǝboi gaiug. Gaiug govi siGot gotogǝm m̃osi!”
AYesu isor idaŋ maii ke, “Gemǝdau! Gimakuv vi tut dan atenan!” Beti natǝmat igol iteh, taltaloŋ len tan rivuh len galito, ale eriŋ atenan sǝkad nasǝnahan.
Nǝvanuan p̃isi lomǝtahw, lup̃aŋ, ale lousus galit gabag ke, “Nap̃usanan saganan? Len na-il-a-m̃o-an mai nǝdaŋan, gai isor idaŋ mai nanunun nǝmargobut gail, ale lumakuv!”
Beti na-kel-uri-an husur aYesu iperŋan naut p̃isi todar visi naut enan.
AYesu eriŋ naim nab̃onb̃onan, evi lan naim sivan sua nahǝsan aSimon. Len nǝboŋ enan anan asoan aSimon elǝŋon isa masuṽ hǝn topud hǝn namǝsahan, ale lous aYesu hǝn b̃igol b̃imaur.
Beti aYesu eil ben alitenan, ale isor idaŋ van hǝn namǝsahan. Vǝha-sua ŋai namǝsahan inoŋ dani, ale ile mǝhat, lav nǝhanian mai galito.
Nǝboŋ namityal tomasur, nǝvanuan gail losǝhar alat lotomǝsah p̃isi hǝn namǝsahan tiltile van hǝn aYesu. Eriŋ navǝlan gǝlar len galit ṽisusua, ale lumaur,
mai natǝmat isob̃ur lumakuv. Nǝboŋ lotomakuv, lukai habat ke, “Gaiug govi aNatun aGot!” Be aYesu ikai tas galito ke salisor am husur lolǝboii ke evi aKristo, aGot totabtabuh lan.
Nǝboŋ nǝmav topitau, aYesu evi lan naut tob̃ǝb̃esw. Naluṽoh ludoŋi, doŋi van ale nǝboŋ lotosab̃i, loil kǝkol hǝni hǝn asike b̃eriŋ galito.
Be ikel mai galit ke, “Ginau nimasvi lan nab̃iltivile tile gail am hǝn nǝb̃ikel ur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot, bathut aGot esǝvat ginau m̃osi.”
Beti len naim nab̃onb̃onan gail a Jutea, aYesu ikel ur tabtab hǝn nasoruan siGot.
Boŋ sua aYesu toil tarhǝt nab̃iltiwai lotokisi hǝn Nab̃iltiwai Kennesaret. Naluṽoh loririhit garu lan hǝn lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan siGot.
Ale aYesu eris nab̃ot eru artokir tarhǝwai, len naut nǝvanuan nǝsahiehan gail lotoriŋi. Galito lokǝkas nalevlev salito.
Isah len nab̃ot sivan sua nahǝsan aSimon, ale eusi ke tesul hǝni vi lau kǝkereh. Beti ebǝtah len nab̃ot, eṽusan alat lotosuh a ut.
Nǝboŋ tosor tonoŋ, ikel mai aSimon ke, “Rusan nab̃ot vi lan naut tosareh am, ale bar hǝn nalevlev hǝn mǝtb̃isah hǝn naieh.”
ASimon isor vari ke, “Masta, len mariug namtohishisi sob̃uer van naut ilan. Be husur gotokǝmaienan, namtibar hǝn nalevlev tǝtas am.”
Nǝboŋ lotobar hǝni, lusab̃ naieh isob̃ur lan, gol ke nalevlev etub̃at hǝn b̃emǝtar.
Imagenan lob̃ilival van hǝn alat lotosuh len nab̃ot togon hǝn lǝb̃egǝm susupah hǝni mai galito. Logǝm, usan nab̃ot gǝlar p̃isi aropul vǝtah bǝhbǝhw!
Nǝboŋ aSimon Pita toris natenan, iteh bathurien aYesu ike, “Givan dan ginau Nasub̃, husur novi vanuan tosa masuṽ!”
Ekǝmaienan husur gai mai alat lotosuh maii, losǝhoṽut hǝn naieh tosob̃ur lotosah hǝni.
AJemes mai aJon, anatun aSepeti gǝlar artob̃on mai aSimon len nauman, gǝlar tu arosǝhoṽut. Beti aYesu ikel mai aSimon ke, “Sagemǝtahw; asike gosǝsahieh am, damǝŋai van dereh gisah hǝn nǝvanuan gail.”
Ŋa loliv nab̃ot eru enan salito vahut, ale loriŋ natit p̃isi esuh, lohusur aYesu.
Nǝboŋ aYesu totoh len nab̃iltivile sua, avan sua tokad naleprosi len niben kavkav egǝm hǝni. Nǝboŋ toris aYesu iteh len tan, ekǝta vi pan ale eŋiri ke, “Nasub̃, gǝb̃elǝŋoni, golǝboi gǝb̃igol nǝb̃imaur, nǝb̃iveveu.”
Ŋa aYesu isar hǝn navǝlan, ibari ale ikel maii ke, “Nolǝŋoni. Gimaur, giveveu!” Vǝha-sua ŋai naleprosi ivan dani.
Beti aYesu ikele hǝni ke, “Sagikel nǝsa tovisi mai avan ideh. Be givan, geṽusan gaiug hǝn ahai tutumav. Ale geviol hǝn naviolan m̃os natutumavan hum aMoses tokele tia hǝn naveveuan sam̃ hǝn gǝb̃eṽusan galit ke gumaur.”
Be na-kel-uri-an husur aYesu ivan van am, ŋa nǝvanuan isob̃ur logǝm hǝn lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝni ale hǝn gai b̃igol galit lǝb̃imaur dan namǝsahan salito.
Avil aYesu eriŋ galit akis, evi lan naut tob̃ǝb̃esw sǝb̃on ale isor mai aTǝman.
Len nǝboŋ sua aYesu ep̃usp̃usan, ale naFarisi gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo lobǝtah ei. Logǝm len navile p̃isi a Kalili mai a Jutea mai naut a Jerusalem. Nǝdaŋan siNasub̃ eb̃is len aYesu hǝn b̃ilav kuv namǝsahan.
Len nǝboŋ enan lalum̃an galevis lupat avan sua len nǝbateh, salǝboi b̃erusan gai. Luke lipati vi lohoim hǝn lǝb̃eriŋi bathurien aYesu,
avil lohisi sob̃uer, naim epul hǝn nǝvanuan varirihit. Beti lopǝlau vi mǝhat len navurun topapav, ludakuvi, gol nab̃ur lan, ale loriŋ tur hǝn gai mai nǝbateh san vi pan. Loriŋi rivuh len naluṽoh, a m̃o hǝn aYesu.
Nǝboŋ aYesu toris lǝboi nadǝlomian salito ike, “Tegai, gaiug, nǝsaan sam̃ gail lumarub̃at.”
NaFarisi gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo, nǝnauan salit imaiegai ke, “Gai evi ase tosor maiegai? Inau ke tovi aGot a? Ase elǝboi b̃erub̃at nǝsaan? AGot sǝb̃on ŋai!”
Be aYesu elǝboi nǝnauan salito ale ike, “Nǝnauan len nǝlomito satimaienan.
Nǝb̃ike, ‘Norub̃at nǝsaan sam̃ gail,’ o ‘Gile mǝhat, giyar,’ nǝsa emǝdmǝdau am?
Imagenan neṽusan gamito ke aNatun Nǝvanuan ikad nǝdaŋan hǝn b̃erub̃at nǝsaan gail len navile a pan timaiegai….” Ale ikel mai atenan salǝboi b̃erusan gai ke, “Nukel mai gaiug, gile mǝhat, pat nǝbateh sam̃ ale vahim!”
Vǝha-sua ŋai ile mǝhat len nǝholito, ipat nǝsa topat lan, isal suh nǝyalyalan siGot, ivahim.
Galit p̃isi lumaŋmaŋ vǝsa ale lusal suh nǝyalyalan siGot. Lumaŋmaŋ masuṽ, lomǝtahw ale luke, “Damǝŋai nǝsa dattorisi etile buni.”
Natgalenan tonoŋ, husur nǝboŋ enan, aYesu evivile ale eris nǝvanuan nǝtaks sua, nahǝsan aLevi, tobǝtah len nǝpasvalǝval hǝn nǝtaks. Ale ikel maii ke, “Gitah mai ginau, gehusur ginau!”
Ale eriŋ natit gail p̃isi ipat, ile mǝhat, ehusuri.
Beti aLevi eutaut hǝn nab̃iltihanan m̃os aYesu len naim san, ale ikad nab̃iltiluṽoh hǝn alat lotoum sum̃an aLevi mai galevis am luhan mai galito.
Be naFarisi gail mai ahai p̃usan salit gail hǝn nalo, lukel mǝtmǝtan hǝn aYesu mai ahai susur san gail. Luke, “Imabe mǝttohan, mǝttomun mai nǝvanuan nǝtaks gail mai alat nǝsaan am?”
AYesu isor var galit ke, “Savi alat lotomaur lotovan hǝn nǝvanuan nareran, be alat lotomǝsah ŋai.
Ginau nǝsagǝm hǝn nǝb̃ikel alat lotonor hǝn lǝb̃ipair dan nǝsaan salito be nogǝm hǝn nǝb̃ikele mai alat nǝsaan.”
Beti lukel maii ke, “Ahai susur siJon gail, nǝboŋ isob̃ur lǝsǝhan hǝn lǝb̃isor tuṽ, mai ahai susur sinamit, naFarisi gail, lumagenan, be esam̃ gail imabe lotohan, lotomun?”
AYesu isor var galit ke, “Nǝboŋ avan sua tolah, godǝdas gǝb̃igol nǝvanuan san gail lotob̃on maii hǝn salihan.
Be dereh tikad nǝboŋ hǝn lǝb̃esǝhar naulum̃an tolah dan nǝvanuan san gail. Len nǝboŋ enan asike luhan.”
Beti aYesu ep̃usan, ib̃ol ke, “Sǝkad avan ideh totar nap̃isihoh dan nahurabat veveu ale tosode len nahurabat tomatu. Tagole, tamǝdas nahurabat veveu ale nap̃isihoh asike tanor hǝn nahurabat tomatu.
Nǝvanuan gail lǝsab̃ir nǝwain lotomadhaum hǝni len nahurhuwain tomatu. Nǝvanuan tagole, ale nǝwain veveu tatǝvah tur lan, ale nahurhuwain tapǝlaus. Nǝwain tariv dani ale nahurhuwain tǝsa.
Aoa, nǝvanuan gail leb̃ir nǝwain veveu len nahurhuwain veveu.
Avil sǝkad avan ideh tomun nǝwain tomatu tolǝŋon toveveu husur ike, ‘Nǝwain tomatu ivoi sǝhori,’ ale gamit mǝtumaienan, mǝtomǝtahun natit toveveu.”
Len nǝSappat sua aYesu mai ahai susur san gail luyar tur len nǝmarireu hǝn nawit, ale ahai susur gail lotub̃at kin b̃ur nǝhavhuwit gail. Lusarsari len navǝlalito ale luhan namisurhuwit gail.
NaFarisi galevis lousi ke, “Imabe mǝtugol nǝsa nalo tokai tasi len nǝSappat?”
AYesu isor var galit ke, “Mǝtsaṽuruŋ lǝboi nǝsa aTevit galito lotogole nǝboŋ lotomalkǝkat a?
Eb̃is len naim nǝtap̃olen siGot, ale ilav nabǝta tolo. Ihani ale ilavi mai lalum̃an san. Be nalo ike ahai tutumav sǝb̃olit ŋai lolǝboi lǝb̃ihani.”
Beti aYesu ikel mai galito ke, “ANatun Nǝvanuan evi masta hǝn nǝSappat. NǝSappat ipat len navǝlan.”
Len nǝSappat sua tile am, aYesu evi lan naim nab̃onb̃onan, ep̃usan. Ale ikad avan sual ei, navǝlan nǝmatu totah, togǝm hum towas.
NaFarisi gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo ludas p̃isal hǝn lǝb̃isab̃ nǝsaban ideh len aYesu hǝn lǝb̃ikot hǝni. Ŋa lokǝta bunusi ke b̃igol atenan b̃imaur len nǝSappat salito.
Be aYesu elǝboi nǝsa lotonau, ale ikel mai naulum̃an tokad navǝlan totah ke, “Gile mǝhat, il rivuh hǝn galit p̃isi.” Imaienan naulum̃an ile mǝhat ale eil ei.
Beti aYesu eus galit ke, “Nous gamito, len nalo nǝsa inor len nǝSappat: datb̃igol navoian o nǝsaan, datb̃etǝgau gat nǝmauran o datb̃igol b̃imasig?”
Ekǝta garu len galito, beti ikel mai atenan ke, “Gisar hǝn navǝlam̃.” Igole, ale navǝlan imaur buni tǝtas.
Avil galito, lopul hǝn nǝlol paŋpaŋ vǝsa, ale lotub̃at sor utaut len galit gabag hǝn nǝsa lǝb̃igole van hǝn aYesu.
Len nǝboŋ galenan sua aYesu evi mǝhat len naṽehuh hǝn b̃isor tuṽ, ale isor mai aGot len nalenmariug kavkav.
Dudulan ekis ahai susur san gail gǝmai, ale ilekis hǝn 12 dan galito. Ekis galit hǝn ahai pispisul: ikad
aSimon (tokisi am hǝn aPita) mai aAdru aṽan, ikad aJemes, aJon, aFilip, aPartolomiu,
aMattiu, aTomas, aJemes anatun aAlfeus, aSimon tovi naSelot sua,
aJutas anatun aJemes mai aJutas Iskariot b̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlan naenemi san gail.
AYesu eput vi pan mai galito, eil len nabǝmav. Ikad naluṽoh hǝn ahai susur san ei mai nǝvanuan tosob̃ur lotogǝm a Jerusalem mai naut tosob̃ur a Jutea mai galevis ta Tair mai ta Siton.
Logǝm hǝn lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝni, ale hǝn gai b̃igol namǝsahan salit b̃inoŋ. AYesu ehut nanunun tosa gail dan galit lotokade, ale igol na-lǝŋon-isa-an salit ivoi.
Galit p̃isi lugol risi ke libari bathut nǝdaŋan egǝm len aYesu, igol galit lumaur.
AYesu ekǝta ris ahai susur san gail ike: “Gamit mǝttom̃idol, navoian siGot igol gagai mǝtukab hǝni husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot evi samito.
Gamit mǝttomalkǝkat gagai, navoian siGot igol gagai mǝtukab hǝni husur dereh mitihanukub. Gamit mǝttotaŋ gagai, navoian siGot igol gagai mǝtukab hǝni husur dereh mitiman.
“Gamit, nǝvanuan gail lotomǝtahun bun gamito, lotokai hǝn gamito, lotosor viles gamito, ale lotosor mǝdas nahǝsamit hum tosa bathut aNatun Nǝvanuan mǝttovi esan, navoian siGot igol gagai mǝtukab hǝni.
Mitikemkem len nǝboŋ enan, mǝtemǝlmǝlah len nahǝhaṽuran husur nakonp̃urp̃uran samit len nǝmav gag etibau. Nǝvanuan lotogol tosa hǝn gamit maienan, losum̃an atǝmalit ta sutuai lotogol tosa maienan hǝn ahai kelkel ur gail siGot.
“Avil gamit mǝttokad natit tosob̃ur, nǝmauran samit tivan tisa vǝsa batbat husur nǝsa mǝttokade evi hǝn nǝboŋ ta damǝŋai ŋai.
Gamit mǝttokad nǝhanian tosob̃ur gagai, nǝmauran samit tivan tisa vǝsa batbat husur dereh mitimalkǝkat. Gamit mǝttoman gagai, nǝmauran samit tivan tisa vǝsa batbat husur dereh nǝlomit tisa, mititaŋ.
“Gamit, mǝtb̃eum m̃os nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝb̃isal suh gamito, nǝmauran samit tivan tisa vǝsa batbat, husur atǝmalit ta sutuai lugol maienan hǝn ahai kelkel ur gǝgǝras gail.”
AYesu ep̃usan am ike, “Samtimaienan. Nukel mai gamit mǝttosǝsǝloŋ hǝn ginau ke: Mǝtelǝmas bun aenemi samit gail, gol tivoi van hǝn alat lotomǝtahun bun gamito,
us aGot hǝn b̃igol navoian van hǝn alat lotosor mǝdas gamito, sor tuṽ m̃os alat lotogol tosa hǝn gamito.
Avan ideh b̃iṽos nǝtarhom̃, gipair hǝn nǝtarhom̃ togon van hǝni. Avan ideh b̃ilav nahurabat naut susus sam̃, gidam̃ hǝni ke tilav nǝhai susun sam̃ am.
Geviol mai galit p̃isi lǝb̃eus gaiug hǝn natideh, ale avan ideh b̃ilav natideh sam̃, sageusi ke tilav tǝlmam hǝni.
Naṽide mǝttolǝŋoni ke nǝvanuan gail ligole van hǝn gamito, mitigol naṽide enan van hǝn galito.
“Mǝtb̃elǝmas bun ŋai alat lotolǝmas bun gamito, savi natideh. Husur ke alat nǝsaan am lolǝmas bun alat lotolǝmas bun galito.
Mǝtb̃ivoi ŋai hǝn alat lotovoi hǝn gamito, savi natideh. Bathut alat nǝsaan am lugol tomagenan.
Mǝtb̃idam̃ hǝn nǝvat ŋai mai alat mǝttonau ke lǝb̃isar gele, savi natideh. Alat nǝsaan am ludam̃ hǝn nǝvat mai galit gabag, hǝn lǝb̃isar gel nǝkabut p̃isi.
Be ivoi ke gamit mǝtetile. Mǝtelǝmas bun aenemi samit gail, mitivoi hǝn galito. Mitidam̃ hǝn nǝvat mai galito, be samtitoh vir nǝ-sar-gele-an. Mǝtb̃imaienan, dereh aGot tilav nakonp̃urp̃uran totibau mai gamito ale mǝtegǝm vi anatun aGot toyalyal buni. Bathut gai ivoi hǝn alat lǝsasipa vi tǝban mai nǝvanuan nǝsaan gail.
Nǝlomit timastaŋis nǝvanuan gail sum̃an aTǝmamit len nǝmav nǝlon totaŋis galito.”
AYesu isor am ke, “Samtike nǝvanuan tile isa ale aGot asike ike mǝtusa. Samtisab̃ sǝhoti ke nǝvanuan tile timaspanis. Imagenan aGot asike isab̃ sǝhoti ke gamit mitimaspanis. Mǝterub̃at nǝsaan nǝvanuan togole hǝn gamito, imagenan dereh aGot terub̃at nǝsaan samito.
Mǝteviol, imagenan dereh aGot teviol mai gamito. Gai dereh teviol hǝn tisob̃ur mai gamito, teirir hǝni, tepul sǝsǝhov variviriv. Bathut mǝtb̃eviol habat o mǝtb̃eviol kǝkereh, aGot teviol magenan mai gamito.”
AYesu ep̃usan am, ib̃ol maiegai ke: “Ametb̃esw elǝboi b̃esǝhar ametb̃esw togon a? Aoa, gǝlar p̃isi dereh aripal suluṽi, ariteh len nab̃ur.
Ahai susur, satibau sǝhor ahai p̃usan san, be avan ideh tolǝboi sǝhot p̃is nap̃usanan sihai p̃usan san, dereh tesum̃an gai.
“Husur nǝsa gotokǝta kot nakumashǝhai len namǝtan aṽam̃, be gǝsǝnau nab̃iltitarhai len namǝtam̃?
Imabe gotoke, ‘Wawa, nidakuv nakumashǝhai dan namǝtam̃,’ nǝboŋ gotokad nǝtarhai gǝsarisi len namǝtam̃? Gaiug gotovi vanuan gǝgǝras, gilav kuv nǝtarhai dan namǝtam̃ bai. Gǝb̃igole b̃inoŋ nakǝtaan sam̃ dereh timasil tinor hǝn gǝb̃idakuv nakumashǝhai dan namǝtan aṽam̃.
“Nǝhai tovoi sǝṽan hǝn naṽit tosa. Nǝhai tosa sǝṽan hǝn naṽit tovoi.
Goris lǝboi nǝhai ideh nǝboŋ gotoris naṽite. Nǝvanuan gail lǝsavǝrus naṽit tovoi hun nafik o nakrep len nǝhau tosa tokad nasunite.
Nǝvanuan tovoi igol navoian len navoian topul len nǝlon, mai nǝvanuan tosa igol nǝsaan len nǝsaan topul len nǝlon. Bathut, nǝsa nǝvanuan tokele, evivile len nǝsa topul sǝsǝhov len nǝlon.
“Mǝtokis ginau ke, ‘Masta, Masta,’ be mǝtsagol nǝsa notokele. Imabe?
Nǝvanuan p̃isi lotogǝm hǝn ginau, lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan sagw mai lotogole, lumaiegai ke:
Ehum avan sua toum hǝn naim, tokir sareh ale toriŋ nǝpaudesen len nǝvat mot. Nǝboŋ nilev togǝmai, nawisel tovi mǝhat, iṽas naim be sakur hǝni husur eum hǝni idaŋ habat.
Be avan ideh tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan sagw ale sagole, esum̃an avan sua toum hǝn naim topat len tan, nǝpaudesen tob̃uer. Nǝboŋ nawisel tolev, toṽas naim enan, vǝha-sua ŋai erus, iteh vǝmasirsir.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ, ibar naut a Kapernaum.
Len naut enan ikad nasenturion sua tokad naslev. Nasenturion enan inau ke naslev san tovoi habat. Be naslev emǝsah, hum ma b̃emǝsol.
Nasenturion esǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan husur aYesu, ale esǝvat alat evis lotoil a m̃o hǝn naJu gail van hǝni hǝn lǝb̃eusi ke, tegǝm hǝn b̃igol naslev san timaur.
Nǝboŋ lotogǝm hǝn aYesu, loŋiri ke, “Bathut atenan inor, ivoi hǝn gǝb̃igol nategai m̃osi,
husur elǝmas bun nǝvanuan sadit gail, ale eum hǝn naim nab̃onb̃onan sinamito.”
Ŋa aYesu ivan mai galito. Nǝboŋ pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃ibar naim enan, nasenturion esǝvat esan gail hǝn lǝb̃ikel maii ke: “Nasub̃, ivoi ke sagegǝm pǝpadaŋ am, husur ginau nǝsanor kasi hǝn gǝb̃eb̃is lohoim sagw.
Imaienan nunau ginau ke, nǝsanor kasi hǝn nǝb̃ebubur mai gaiug. Avil gǝb̃ikele ke naslev sagw b̃imaur, dereh timaur.
Nokǝmaienan husur ginau nutoh pipihabǝlan alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn ginau, ale nasoltia gail lutoh pipihabǝlagw. Nǝb̃ikel mai tosua ke, ‘Givan,’ dereh tivan; nǝb̃ikel mai sual am ke, ‘Gegǝmai,’ dereh tegǝmai. Nǝb̃ikel mai naslev sagw ke, ‘Gigol nategai,’ ale dereh tigole.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, ip̃aŋ lan. Ipair van hǝn naluṽoh lotohusuri ale ike, “Nukel mai gamit ke; nǝsǝsab̃ nadǝlomian todaŋ maiegai len alat seIsrael.”
Beti alat sinasenturion, gai tosǝvat galito, lotǝlmam vahim ale lusab̃i ke naslev imaur buni.
Pelan han aYesu evi Nain, navile sua. Ale ahai susur san gail mai nab̃iltiluṽoh lutah maii.
Nǝboŋ aYesu toyar pǝpadaŋ hǝn nametlǝkau hǝn navile, alat a Nain lupat naulum̃an sua tomat vivile, tovi aṽisusua sinan. Lupati len nǝmel. Anan evi batunau, ale nab̃iltiluṽoh a Nain luyar mai alitenan.
Nǝboŋ Nasub̃ toris alitenan, nǝlon itaŋisi ale ike, “Sagitaŋ.”
Beti ivan, ibar nǝmel nǝmatan, ale alat lotopati loil. Ike, “Mantuhmar, nukel mai gaiug, gile mǝhat!”
Ale nǝmantuhmar ebǝtah mǝhat, etub̃at sor. Beti aYesu eviol hǝni mai anan.
Galit p̃isi lomǝtahw, lumaŋmaŋ ale lusor sal suh nǝyalyalan siGot ke, “Ahai kelkel ur sua toyalyal evisi hǝn gidato!” Lusor am ke, “AGot egǝm hǝn b̃evi tarhǝt sidato, nǝvanuan san gail.”
Na-kel-uri-an egai husur aYesu iperŋan naut p̃isi a Jutea mai naut p̃isi todar visi.
Ahai susur siJon gail lukel ur natgalen p̃isi maii. Ale ekis galit eru,
esǝvat gǝlaru van hǝn Nasub̃ hǝn arb̃eusi ke, “Gaiug govi nǝvanuan togǝmgǝmai o ivoi ke namtitoh vir sual am?”
Nǝboŋ artogǝm hǝni, arousi ke, “AJon Baptais esǝvat ginamǝru gǝm hǝn gaiug, eusi ke, ‘Govi nǝvanuan togǝmgǝmai o ivoi ke namtitoh vir tile am?’”
Len nǝboŋ enan ŋai aYesu igol nǝvanuan isob̃ur lotokad namǝsahan tiltile lumaur, igol galevis, nanunun nǝmargobut gail lumakuv dan galito. Ale ilav nakǝtaan mai nametb̃esw isob̃ur.
Imagenan isor var gǝlaru ke, “Mǝretǝlmam ale kel mai aJon nǝsa mǝrtorisi mai mǝrtosǝsǝloŋ hǝni: ametb̃esw gail lukad nakǝtaan, alat narielit togau luyar, alat lotokad naleprosi lumaur, luveveu, nǝdariŋ b̃ulb̃ulol gail losǝsǝloŋ mai alat lotomat lule mǝhat dan nǝmatan. Ale alat lotopar tite losǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-kel-uri-an tovoi.
AGot tigol tivoi hǝn avan ideh sateh dan nadǝlomian len ginau sil nǝsa notogole.”
Nǝboŋ ahai pispisul siJon artovan, aYesu etub̃at sor husur aJon mai naluṽoh ke, “Nǝboŋ mǝttovi lan naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw, mǝtuvan varis nǝsa? Naṽiliol nǝlan toṽuvi tokurkur a? Aoa!
B̃eb̃uer, mǝtuvan hǝn mǝtb̃eris nǝsa? Naulum̃an tosun nahurabat nǝvat halit totibau a? Aoa! Alat lotosun nahurabat tomaienan, lotokad nakontit p̃isi, galit losuh len nab̃iltiim sekiŋ gail!
B̃imaienan, mǝtuvan hǝn mǝtb̃eris nǝsa? Ahai kelkel ur sual a? Evoi, nukel mai gamit ke savi ahai kelkel ur ŋai, iyalyal sǝhor ahai kelkel ur.
Atenan evi nǝvanuan natosian siGot tokel husuri ke: ‘Geris! dereh nesǝvat ahai pispisul sagw a m̃o hǝn gaiug toutaut hǝn nap̃isal sam̃ m̃os gaiug.’
“Nukel mai gamit ke, sǝkad avan ideh napǝhaṽut topasi, tosǝhor aJon; Be len alat lototoh pipihabǝlan aGot, galit ideh tovi ut kǝmas iyalyal sǝhor aJon.”
(Galit isob̃ur mai galevis lotovi nǝvanuan nǝtaks aJon tobaptais hǝn galit tia, nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn aYesu, lukel lǝboii ke, nap̃isal siGot inor.
Avil naFarisi gail mai alat lotokad namitisau hǝn nalo, aJon sǝbaptais hǝn galito, lomǝtahun p̃is nap̃isal siGot mai nalǝŋonian siGot m̃os galito.)
AYesu isor am, ike, “Ale naur ta damǝŋai lumabe? Nolǝboi nǝb̃ike lohum nǝsa?
Losum̃an alahutai lotobǝtah len nǝmaket lotokai van hǝn galit gabag ke, ‘Namtoṽuv nab̃uvimal m̃os gamito be mǝtsǝsav; namtokǝkai hǝn nǝb̃e nǝmatan be mǝtsǝtaŋ!’
Logǝgel hǝn nǝnauan salit tabtab. Nokǝmaienan husur nǝboŋ aJon Baptais togǝmai, sǝhan nabǝta, samun nǝwain, be mǝtuke, ‘Ikad natǝmat.’
Avil aNatun Nǝvanuan egǝmai, ihan, emun, be mǝtuke, ‘Mǝteris! Naulum̃an tohan tǝmǝhav, tomun vatǝrog. Itah mai nǝvanuan nǝtaks mai nǝvanuan nǝsaan gail!’
Be alat lotohusur nap̃isal siGot hǝn namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor, nǝmauran salito eṽusani ke nap̃isal siGot ekitin.”
Ikad naFarisi sua, nahǝsan aSimon, tous aYesu hǝn b̃ihan maii, ale aYesu eb̃is lohoim san, ipat tarhǝgarin hǝn b̃ihan.
Nǝboŋ napǝhaṽut nǝsaan sua len nab̃iltivile enan tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke aYesu tohan len naim siFarisi enan, ipat nab̃otel nǝhai pǝhas van hǝn aYesu.
Eil pǝpadaŋ hǝn narien, itaŋ. Nǝboŋ totaŋ, namǝtarur san iteh len nalohrien aYesu gol arumosmos. Beti igargar narien hǝn navurun, esum̃ narien ale eb̃ir nǝhai pǝhas len narien gǝlaru.
NaFarisi tous aYesu hǝn b̃ihan, eris natenan. Nǝboŋ torisi inau len gai sǝb̃on ke, “Ategai tavi ahai kelkel ur, talǝboi as tobari, ale talǝboi am naṽide san ke alitenan evi pǝhaṽut nǝsaan.”
AYesu isor vari ke, “Simon, nukad natesua hǝn nǝb̃ikel mai gaiug.” ASimon ike, “Hai p̃usan, kele.”
AYesu ib̃ol hǝni ke, “Ikad alaruevis. Arukabut hǝn nǝvat sivan sua todam̃ hǝni mai gǝlaru. Sua ikabut hǝn natenarius tovi 500, togon ikabut hǝn 50.
Gǝlar p̃isi arsǝkad nǝvat hǝn arb̃isar gele, ŋa gai ikas kuv nǝkabut sǝlaru. Imaienan, gǝlar ta be elǝmas buni sǝhor togon?”
ASimon isor vari ke, “Hum ma atenan, nǝvanuan tokas kuv nǝkabut san totibau sǝhor togon.” AYesu ike, “Gokitin.”
Beti ipair van hǝn napǝhaṽut ale ikel mai aSimon ke, “Geris alitegai? Nǝboŋ notob̃is lohoim sam̃ gǝsǝlav nǝwai hǝn nǝb̃ekǝkas nariegw, wake namǝtarur selitegai igol nariegw imosmos hǝni ale igargari hǝn navurun.
Gǝsasum̃ nǝtarhogw hǝn na-ke-ivoi-an hǝn notogǝmai, wake nǝboŋ notob̃is lohoim, alitegai sasib hǝn tosum̃ nariegw gǝlaru.
Gǝsavǝhas nǝkadugw hǝn naoil hǝn naoliv hum naṽide sidato, wake gai eb̃ir nǝhai pǝhas len nariegw gǝlaru.
Bathut natgalenan, nukel mai gaiug ke, nǝsaan san gail lotosob̃ur lumarub̃at tia, imaienan gai elǝmas masuṽ hǝn ginau. Avil nǝvanuan, nǝsaan san tokǝkereh tomarub̃at, gai elǝmas bun ginau, be tokǝkereh ŋai.”
Beti aYesu ikel mai alitenan ke, “Nǝsaan sam̃ gail lumarub̃at.”
Be alat lototoh maii len nǝhanan ei lusor mai galit gabag ke, “Ase gagai, torub̃at nǝsaan gail tu maiegai?”
Ale aYesu ikel mai alitenan ke, “Nadǝlomian sam̃ gatolav kuv gaiug dan nǝsaan sam̃ gail. Givan, natǝm̃at tipat len nǝlom̃.”
Nǝboŋ tonoŋ, aYesu iyar tur len navile gail mai nab̃iltivile gail. Ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot. Ahai pispisul lotovi 12 lutah maii.
Napǝhaṽut galevis, aYesu togol galit lotomaur dan nanunun nǝmargobut mai namǝsahan, galit am lutah maii. Lovi: aMeri ta Maktala, nanunun nǝmargobut tomǝlevru lotomakuv dani tia;
aJoanna asoan aKusa toil a m̃o hǝn naim siHerot Antipas tovi kiŋ; aSusanna; mai isob̃ur am. Latpǝhaṽut galenan, len nǝsa lotokade, loviol kǝmas hǝn nǝvat salito m̃os aYesu mai nǝvanuan san gail.
Nǝboŋ naluṽoh hǝn navile galevis lotogǝm hǝn aYesu, lub̃onb̃on, ale ikel nǝb̃ol p̃usan ke,
“Avan sua tomabmabul namisurhut gail ivan vabubulan namisurhuwit han. Nǝboŋ tobubulani maienan, galevis luteh len nap̃isal; nǝvanuan gail lupal gat gail ale nǝman namǝsav luhan p̃isi.
Galevis luteh len naut tobaŋ vat. Nǝboŋ lototov, lumayoh husur nǝwai eb̃uer len naut enan.
Galevis luteh rivuh len nǝharhǝhau tokad nasunite. Nǝboŋ artotov, nǝhau eruŋ gut bun nawit.
Namisurhuwit galevis am luteh len nǝtan tokǝnoh. Lutov ale sǝdareh luṽan vǝha-100 len nǝsa nǝvanuan tomabule.” Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ, ikai ke, “Avan ideh tokad nǝdariŋan hǝn b̃esǝsǝloŋ, tesǝsǝloŋ m̃au!”
Ahai susur san gail lousi ke tikel namilen nǝb̃ol p̃usan enan.
Ike, “AGot idam̃ hǝni tia hǝn mǝtb̃elǝboi nǝsa tosusuah husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot, avil nusor mai alatevis tile am hǝn nǝb̃ol p̃usan hǝn ke, “‘naut kǝmas lǝb̃ekǝta, kǝta, lǝsakǝta lǝboi nǝsa aGot togole; naut kǝmas lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ, sǝsǝloŋ, lǝsasǝsǝloŋ lǝboi nǝsa aGot togole.’
“Namilen nǝb̃ol p̃usan imaiegai ke: Namisurhut gail evi nasoruan siGot.
Alat lototeh len nap̃isal losum̃an alat lotosǝsǝloŋ, beti natǝmat egǝm, lav kuv nasoruan dan nǝlolito hǝn asike lǝb̃ikad nadǝlomian, asike aGot b̃ilav kuv galit dan nǝsaan.
Alat lototeh len naut tobaŋ vat losum̃an alat lotolav nasoruan len nakemkeman nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, be nǝharhǝt salit gail lǝsakir sǝdaŋ. Nadǝlomian salit sabǝlav van vǝbar nǝboŋ nǝmauran totaltal kitev nadǝlomian salit ke timabe, ale nadǝlomian salit iteh.
Alat lototeh rivuh hǝn nǝhau tosǝsǝnot, losum̃an alat lotosǝsǝloŋ be len nǝmauran salit tovan, napulan hǝn natite, na-lǝŋon-isa-an mai nahǝhaṽuran, loruŋ gut gat galito gol ke lǝsatov vabǝbau hum lǝsǝmatmatu len nadǝlomian salito.
Avil namisurhuwit gail lototeh len nǝtan tokǝnoh, losum̃an alat lotokad nǝlolit tonor mai tovoi buni. Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan siGot, lunau gati, ale len nǝ-daŋ-b̃uri-an, luṽan hǝn naṽit nǝmauran tovoi.
“Avan ideh asike epigau nam̃ial hǝn b̃ikabut gole len nab̃iliwai o susuani pipimel. Aoa, eriŋi a mǝhat hǝn b̃em̃ial len narum̃ hǝn alat lotovi lohoim lǝb̃erisi.
Imaienan, natit p̃isi tosusuah, dereh tevisi p̃arp̃ar, natit p̃isi tokǝkol, dereh aGot tesǝŋav hǝni, tevǝhoti.
Imaienan, mǝtesǝsǝloŋ vahvahur nasoruan hǝn mǝtb̃elǝboii. Avan ideh tokad nalǝboian, dereh aGot teviol hǝni am maii, be avan ideh tomǝtahuhn b̃elǝboi nǝsa notokele, dereh aGot tilav kuv nalǝboian tonau ke tokade dani.”
Beti aṽan aYesu matmat gail mai anan logǝm hǝn lǝb̃erisi, be lodǝdas lǝb̃egǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝni husur naluṽoh.
Imaienan napisulan sua egǝm hǝni ke, “Aṽam̃ gail mai anam̃ saltoil vivile. Luke leris gaiug.”
Isor vari ke, “Alat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan siGot ale lotogol nǝsa tokele, galito lovi anagw mai aṽagw gail.”
Boŋ sua aYesu ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Datevi tarhǝte len nab̃iltiwai egai.” Ŋa lusah len nab̃ot, lugam van.
Nǝboŋ lotogamgam van, aYesu ipatmari. Beti nǝlan eṽuv idaŋ len nǝwai, nab̃ot epul, pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃emun.
Ale ahai susur gail lovǝŋon aYesu, luke, “Masta, Masta, dereh datimasig!” Ale aYesu ile mǝhat, isor idaŋ van hǝn nǝlan mai nǝwai topus; ale nǝlan evi pan, nǝwai etǝm̃at.
Eus galit ke, “Nadǝlomian samit gai be?” Len namǝtahwan salito lup̃aŋ lan, lousus galit gabag ke, “Ategai ase? Isor idaŋ van hǝn nǝlan mai nǝwai be gǝlaru arugol husur nǝsa tokele.”
Beti lugam kotov nab̃iltiwai dan naut a Kalili vǝbar naut silat a Kerasa.
Nǝboŋ aYesu tomariŋ vahut, auleKerasa sua, nanunun nǝmargobut gail lotob̃is lan, ebubur maii. Sutuai atenan sasun nahurabat, satoh len naim, be itoh len nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan gail.
Vǝha-sob̃sob̃ur tia nanunun nǝmargobut itah gati, naut kǝmas lotobaŋis gati hǝn natsen len narien mai navǝlan ale lokǝta kǝkol hǝni, ilav kotov natsen gail ale nanunun tosa ehuti vi lan naut tob̃ǝb̃esw. Nǝboŋ toris aYesu eis habat, iteh bathurien. AYesu ikele hǝn nanunun tosa ke timakuv dan naulum̃an. Ale ikai p̃erhado ke, “Gaiug savi hǝn gǝb̃emǝdas ginau, aYesu, aNatun aGot toyalyal buni! Noŋir gaiug, sagipansem ginau m̃ud!”
<range>
Ale aYesu eusi ke, “Nahǝsam̃ ase?” Isor vari ke, “Luṽoh,” husur nanunun nǝmargobut isob̃ur lob̃is lan.
Ale loŋirŋiri ke satesǝvat galit vi lan nab̃ur nǝpanisan sǝkad nabutite.
Ikad nab̃iltivǝshǝbuai lotosusu len naṽehuh ei. Ale nanunun tosa gail loŋiri ke tidam̃ hǝn galito lǝb̃eb̃is len nabuai gail. Idam̃ hǝni.
Nǝboŋ lotomakuv dan naulum̃an, lob̃is len nabuai gail, ale navǝshǝbuai lusarmar mariŋ len naṽehuh, luteh len nǝwai, lomun vǝmat.
Nǝboŋ alat lotokǝtkǝta tǝban nabuai gail lotoris nǝsa tovisi, lugam mǝtahw van vakel uri len nab̃iltivile mai naut p̃isi todar visi.
Ale nǝvanuan gail logǝm hǝn lǝb̃eris nǝsa tovisi. Nǝboŋ lotobar aYesu, lusab̃ naulum̃an, nanunun nǝmargobut lotomakuv dani, tobǝtah bathurien aYesu. Esun nahurabat tia, mai nǝnauan san ivoi, ale lomǝtahw.
Alat lotorisi lukel uri mai nǝvanuan gail, naṽide hǝn naulum̃an tomaur, natǝmat gail lotomakuv dani.
Imagenan alat a Kerasa p̃isi lous aYesu hǝn b̃ivan dan galit husur lopul hǝn namǝtahwan. Ŋa aYesu isah len nab̃ot hǝn b̃eriŋ naut enan.
Naulum̃an, nanunun nǝmargobut gail lotomakuv dani, eŋiri ke titah maii, be aYesu esǝvati van ke,
“Givahim hǝn gǝb̃ikel nǝsa aGot togole m̃os gaiug.” Ŋa atenan ivan, iyar tur len naut p̃isi len nab̃iltivile enan, ikel ur natit p̃isi aYesu togole m̃osi.
Nǝboŋ aYesu totǝlmam vi Kalili, naluṽoh lohǝhaṽur hǝn natǝlmaman san husur luvatvat viri.
Beti avan sua toil a m̃o hǝn naim nab̃onb̃onan, nahǝsan aJairus, egǝm, iteh bathurien aYesu, eŋiri ke tivahim maii.
Gai ikad natǝbarehreh tosua ŋai nǝdam̃ han tovi 12, be pǝpadaŋ timat. Nǝboŋ aYesu toyar maii van, len nǝyaran san naluṽoh lorihiti.
Galit sua, napǝhaṽut, nǝda han igam len nasihau tovi 12 avil avan ideh edǝdas b̃igol b̃imaur.
Iyar pǝpadaŋ a tahw hǝni ale ibar nagilen nahurabat san. Vǝha-sua ŋai nǝda han sǝgam am.
AYesu eus ke, “As tobar ginau?” Galit p̃isi luke savi galito. APita ike, “Masta, naluṽoh lorihit gaiug.”
Be aYesu ike, “Avan sua ibar ginau husur nolǝboii ke nǝdaŋan ivan dan ginau.”
Nǝboŋ napǝhaṽut tonau ke aYesu telǝboii, egǝm hǝni, ipab, iteh bathurien. Len nǝholito ikel maii ke hǝn nǝsa tobari mai nǝsa tovisi ke vǝha-sua ŋai imaur tǝtas.
Beti aYesu ikel mai alitenan ke, “Nadǝlomian sam̃ igol ke gumaur. Givan, nǝlom̃ tikad natǝm̃at.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tosor sal, avan sua egǝm len naim siJairus toil a m̃o hǝn naim nab̃onb̃onan, ike, “Anatvavim̃ imat ebun, sagemǝdas ahai p̃usan am.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, ikel mai aJairus ke, “Sagemǝtahw, riŋ nǝlom̃ len ginau ŋai, ale dereh timaur.”
Nǝboŋ tovi lohoim siJairus, sǝdam̃ hǝn avan ideh b̃eb̃is lohoim maii, be idam̃ hǝn aPita, aJemes, aJon, atǝman natǝbarehreh, mai anan, alatenan ŋai.
Len nǝboŋ enan ŋai nǝvanuan p̃isi lutaŋ vaisis hǝni. Ris aYesu toke, “Samtitaŋ, gai sǝmat, ipatmari ŋai.”
Luman sili husur lolǝboii ke imat tia.
Avil aYesu etǝgau nalohvǝlan ikai ke, “Anatugw, gile mǝhat!”
Ale nanunun etǝlmam, vǝha-sua ŋai ile mǝhat. Beti aYesu ikel mai alarmisoan ke arevǝŋani.
Anan mai atǝman arumaŋmaŋ avil aYesu ikel idaŋ mai gǝlaru ke saarikel nǝsa tovisi mai avan ideh.
Nǝboŋ aYesu tokis b̃onb̃on hǝn ahai pispisul san tovi 12, ilav mai galito na-il-a-m̃o-an mai nǝdaŋan hǝn lǝb̃ehut natǝmat p̃isi mai hǝn lǝb̃igol alat lotomǝsah lǝb̃imaur.
Ale esǝvat galito hǝn lǝb̃ikel ur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot mai hǝn lǝb̃igol nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃imaur.
Ikel mai galit ke, “Samtipat natideh hǝn nǝyaran samito. Samtipat nǝhai tǝbatehw, nǝhad sǝsǝŋon, nǝvat o nǝhai susun gǝgel.
Naim ideh mǝtb̃eb̃is lan, toh ei vǝbar nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eriŋ navile enan.
Nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃emǝtahun gamito, nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eriŋ navile enan, dardar hǝn nǝmasiav dan nariemito hǝn b̃imasil ke aGot sahǝhaṽur hǝn galito.”
Nǝboŋ tokǝmaienan tonoŋ lovivile, luyar husur navile ṽisusua. Len naut p̃isi lukel na-kel-uri-an tovoi ale lugol alat lotomǝsah lumaur.
Len nǝboŋ enan aHerot Antipas, tovi vanuan totibau, esǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan lotovisi. Edǝdarŋab̃u lan husur galevis luke aYesu tovi aJon tole mǝhat dan nǝmatan,
galevis luke tovi aElijah tovisi, mai galevis am luke tovi ahai kelkel ur ta sutuai sua tomaur tǝtas.
Be aHerot ike, “Nuta kotov nǝkadun aJon tia. Imaienan, ase ganan notosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan husuri?” Ale aHerot idoŋ nap̃isal hǝn b̃ebubur mai aYesu.
Nǝboŋ ahai pispisul gail lototǝlmam, lukel mai aYesu nǝsa lotogole. Beti esǝhar galit vi lan nab̃iltivile Petsaita hǝn lǝb̃itoh ei sǝb̃olito,
avil nǝboŋ naluṽoh lotosǝsǝloŋ lǝboii, lohusuri. AYesu ikel nahǝhaṽuran san mai galito, isor mai galit husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot, ale igol alat lotomǝsah lumaur.
Ut mǝdau, namityal pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃imasur, ahai pispisul lotovi 12 logǝm hǝni, luke, “Gesǝvat naluṽoh vi tut vi lan navile mai naut gail lotodar vis naut egai hǝn lǝb̃isab̃ nǝhanian mai naut nǝpatan, husur naut egai eb̃ǝb̃esw, ipat a tut.”
Ikel mai galit ke, “Gamit mitilav nǝhanian ideh mai galito!” Lusor vari ke, “Namtukad natuhbǝta erim mai naieh eru ŋai, Golǝŋon ke namtivan hǝn namtb̃eṽur nǝhanian m̃os naluṽoh p̃isi a.”
(Husur ke ikad naulum̃an tovi 5,000 ei.) Avil ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Mitigol ke lebǝtah hǝn b̃ikad naulum̃an len natuhluṽoh ṽisusua b̃evi 50.”
Ale ahai susur gail lugole, galit p̃isi lobǝtah.
AYesu ilav nabǝta erim mai naieh eru, ekǝta vi lan nǝmav hǝn b̃ike sipa, ale eb̃ur kotov gail. Beti ilav nahudhut gail mai ahai susur gail hǝn lǝb̃epǝpehuni mai nǝvanuan gail.
Nǝboŋ galit p̃isi lotohan vǝhanukub tonoŋ, ahai susur gail losǝŋon nǝhad tovi 12 hǝn nasughanian lǝsǝhani.
Len nǝboŋ sua, nǝboŋ aYesu mai ahai susur san gail lototoh sǝb̃olito, aYesu isor tuṽ. Nǝboŋ tosor tuṽ tonoŋ eus galit ke, “Naluṽoh gail, lukel ke ginau ase?”
Lusor vari ke, “Galevis luke aJon Baptais, galevis am luke aElijah, galevis tǝtas am luke ahai kelkel ur ta sutuai sua tomaur tǝtas.”
Ale eus ke, “Be gamito, mǝtukel ke ginau ase?” APita isor vari ke, “AKristo siGot, gai totabtabuh len gaiug.”
Ikai tas galito ke salikel mai avan ideh nǝsa aPita tomadhakele,
ike, “ANatun Nǝvanuan timaslǝŋon tisa vǝsa, alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail, ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo, limasmǝtahuni, mai gai timasmat, ale len nǝboŋ b̃itor dereh timakuv dan nǝmatan.”
Beti ikel mai galit p̃isi ke, “Avan ideh b̃elǝŋon ke b̃evi ahai susur sagw, satigol nǝsa b̃elǝŋoni be len nǝboŋ p̃isi timasputsan nǝhai balbal san, vusi ale husur ginau.
Bathut avan ideh toke b̃etǝgau gat nǝmauran san, dereh timasig be avan ideh nǝmauran san b̃imasig m̃os ginau, dereh aGot tigol timaur vi sutuai.
Avan ideh totǝgau gat natit p̃isi len navile a pan be nǝlon imasig o nǝmauran san vi sutuai eb̃uer, gai ikad nǝsa? Esǝhor nǝsa lan?
Avan ideh b̃emǝmau hǝn ginau mai nasoruan sagw, atenan, aNatun Nǝvanuan temǝmau hǝni balai nǝboŋ b̃egǝm len nǝyalyalan san mai nǝyalyalan seTǝman mai aŋel san gail.
Nokitin, galevis lotoil gegai, asike lumat vǝbar lǝb̃eris natohan pipihabǝlan aGot.”
Nǝmariboŋ tomǝlevtor husur aYesu tokǝmaienan, esǝhar aPita, aJon mai aJemes, ale lovi mǝhat len naṽehuh hǝn b̃isor mai aGot.
Nǝboŋ tosorsor mai aGot, nǝhon egǝm tile mai nahurabat san egǝm pǝhapǝhw buni hun nǝkabil.
Vǝha-sua ŋai naulum̃an eru, aMoses mai aElijah arovisi
len namǝnas nǝmav, aruhol mai aYesu. Lusor husur nǝsa aYesu b̃igole b̃isarpoh len naut a Jerusalem a tahw hǝn b̃eriŋ navile a pan.
APita galito lupatmari. Nǝboŋ lotolele, lokǝta ris namǝnas san mai naulum̃an eru artoil maii.
Nǝboŋ artosudǝlam̃ aYesu, aPita isor mai aYesu ke, “Masta, ivoi hǝn dattotoh gegai. Namteum hǝn nǝpasvalǝval titor: tesua esam̃, tesua siMoses mai tesua siElijah.” (APita salǝboi nǝsa tokele.)
Nǝboŋ tosor sal, nǝmavukasw egǝm kabut gol galito, ale nǝboŋ lotob̃is len nǝmavukasw, aPita galit lomǝtahw.
Nadoldol isor len nǝmavukasw ke, “Ategai evi aNatugw nototabtabuh lan; gai, mǝtesǝsǝloŋ husuri!”
Nǝboŋ nadoldol tosor tonoŋ, lusab̃i ke aYesu sǝb̃on ŋai itoh. Naut ido hǝn gǝlaru. Len nǝboŋ galenan lǝsasor husur nǝsa lotorisi mai avan ideh.
Pelan han, nǝboŋ lotomariŋ dan naṽehuh, nab̃iltiluṽoh lobubur mai aYesu.
Naulum̃an sua len galit ikai ke, “Hai p̃usan, noŋir gaiug ke geris anatugw ulum̃an husur nukad esua ŋai.
Nanunun sua itahtah gati, vǝha-sua ŋai igol ke ikai habat. Igol evinvinu, iteh taltaloŋ ŋa nabusun iyau, sǝvanvan dani be nǝboŋ tomakuv igol ke niben imap̃ulp̃ul habat.
Noŋir ahai susur sam̃ gail hǝn lǝb̃ehuti be lodǝdasi.”
AYesu ike, “Gamit mǝtsǝkad nadǝlomian, nǝmauran samit naur ta damǝŋai ikab̃kab̃ur masuṽ. Nitoh mai gamit tebǝlav mabe? Mǝtupar dǝlomian van van van nupetǝmas hǝni. Sǝhar anatum̃ gǝmai.”
Nǝboŋ natǝtai togǝm sal, natǝmat ibar hǝni len tan gol ke italtaloŋ. Be aYesu esivoh len nanunun tosa ke tevi tut, beti igol natǝtai imaur, ale eviol tǝlmam hǝni mai atǝman.
Galit p̃isi lup̃aŋ len nǝyalyalan, nǝdaŋan siGot. Nǝboŋ galit p̃isi lotop̃aŋ, lotosor husur natit p̃isi togole, aYesu ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke,
“Mǝtesǝsǝloŋ vahvahur nasoruan galegai: Avan sua dereh teriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan nǝvanuan gail.”
Avil lotǝtan hǝn nǝsa tokele, namilen esusuah hǝn ke lodǝdas lǝb̃elǝboii ale lomǝtahw, lomǝtahun lǝb̃eusi hǝni.
Ahai susur gail m̃au lotub̃at ṽitṽituh sil ke galit ta be iyalyal sǝhor galito.
AYesu elǝboi nǝnauan salito ale esǝhar natuhtǝtai, igol eil tǝban.
Ale ikel mai galito ke, “Avan ideh tohǝhaṽur hǝn natuhtǝtai sum̃an egai b̃itah maii len nahǝsagw, gai ehǝhaṽur hǝn ginau nǝb̃itah maii. Ale avan ideh tohǝhaṽur hǝn ginau nǝb̃itah maii, gai ehǝhaṽur hǝn atenan tosǝvat ginau. Husur ideh len gamito toriŋ gai a pan, gai m̃au etibau len nabunusian siGot.”
AJon isor vari ke, “Masta, namtoris avan sua tohut nanunun nǝmargobut gail len nahǝsam̃, ale namtuke satigole husur savi ginamit ideh.”
AYesu ike, “Samtikai tasi husur avan ideh samǝtahun gamito, gai evi tarhǝt samito.”
Nǝboŋ hǝn na-vi-mǝhat-an siYesu egǝm pǝpadaŋ ŋa len nǝboŋ enan ipair hǝn nǝhon vi Jerusalem.
Ale esǝvat ahai pispisul galevis luvan a m̃o. Len nǝyaran salito lob̃is len navile sua a Samaria hǝn lǝb̃eutaut viri;
be alat navile enan lomǝtahuni husur evi Jerusalem.
