Nǝboŋ ahai susur san gǝlaru, aJemes mai aJon artoris nǝsa tovisi, aruke, “Nasub̃, guke namtekis nǝhab len nǝmav hǝn b̃ihan bun galito?”
Be aYesu ipair, isor idaŋ, esivoh len gǝlaru ke arsanor,
ale lovi lan navile togon.
Nǝboŋ lotoyar husur nap̃isal, avan sua ikel maii ke, “Dereh nehusur gaiug naut p̃isi gǝb̃evi lan.”
Ale aYesu ikel maii ke, “Nafoks gail lukad nab̃ur patǝpat len tan, mai nǝman namǝsav gail lukad nǝhai ŋodŋod, be aNatun Nǝvanuan sǝkad naut ideh hǝn b̃ipat turuŋ lan, hǝn b̃iŋavŋav.”
Ale ikel mai nǝvanuan tile ke, “Gehusur ginau!” Avil ike, “Nasub̃, gidam̃ hǝn ginau nia tavun atǝmagw bai.”
Ris aYesu tosor vari ke, “Geriŋ alat lotomat litavun nǝvanuan salit gail lotomat, avil gaiug, gia kel ur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot.”
Nǝvanuan tile am ike, “Dereh nehusur gaiug, Nasub̃, be gidam̃ hǝn ginau nivahim hǝn nǝb̃esudǝlam̃ nǝbathudud sagw bai.”
AYesu isor vari ke, “Avan ideh totǝgau gat nǝhai tivtivtan be tokǝtkǝta tǝlmam, gai sanor kasi hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot.”
Husur nǝboŋ enan, aYesu itabtabuh len ahai susur tile am lotovi 72, ale esǝvat galito lorururu a m̃o hǝni van hǝn navile mai naut p̃isi ke pǝpadaŋ b̃evi lan.
Ikel mai galito ke, “Nǝhanian totov tomatu isob̃ur, be nǝvanuan nauman lovis ŋai. Imagenan, mǝteŋir aMasta hǝn nǝmatuan ke tesǝvat nǝvanuan nauman gail vi lan nǝmarireu nǝmatuan san.
Mitivan! Nosǝvat gamito mǝttosum̃an natuhsipsip gail rivuh len navǝshǝlipah katkat lotovi enemi gail.
Samtilav nǝpaus van, samtitariv nǝhad, samtitariv naributbut gail; ale samtikel na-ke-ivoi-an mai alat mǝtb̃ebubur mai galit metp̃isal.
Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eb̃is lohoim ideh, mitike, ‘Gamit lohoim egai, mitikad natǝm̃at len nǝlomito.’
B̃ikad nǝvanuan tolǝmas natǝm̃at ei, natǝm̃at mǝttokele tipat len nǝlon; b̃eb̃uer, dereh natǝm̃at tetǝlmam van hǝn gamito.
Mititoh len naim enan ŋai, mitihan, mǝtemun natideh lotolav mai gamito bathut inor hǝn nǝvanuan nauman tikad nap̃urp̃uran hǝn nauman san. Samtelul titau vi lan naim tiltile gail.
Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃evi lan navile ideh ale nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃ehǝhaṽur hǝn gamito, mitihan nǝsa lǝb̃eutaut hǝni m̃os gamito.
Mitigol alat lotomǝsah limaur ale kel mai galit ke, ‘Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot egǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝn gamito.’
Wake nǝboŋ mǝrb̃evi lan navile ideh ale lǝb̃emǝtahun gamito, mǝtevi lan nametp̃isal han gail ale mitike,
‘Namrudardar hǝn nǝmasiav hǝn navile samito dan narienamǝru, eṽusani ke aGot sahǝhaṽur hǝn gamito. Be mitimaslǝboii ke, natohan pipihabǝlan aGot egǝm pǝpadaŋ tia hǝn gamito.’
Nukel mai gamit ke, len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun nǝvanuan gail, nǝpanismen sinavile enan dereh tesǝhor nǝpanismen b̃ibar naut a Sotom.”
AYesu isor am husur naut gail lotomǝtahuni ke, “Dereh tisa vǝsa hǝn gaiug, naut a Korasin, ale gaiug am, naut a Petsaita, tisa vǝsa hǝn gaiug! Husur ke nǝtagol namerikel gail len naut a Tair mai a Siton hun notogole len gamǝru, alat naut eru enan lǝtǝpair dan nǝsaan salito, asike lǝtavǝlo, lǝtasun nahurabat toharharo, lǝtabǝtah len nǝmasiav mitihab.
Be husur mǝrsǝpair dan nǝsaan samǝru, len nǝboŋ siGot, aGot tipansem gamǝru sǝhor a Tair mai a Siton.
Gaiug am, naut a Kapernaum, gunau ke aGot tipatpat gaiug mǝhat vǝbar nǝmav a? Aoa! AGot dereh tilav gaiug vi pan vi lan naut nǝmatan.”
Beti aYesu ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Avan ideh tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn gamito, gai esǝsǝloŋ hǝn ginau am; avan ideh tomǝtahun gamito, gai emǝtahun ginau am; avil avan ideh tomǝtahun ginau, gai emǝtahun atenan tosǝvat ginau.” Ale ahai susur lotovi 72 luvan.
Nǝboŋ ahai susur lotovi 72 lototǝlmam, lohǝhaṽur ale luke, “Nasub̃, natǝmat gail am lugol husur nǝsa namttokele len nahǝsam̃.”
Isor var galit ke, “Noris aSetan toteh dan nǝmav hun nǝkabil.
Nulav nǝdaŋan tia mai gamito hǝn mǝtb̃ipal gat nǝm̃at mai naskopion gail mai hǝn mǝtb̃esǝhor aSetan mai esan gail; sǝkad natideh mǝtb̃esǝnah lan.
Imagenan samtehǝhaṽur husur nanunun nǝmargobut gail lotogol husur nǝsa mǝttokele, be mitikemkem husur aGot itos gat nahǝsamit tia len nǝmav.”
Beti aYesu, aNunun aGot togol topul hǝn nakemkeman, ike, “Nusal suh gaiug aTata gotovi Masta hǝn nǝmav mai navile a pan, husur gosusuan natgalenan dan alat lotokad nǝkadulito mai alat lotokad namitisau hǝn navile a pan, be gukel vǝhot gail mai alat lotovi ut kǝmas hum atuhlahutai. Evoi aTata, husur gohǝhaṽur hǝn tomaienan.”
AYesu isor tǝtas ke, “ATǝmagw ilav natit p̃isi mai ginau tia. Sǝkad avan ideh tolǝboii ke ase aNatun aGot, be aTata ŋai elǝboii. Ale sǝkad avan ideh tolǝboii ke ase aTata, be aNatun ŋai elǝboii. Ale gai ilekis hǝn nǝvanuan galevis hǝn b̃evǝhot p̃arp̃ar hǝn aTata mai galito hǝn lǝb̃elǝboii.”
Beti nǝboŋ lototoh sǝb̃olito, aYesu ipair van hǝn ahai susur san gail ike, “Navoian siGot igol ke alat lotoris nǝsa mǝttorisi, lukab hǝni.
Bathut nukel mai gamit ke ahai kelkel ur mai nakiŋ ta sutuai lotosob̃ur lolǝŋon ke lǝtaris nǝsa mǝttorisi be lǝsarisi, lolǝŋon ke lǝtasǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa mǝttosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, be lǝsasǝsǝloŋ hǝni.”
Len nǝboŋ sua avan sua tokad namitisau hǝn nalo ile mǝhat, ike aYesu tekǝkos len nasoruan san, ale eusi ke, “Hai p̃usan, nigol nǝsa hǝn nǝb̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai?”
AYesu eusi ke, “AMoses itos nǝsa len nalo? Goṽuruŋi ke ekǝmabe?”
Isor vari ke, “‘Gelǝmas bun Nasub̃ aGot sam̃ len nǝlom̃ kavkav, nanunum̃ kavkav, nǝdaŋan sam̃ kavkav mai nǝnauan sam̃ kavkav; len gaiug kavkav’; ale ‘Gelǝmas bun nǝvanuan totoh pǝpadaŋ hǝn gaiug sum̃an gotolǝmas bun gaiug gabag.’”
AYesu ike, “Gokitin. Gigole magenan ale dereh gikad nǝmauran vi sutuai.”
Avil ike tisor taltal gol gai gabag, ŋa eus aYesu ke, “Nǝvanuan totoh pǝpadaŋ hǝn ginau, ase lai?”
Len na-sor-vari-an san aYesu ib̃ol p̃usan ke, “Nǝboŋ aulum̃an sua tovi pan dan naut a Jerusalem vi Jeriko, nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah gail lom̃ur van hǝni, lukolkol nahurabat san dani, luṽasi, ṽasi, ṽasi van, ale loriŋi imatmatioṽ ei, luvan dani.
Ikade ke ahai tutumav sua ehusur nap̃isal enan, be nǝboŋ toris atenan, iyar tab tarhǝp̃isal dani.
Imagenan avan sua len nahǝmar aLevi am ehusur nap̃isal enan. Nǝboŋ tobar atenan erisi be iyar tab tarhǝp̃isal dani.
Avil len nǝyaran seuleSamaria sua, ibar naut atenan topat lan. Nǝboŋ torisi, nǝlon itaŋisi.
Ŋa ivan hǝni, eb̃ir naoil mai nǝwain len nǝmanuŋ san gail ale ilot gol gail. Eriŋ atenan len natoŋki san, sǝhari van hǝn nahotel sua ale kǝtkǝta tǝban ei.
Pelan han ilav kuv natenarius eru ale ilav nǝvat enan mai naulum̃an hǝn naim. Ike, ‘Kǝtkǝta tǝban vir natǝlmaman sagw ale dereh neṽur nǝkabut ideh san.’”
Ale aYesu eusi ke, “Len nǝnauan sam̃, len alat lototor, ase itoh pǝpadaŋ hǝn naulum̃an, nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah gail lotomǝdasi?”
Naulum̃an namitisau hǝn nalo isor vari ke, “Atenan tololosa, tovoi hǝni.” Beti aYesu ike, “Givan, gigol timagenan.”
Len nǝyaran salito aYesu evi lan navile sua, apǝhaṽut sua, nahǝsan aMarta totohtoh lan. Gai ike aYesu titoh lohoim san.
Ale aṽan, nahǝsan aMeri ebǝtah bathurien Nasub̃, esǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoran san.
Be aMarta inau masuṽ hǝn naliliuman san, ŋa egǝm tǝban aYesu, eusi ke, “Nasub̃, gumabe? Aṽagw ebǝtah kǝmas be ginau sǝb̃ogw, noum p̃is nauman. Kel maii tevi tarhǝt sagw.”
Avil Nasub̃ isor vari ke, “Marta, Marta, gunau masuṽ hǝn natit tosob̃ur togol nǝlom̃ totuhatuh hǝni;
be gupar tetesua. AMeri ilekis hǝn nǝsa tovoi am, ale asike nulav kuv naten tovoi dani.”
Boŋ sua aYesu isor tuṽ len naut sua. Nǝboŋ togole tonoŋ, sua len ahai susur san gail isor maii ke, “Nasub̃, ṽusan ginamit hǝn naṽide hǝn na-sor-tuṽ-an sum̃an aJon toṽusani hǝn ahai susur san gail.”
Ikel mai galit ke, “Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃isor mai aGot, mǝtekǝmaiegai ke: “‘ATǝmanamito, nahǝsam̃ tiyalyal tabtab, gegǝmai hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝb̃itoh pipihabǝlam̃.
Geviol mai ginamito hǝn nǝhanian hǝn nǝmariboŋ ṽisusua.
Gerub̃at nǝsaan sinamito, sum̃an namttorub̃at nǝsaan silat lotogole hǝn ginamito. Sagidam̃ hǝn natideh hǝn b̃italtal ke namtigol nǝsaan.’”
Beti ikel mai galit ke, “Gamit sua tǝkad nabubur san tagǝm hǝni tub̃loh len mariug ale ike, ‘Wawa, gidam̃ hǝn nabǝta titor mai ginau,
husur nabubur sagw, len nǝyaran san, egǝm tǝban ginau, ale nǝhanian eb̃uer hǝn nǝb̃ilav maii.’
Beti ta lohoim, togon tasor vari ke, ‘Sagigol tisa hǝn ginau. Nabopita ekǝkol hǝhaiv tia, ale anatugw gail namtupat tia. Nodǝdas hǝn nǝb̃ile mǝhat viol hǝn natideh mai gaiug.’
Nukel mai gamit ke, naut kǝmas asike ile mǝhat viol maii bathut tovi bubur san, dereh tile mǝhat, teviol hǝn nǝsa togon tolǝŋoni husur eus tabtab hǝni.
Ŋa nukel mai gamit ke, usi van, dereh aGot teviol hǝni mai gamito; doŋi van, dereh mitisab̃i; deldel van, dereh nabopita tesǝŋav m̃os gamito.
Husur nǝvanuan p̃isi lotousi, dereh likade; avan ideh todoŋi, dereh tisab̃i; ale avan ideh todeldel, dereh nabopita tesǝŋav m̃osi.
Gamit ideh tovi aTata, anatum̃ b̃eus naieh, gilav nǝm̃at maii a?
O anatum̃ b̃eus nǝdavurhuman, gilav naskopion maii a?
Naut kǝmas mǝttosa, gamit mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃ilav naviolan tovoi gail mai anatumit gail. Be aTata len nǝmav eviol sǝhor gamito; dereh teviol hǝn aNunun mai alat lotous gai!”
Len nǝboŋ sua aYesu ehut natǝmat tob̃utb̃ut. Nǝboŋ natǝmat tomakuv tonoŋ, naulum̃an tob̃utb̃ut a m̃o isor, ale naluṽoh lup̃aŋ lan.
Ale galit galevis luke ligol aYesu tisab, imaienan lousi hǝn namerikel hǝn nǝmav. Avil galevis am luke, “Gai ehut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan siPeelsepul, ab̃iltitǝmat setǝmat gail!”
<range>
AYesu elǝboi nǝnauan salito, ale isor mai galit ke, “Nǝkantri, nǝvanuan han gail lotob̃alkabaŋ, dereh timasirsir, teb̃ǝb̃esw. Mai nahǝmar tob̃alkabaŋ, dereh asike evi bathudud am.
ASetan tǝb̃al mai natǝmat san gail, dereh temǝdas nǝdaŋan san, nǝnauan enan imelmel masuṽ! Nokǝmaienan husur mǝtuke nohut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan siPeelsepul.
Ginau nǝtahut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan siPeelsepul, ahai susur samit gail lohut galit len nǝdaŋan sise? SiPeelsepul a? Imagenan ahai susur samit gail loṽusani ke mǝttosab.
Be nǝb̃ehut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan siGot, imagenan, natohan pipihabǝlan aGot ibar gamit tia.
“ASetan esum̃an naulum̃an todaŋ tokad natit hǝn nǝb̃alan, tokǝta kǝkol hǝn naim san, ale natit p̃isi san losuh ivoi.
Avil nǝboŋ avan sua todaŋ sǝhori tob̃al maii, ib̃al sǝhori, beti ikol nametǝlai nǝb̃alan san dan niben, ilav kuv natit hǝn nǝb̃alan gai todaŋ lan, ale epǝpehun natit p̃isi san.
Avan ideh satoh len nǝtarhǝt sagw, avan en evi enemi sagw; ale avan ideh sasǝsǝgov mai ginau len nǝmatuan, gai igol imap̃ip̃iriah; asike b̃esǝhar nǝvanuan gail van hǝn aGot, esǝhar nǝvanuan gail van vǝsab.”
AYesu isor tǝtas am ke, “Datusor husur nahutian hǝn natǝmat gail. Ale, nǝboŋ nanunun nǝmargobut tovan dan nǝvanuan ideh, nanunun nǝmargobut enan iyar turtur naut masmas gail hǝn b̃isab̃ naut ideh hǝn b̃iŋavŋav lan, be idoŋ sob̃uer hǝni. Beti natǝmat ikel mai gai gabag, ike, ‘Netǝlmam bai vi lan naim sagw notogam dani.’
Nǝboŋ tobar nǝvanuan gai tovan dani, nǝvanuan enan ehum naim tob̃ǝb̃esw, lotosir vahvahuri, tuan tǝlmam hǝn natit p̃isi tonor.
Beti ivan vasǝhar nanunun tomǝlevru lotosa masuṽ am sǝhor gai, ale nǝboŋ lotob̃is len nǝvanuan, lutoh tin ei. Ŋa nǝvanuan enan, nǝmauran san isa habat am sǝhor ta m̃o.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tokel natgalenan sal, apǝhaṽut sua len naluṽoh ikai van hǝni ke, “Anam̃, napǝhaṽut topas gaiug mai tovǝhasus hǝn gaiug, aGot igol ivoi hǝni!”
Avil aYesu ike, “Tarhǝt nǝsa gotokele, aGot igol ivoi am hǝn alat lotosǝsǝloŋ husur nasoruan san ale lotogole.”
Nǝboŋ naluṽoh pǝpadaŋ hǝn aYesu lotosob̃ur am, ike, “Naur ta damǝŋai lusa masuṽ. Lous namerikel be ginau asike nugol namerikel ideh be nǝsa tovisi hǝn aJonah ŋai.
Nǝsa tovisi hǝn aJonah eṽusan alat a Nineveh ke aGot tosǝvati. Imagenan, nǝsa b̃evisi hǝn aNatun Nǝvanuan, dereh teṽusan naur ta damǝŋai ke aGot tosǝvati.
Len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan, NaKwin hǝn naSaut dereh tile mǝhat kel kot nǝsaan sinaur ta damǝŋai, tike naur egai limaspanis. Dereh tigol timagenan husur egǝm len nǝtarhǝt navile a pan hǝn b̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn namitisau siSolomon hǝn nǝmauran tonor, be gagai, ikad natesua gegai toyalyal sǝhor aSolomon.
Len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan, alat a Nineveh dereh leil, kel kot nǝsaan sinaur ta damǝŋai, like naur egai limaspanis. Alat a Nineveh dereh ligol naten husur ke, nǝboŋ aJonah tokel ur napisulan siGot, galit lupair dan nǝsaan salito, be gagai ikad natesua gegai toyalyal habat sǝhor aJonah.
“Avan ideh, nǝboŋ topigau nam̃ial, sasusuani o sariŋi pipib̃iliwai, be eriŋi len nǝhai ririŋ mǝhat hǝn alat lotob̃is lohoim lǝb̃eris nam̃ial han.
Namǝtam̃ ehum nam̃ial tolav nam̃ial mai nibem̃. Nǝboŋ namǝtam̃ tovoi, nibem̃ kavkav epul hǝn nam̃ial. Be nǝboŋ tomǝsah, nibem̃ epul hǝn nǝmargobut.
Gigole ke nam̃ial len nǝlom̃ savi margobut.
B̃imaienan, nibem̃ kavkav b̃epul hǝn nam̃ial, sǝkad nahudhubem̃ tomotmot, dereh tepul hǝn nam̃ial hum nam̃ial nǝboŋ tom̃ias gaiug.”
Nǝboŋ nasoran en siYesu tomadhanoŋ, naFarisi sua eusi hǝn b̃ihan maii, ale aYesu eb̃is lohoim, ipat hǝn nǝtarhǝgarin tǝban natev, ihan.
Avil naFarisi esǝhoṽut husur aYesu sakǝkasǝval a tahw hǝn b̃ihan.
Beti Nasub̃ ikel maii ke, “Gamit naFarisi gail m̃au, mǝtokǝkas navivile hǝn nab̃iliwai mai nasiloh avil len nǝlomito mǝtopul hǝn na-lǝŋon-masuṽ-hǝn-natite-an, mai nǝsaan.
Mǝtumelmel! AGot toum hǝn navivile hǝn nǝvanuan, gai eum hǝn nǝlon am.
Be dan nǝsa topat len nǝlomito, viol mai alat lotom̃idol, imagenan natit p̃isi tiveveu len gamito.
“Be gamit naFarisi gail, nǝmauran samit tisa vǝsa batbat husur mǝtoviol mai aGot hǝn esua len tosǝŋavur hǝn namint, narue mai natuhluhai gail am dan nǝhol samito be mǝtsalǝŋon husur nanoran mai na-lǝmas-buni-an siGot. Mitimasgol eru enan be sa-nǝlomit tiboŋboŋ hǝn naviolan len tosǝŋavur.
Gamito naFarisi gail, nǝmauran samit tisa vǝsa batbat husur mǝtolǝŋon buni ke mǝtobǝtah a m̃o len naim nab̃onb̃onan, mǝtolǝŋon buni ke nǝvanuan len nǝmaket lukel na-ke-ivoi-an mai gamito.
Nǝmauran samit tisa vǝsa batbat husur mǝtosum̃an nab̃ur nǝmatan sǝkad nab̃urhes. Nǝvanuan gail luyar lan be lotǝtan hǝni ke tokad natit tob̃o butite.”
Avan sua tokad namitisau hǝn nalo ike, “Hai p̃usan, nǝboŋ gotokǝmaienan gusor viles ginamit am bolai.”
AYesu isor vari ke, “Gamit mǝttokad namitisau hǝn nalo, nǝmauran samit tisa vǝsa batbat. Husur mǝtoriŋ namǝlasan len nǝvanuan gail gol lodǝdas lǝb̃evusi, avil gamito mǝtsasusupah mai galito hǝn natideh sasua.
Nǝmauran samit tisa vǝsa batbat husur mǝtoum hǝn nab̃urhes topǝhas m̃os ahai kelkel ur gail ke mǝtsahusur galito, atǝmamit gail ta sutuai lotoparu bubun galito.
Imagenan mǝtugol ip̃arp̃ar ke mǝttodam̃ hǝn nǝsa atǝmamit ta sutuai lotogole; galit luparu bubun ahai kelkel ur gail, ale gamit mǝtoum hǝn nab̃urhes salit gail.
Bathut enan namitisau hǝn nǝmauran siGot ikele am ke, ‘Dereh nesǝvat ahai kelkel ur mai ahai pispisul gail van hǝn nǝvanuan gail. Dereh nǝvanuan gail liparu bun galevis ale lemǝdas bun galevis am.’
Husur enan aGot dereh teriŋ nǝmatan sihai kelkel ur p̃isi ta m̃o len natub̃atan hǝn navile a pan len naur ta damǝŋai.
Nǝmatan salit etub̃at len nǝda hiApel van vǝbar nǝda hiSekariah lotoparu buni rivuh hǝn nǝmel tutumavan mai naim siGot. Evoi, nukel mai gamito ke aGot tipansem naur ta damǝŋai sil nǝmatan galen p̃isi.
“Gamit mǝttokad namitisau hǝn nalo, nǝmauran samit tisa vǝsa batbat! Husur mǝtokǝkol gat nap̃isal hǝn nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃etǝtan hǝn aGot. Gamito mǝtsalǝboi aGot, ale mǝtomǝdas alat lotolǝŋon ke lelǝboii.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu toriŋ naut enan, naFarisi gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo lupair dani, lotub̃at hǝn lǝb̃isor tasi vǝsa, ale lotub̃at hǝn lǝb̃eusi nausian todaŋ gail.
Lusor utaut hǝn lǝb̃itah gati, luke ligol tekǝkos len nasoruan san.
Nǝboŋ naluṽoh lotogǝm b̃onb̃on, lusob̃ur masuṽ, loririhit palpal rielito, ale aYesu etub̃at hǝn b̃isor mai ahai susur san gail bai, ike, “Mǝtelǝlǝgau! NaFarisi gail lohum nayis, nap̃usanan salito iperŋan nǝvanuan p̃isi be galit gabag lǝsagol nǝsa lotokele.
Natit p̃isi nǝvanuan gail lotokabut gole, dereh aGot tevuhe. Natit p̃isi lotosusuani, dereh tevǝhoti.
Imaienan, nǝsa mǝttokele len nǝmargobut, dereh tegǝm len nam̃ial, ale nǝsa mǝttosor lahlah hǝni lohoim, dereh tevivile, nǝvanuan p̃isi lesǝsǝloŋ hǝni.
“Nabubur sagw gail, nukel mai gamit ke, samtemǝtahw len alat lotogol nibemit b̃imat. Nǝboŋ lotogole tonoŋ lodǝdas lǝb̃igol natideh am.
Avil dereh neṽusan gamito hǝn ase m̃au mǝtb̃emǝtahw lan: Mǝtemǝtahw len atenan togol nibemit b̃imat mai tokad nǝdaŋan hǝn b̃ibar hǝn gamito vi lan nǝhab nǝmatan. Nokitin, mǝtemǝtahw lan!
Mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃eṽur nǝsparo erim hǝn nǝvat tokǝkereh toru a? Be nǝlon aGot saboŋboŋ hǝn ideh.
AGot ep̃uruŋ gat nasivur ṽisusua len nǝkadumito. Samtemǝtahw, len nǝnauan siGot mǝtosǝhor masuṽ hǝn nǝsparo tosob̃ur.
“Nukel mai gamito, avan ideh tokel uri ke tovi esagw len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail, aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tikel uri ke tovi hai susur sagw kitin len nǝhon aŋel siGot gail.
Be avan ideh tokel uri ke savi esagw mai nǝvanuan gail, dereh nikel uri ke savi esagw len nǝhon aŋel siGot gail.
Avan ideh tosor tas aNatun Nǝvanuan, nǝsaan san dereh timarub̃at dani. Avil nǝvanuan tosor mǝdas aNunun aGot, aGot asike erub̃at nǝsaan enan dani.
“Nǝboŋ lǝb̃esǝhar gamito a m̃o hǝn nab̃onb̃onan o alat lotoil a m̃o o nǝvanuan totibau gail, samtinau masuṽ ke mitisor kitin mabe husur gamito o mitikel nǝsa,
bathut len nǝboŋ enan ŋai aNunun aGot dereh teṽusan gamito hǝn nǝsa m̃au mǝtb̃ikele.”
Beti sua len naluṽoh ikel mai aYesu ke, “Hai p̃usan, kel mai aṽagw ke tepǝpehun nasugurun atǝmanamǝr tomat mai ginau.”
Be aYesu ikel maii ke, “Tegai, ase itabtabuh len ginau hǝn nǝb̃isab̃ sǝhot nǝsa b̃inor hǝn gamǝru? Sǝpat len ginau.”
Beti ikel mai naluṽoh ke, “Mǝtelǝlǝgau! Kǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn gamito ke na-lǝŋon-tǝmǝhav-hǝni-an tiltile gail salibar gamito: husur nǝkadun nǝmauran sinǝvanuan sǝpat len natit tosob̃ur tokade.”
Ep̃usan, ib̃ol mai galit ke, “Ikad avan sua topul hǝn nǝvat, nǝtan san topul masuṽ hǝn nǝhanian,
ale gai sǝb̃on inau ke, ‘Nigol nǝsa? Nǝsǝkad naut ideh hǝn nǝb̃etuan nǝhanian hagw b̃esuh lan.’
Beti ike, ‘Nigol maieg hǝni. Dereh nitohtoh naim nǝhanian sagw gail ale neum hǝn ideh lǝb̃etibau am. Ale dereh netuan namisurhut gail, nǝhanian mai natit p̃isi sagw gail lan.
Ale dereh nisor gabag len ginau ke, “Gukad natit tovoi isob̃ur lǝb̃esuh tebǝlav, nasihau tisob̃ur. Giŋavŋav ŋai! Han, mun vahǝhaṽur.”’
Avil aGot ikel maii ke, ‘Gumelmel! Len mariug damǝŋai gimaslav tǝlmam hǝn nǝmauran sam̃! Ale ase tikad natgalenan gotoutaut hǝni m̃os gaiug?’
“Dereh timaienan hǝn avan ideh tosah tuan natite m̃os gai gabag, be sǝkad nǝsa aGot tolǝŋoni.”
Beti aYesu isor mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Nukel mai gamit ke, samtinau tuhatuh hǝn nǝmauran samito, nǝsa mǝtb̃ihani; samtinau masuṽ hǝn nibemito mai nǝsa mǝtb̃esuni.
Nǝmauran esǝhor nǝhanian, ale nibemito esǝhor nahurabat gail.
Mitinau nǝman sua, nareven: lǝsǝmabul natideh, lǝsǝlav kukuv nǝhanian, lǝsatuan nǝhanian sasuh lohoim, avil aGot evǝŋan galito. Mǝtosǝhor masuṽ hǝn nǝman gail!
Mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃igol nǝmauran samit tebǝlav am len nǝ-nau-masuṽ-hǝni-an samito a? Aoa, sǝmagenan!
Mǝtb̃edǝdas mǝtb̃igol natit tokǝkereh maienan, imab mǝtunau tuhatuh hǝn natit p̃isi am?
Mitinau napusihai mai naṽide hǝn natovan han. Saum, sasod nahurabat. Be nukel mai gamit ke napǝhasan hǝn napusihai enan esǝhor napǝhasan siSolomon len nahurabat bilbil san.
AGot b̃igol napusihai naliol b̃epǝhas maienan, naut kǝmas topus damǝŋai ale pelan topaŋ len naoven; a mǝhat hǝn natenan, tikol nahurabat gail len gamit tabtab. Wereh! Nadǝlomian samit ekǝkereh!
Gamito, samtinau tabtab hǝn nǝsa mǝtb̃ihani mai nǝsa mǝtb̃emuni, samtinau tuhatuh hǝni!
Samtehum naluṽoh hǝn nametb̃os len navile a pan lotoumum m̃os natgalenan. ATǝmamit len nǝmav elǝboii tia ke mǝtumaur len natgalenan.
Avil mǝtelǝŋon nǝsa aGot tolǝŋoni len natohan pipihabǝlan, ale dereh natgalenan am legǝm hǝn gamito.
“Samtemǝtahw, ahai susur sagw mǝttohum natuhvǝshǝsipsip. ATǝmamito ehǝhaṽur hǝn b̃eviol hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan mai gamito.
Mǝtb̃elǝŋon nǝsa aGot tolǝŋoni, ehum mǝttoum hǝn nǝpaus m̃os gamito len nǝmav hǝn asike emǝtartar be topul hǝn nakontit gail. Nakontit galenan, asike eb̃uer, nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah asike evǝnohi, nǝbarm̃om asike emǝdasi. Bathut ke, naut nakontit sam̃ gail lotopat lan, dereh nǝlom̃ tu tipat tabtab lan. Imaienan mǝtep̃ur hǝn natit samit gail, ale viol hǝn nǝvat han mai namǝsal gail.”
<range>
AYesu isor am ke, “Mǝtesun nahurabat, utaut vir nauman, gol nam̃ial samit tipaŋ tabtab.
Mǝtesum̃an nǝvanuan nauman gail lototoh vir amasta salito b̃etǝlmam dan nǝhanan hǝn nǝlahan. Beti nǝboŋ b̃etǝlmam, b̃ideldel, vǝha-sua ŋai lesǝŋav hǝn nabopita m̃os gai.
Navoian tipat len slev gail nǝboŋ amasta b̃etǝlmam, b̃eris lǝboii ke lotolele, lotoutaut viri. Nokitin, gai tesun nahurabat nauman, ale tikel mai galit ke lebǝtah garu len natev, ale dereh tepǝpehun nǝhanian van hǝn galito.
Navoian tivan hǝn naslev gail lǝb̃eutaut hǝn nagǝmaian simasta salito naut kǝmas b̃egǝm tub̃loh len mariug o nǝboŋ nǝman b̃ekǝkǝraiko.”
Ale aYesu ike, “Be mitinau nategai ke: amahean naim talǝboi namityal nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah tagǝmai, tautaut hǝn atenan asike tab̃ur naim vi lohoim.
Gamit am, mitimasutaut, husur aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tegǝm len namityal mǝtsǝvatvat viri.”
Beti aPita eusi ke, “Nasub̃, nǝb̃ol p̃usan enan, gukele mai ginamit ŋai o mai nǝvanuan p̃isi am?”
Nasub̃ isor vari maiegai ke, “Ase evi nǝvanuan nauman tokad nǝkadun mai namitisau hǝn na-il-a-m̃o-an amasta san toriŋi ke teil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan nauman p̃isi, toke tepǝpehun nǝhanian halito len namityal nǝhanan?
Amasta b̃ivahim, b̃isab̃ naslev enan togol nauman san, aslev enan dereh tehǝhaṽur habat.
Nokitin ke, amasta dereh titabtabuh len naslev enan hǝn b̃ekǝtkǝta tǝban natit p̃isi san.
Avil naslev en b̃ikel mai gai gabag ke, ‘Amasta sagw evǝlo hǝn b̃egǝmai,’ ale b̃etub̃at ṽas alalum̃an mai alatpǝhaṽut nauman, b̃ihan, b̃emun vatǝrog, gai timabe?
Amasta san dereh tetǝlmam len nǝmariboŋ naslev enan sǝvatvat viri, mai namityal naslev salǝboii. Amasta tita kotovi ale riŋi mai alat lǝsǝkad nadǝlomian.
Naslev tolǝboi nalǝŋonian simasta san be sautaut, mai sagol husur nǝsa tokele, dereh amasta tiṽas masuṽ hǝni.
Be naslev salǝboi nalǝŋonian simasta san ale sagol nǝsa tolǝŋoni, dereh amasta tiṽasi be savi vǝha-sob̃sob̃ur. Avan ideh aGot tolav tosob̃ur maii, aGot ike tilav tǝlmam hǝn tisob̃ur. Mai avan ideh aGot toriŋ tosob̃ur len navǝlan, aGot ike tilav tǝlmam hǝn tisob̃ur am tǝban.
“Ginau nogǝm hǝn nǝb̃epǝŋas navile a pan; nolǝŋon buni ke tatub̃at paŋ ma tia.
Ikad nǝbaptaisan hǝn nǝb̃ibaptais lan; ale nolǝŋon isa masuṽ vir nanoŋan han.
Mǝtunau ke notogǝm hǝn nǝb̃ilav natǝm̃at gǝm vi lan navile a pan? Ao! Nukel mai gamito, nulav napǝpehwan.
Damǝŋ van tikad erim len nǝbathudud lǝb̃epǝpehw dan galit gabag, eru arib̃al mai itor, itor lib̃al mai eru.
Bathut len ginau, alatmitǝman lepǝpehw, atǝman tib̃al mai anatun ulum̃an, anatun ulum̃an tib̃al mai atǝman; anan tib̃al mai anatvavin, anatvavin tib̃al mai anan; avilah tib̃al mai avuŋon pǝhaṽut, avuŋon pǝhaṽut tib̃al mai avilah san.”
Isor tǝtas mai naluṽoh ke, “Nǝboŋ mǝttoris nǝmarigw topit vi mǝhat len nawes, vǝha-sua ŋai mǝtuke, ‘Dereh teus,’ ale imaienan.
Mai nǝboŋ nǝlan toṽuv len nasaut mǝtuke, ‘Dereh naut tepud,’ ale imaienan.
Vanuan nagǝgǝrasan gail! Mǝtokǝta lǝboi nǝtan mai nǝmav ke dereh naut timabe, imabe mǝtodǝdas mǝtb̃ekǝta lǝboi nǝsa tovisi gagai?
“Imabe mǝtodǝdas mǝtb̃elǝboi nǝsa tonor?
Nǝboŋ gotovi lan nakotan mai atenan tosor tas gaiug, len nap̃isal len nǝyaran samǝru gehisi ke mirikad natǝm̃at tǝtas. Asike gǝb̃igole, dereh teliv gargar gaiug vi lan nǝmatsistret, ale nǝmatsistret teriŋ gaiug len navǝlan nalipah, ale nalipah tibar hǝn gaiug len naim bǝbaŋis.
Nukel mai gaiug ke, asike govivile dani vǝbar gǝb̃eṽur p̃is nǝvat hǝn nǝpain nǝmatsistret toriŋi. Len naṽide tomaienan, gimasgol natǝm̃at mai aGot tutut, hǝn asike gǝb̃ipanis.”
Ikad alatevis len nǝboŋ enan lotosor mai aYesu husur auleKalili galevis, aPilate tota bun galito, b̃on hǝn nǝda halito mai nǝda hǝn naviolan lototutumav hǝni.
AYesu isor var galit ke, “Mǝtunau ke alaten a Kalili lusa sǝhor alat a Kalili p̃isi husur nǝmatan salit isa maienan?
Ao, nukel mai gamit ke, asike mǝtb̃ipair dan nǝsaan samito, dereh mitimat hum galito.
Mǝtunau alat lotovi 18 lotomat nǝboŋ naim tosahsah vi mǝhat a Siloam toteh len galito? Mǝtunau ke lusa sǝhor galit p̃isi am lotosuh a Jerusalem a?
Aoa, nukel mai gamit ke, asike mǝtb̃ipair dan nǝsaan samito, gamit p̃isi dereh mitimat maienan.”
Beti aYesu ep̃usan, ib̃ol ke, “Avan sua ikad nǝhai nafik tovutani tia len nǝhol nakrep san, ale ivan vǝdas ṽite lan sob̃uer.
Ŋa ikel mai naulum̃an tokǝtkǝta tǝban nǝhol ke, ‘Geris! Husur nasihau itor tia nogǝm das sob̃uer hǝn naṽit nafik len nǝhai egai. Ta b̃uri! Itov kǝmas, mabe?’
Isor vari ke, ‘Nasub̃, riŋi tipat vir nasihau tesual am. Dereh nekir garu lan beti riŋ natib̃uluk lan.
Ale b̃iṽan len nasihau b̃egǝmai, ivoi; be asike b̃iṽan, ta b̃uri!’”
Len nǝSappat sua aYesu ep̃usan len naim nab̃onb̃onan sua.
Ikad abareab sual ei, nanunun tosa sua togol niben isa hǝn nasihau tovi 18. Ale etǝmadehw masuṽ, gai edǝdas b̃eil b̃inor.
Nǝboŋ aYesu torisi, ekisi gǝmai ale ike, “Bareab, gumadhamakuv dan namǝsahan sam̃.”
Ale eriŋ navǝlan gǝlaru lan. Vǝha-sua ŋai eil inor tǝlmam ale isor sal suh nǝyalyalan siGot van.
Naulum̃an toil a m̃o len naim nab̃onb̃onan, nǝlon ipaŋpaŋ husur aYesu ilav kuv namǝsahan len nǝSappat, ale ikel mai naluṽoh ke, “Ikad nǝmariboŋ nauman tomǝlevtes. Ŋa mǝtegǝm hǝn mǝtb̃imaur len nǝmariboŋ galenan, samtegǝm len nǝSappat!”
Ris Nasub̃ tosor vari ke, “Mǝtovi vanuan gǝgǝras! Gamit p̃isi mǝtsǝsah rub̃at nab̃uluk o natoŋki len nǝSappat ale mǝtsasǝhari vivile hǝn b̃emun a?
Be napǝhaṽut egai, tovi anatvavin aApraham, aSetan tobaŋis gati nasihau tovi 18, sanor hǝn b̃imakuv dan nǝbaŋisian len nǝSappat a?”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan, galit p̃isi lotosor tasi, nahurulit isa habat, be naluṽoh kavkav lohǝhaṽur len natit tovoi buni gai togol gail.
Beti aYesu ike, “Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot imabe? Ehun nǝsa? Nekǝmabe?
Ehun namisurhumastat avan sua tobar hǝni len nǝhol san, ale itov, egǝm etibau hun nǝhai, ale nǝman namǝsav gail loum hǝn nǝhai ŋodŋod len nǝpashǝte.”
Beti isor am ke, “Nike natohan pipihabǝlan aGot ehun nǝsa?
Ehun nayis, napǝhaṽut sua tolavi, tob̃undasi len nǝhad nǝflaua totor van vǝbar nǝflaua p̃isi totob.”
Beti aYesu iyar tur nab̃iltivile mai navile gail, ep̃usan ale iyar vi Jerusalem.
Ale avan sua eusi ke, “Nasub̃, dereh nǝvanuan levis ŋai limakuv dan nǝpanismen siGot a? Sasob̃ur a?” Ale ikel mai galit ke,
“Hisi hǝn mǝtb̃eb̃isutur bopita tomagugun; husur nukel mai gamit ke tisob̃ur luke leb̃is lan be lodǝdasi.
Nǝboŋ amahean naim tole mǝhat, ale tokǝkol gat nabopita, dereh mǝteil vivile. Mǝtetub̃at deldel len nabopita, mitike, ‘Nasub̃, sǝŋav hǝn nabopita hǝn ginamito.’ Ale gai tisor var gamit ke, ‘Nǝsalǝboi kas gamito. Naut samit a be?’
Beti mǝtetub̃at sor ke, ‘Namtuhan mai gaiug. Gaiug gop̃usan len nap̃isal sinamit gail.’
Avil tike, ‘Nukel mai gamito, nǝsalǝboi kas gamito, gamit alat a be? Mǝtevi tut, gamit mǝttogolgol nǝsaan!’
Dereh gamit mititaŋ, mitidesdes batriṽoriṽ len nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris aApraham, aIsak mai aJakop mai ahai kelkel ur p̃isi len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot be gamit sǝb̃omito, aGot tibar hǝn gamito vivile.
Nǝvanuan gail dereh legǝm len nais mai nawes mai nanot mai nasaut, legǝm len naut p̃isi ale lihan len nab̃iltihanan len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot.
Ale mǝteris! Ikad nǝvanuan kǝmas lǝb̃egǝm vi vanuan totibau gail, ale ikad nǝvanuan totibau gail lǝb̃egǝm vi ut kǝmas.”
Len nǝboŋ enan naFarisi galevis logǝm hǝni, lukel maii ke, “Geriŋ naut egai, gam yav dani husur aHerot Antipas ike tigol gimat.”
Ale ikel mai galit ke, “Mitia kel mai nafoks enan ke, ‘Damǝŋai mai pelan dereh nehut natǝmat gail sal mai nigol sal nǝvanuan limaur, ale hois nesib.’
Naut kǝmas, len nap̃isal sagw nimasvan damǝŋai, pelan mai hois, bathut ke len naut a Jerusalem ŋai ahai kelkel ur p̃isi lolǝboi lǝb̃imat.
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, gaiug gugolgol ahai kelkel ur gail lumat, gotububun alat aGot tosul galit van hǝn gaiug. Len nǝboŋ isob̃ur tia nuke nihavhav hǝn alahutai sam̃ hun natopǝhaṽut tohavhav hǝn natuhman san gail pipihabǝlan, be gomǝtahuni.
Mǝteris, naut a im samit eb̃ǝb̃esw. Nukel mai gamit ke asike mǝtoris ginau am vir mǝtb̃ike, ‘AGot tigol navoian van hǝn ategai togǝm len nahǝsan Nasub̃ aGot.’”
Len nǝSappat sua, nǝboŋ aYesu tob̃is lohoim sinǝvanuan sua toil a m̃o hǝn naFarisi gail, hǝn b̃ihan, lokǝta mǝtani.
Ale len nǝhon aYesu ŋai ikad naulum̃an narien mai navǝlan gǝlaru lototob.
AYesu eus alat lotokad namitisau hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail ke, “Inor hǝn nǝvanuan b̃igol avan ideh b̃imaur len nǝSappat a?”
Be naut eb̃ut, lǝsasor. Ŋa aYesu etǝgau atenan gol ke imaur ale esǝvati van.
Beti eus galit ke, “Gamit ideh b̃ikad anatun o nab̃uluk toteh len nab̃urhuwai, asike goliv kuv tutut hǝni, naut kǝmas tovi nǝSappat a?”
Ale lodǝdas lǝb̃isor var natgalen tokele.
Nǝboŋ aYesu tobunus ke alat lotogǝm hǝn nǝhanan lotolekis hǝn naut tovoi rivuh, ib̃ol, ep̃usan magegai ke:
“Nǝboŋ avan ideh b̃eus gaiug hǝn gǝb̃egǝm hǝn nǝlahan ideh, sagilekis hǝn naut tovoi rivuh. Husur nǝvanuan totibau hǝn nǝlahan b̃eus avan ideh totibau tosǝhor gaiug,
dereh gai b̃egǝm hǝn gaiug tike, ‘Gilav namilem̃ mai ategai.’ Ale dereh nahurum̃ tisa, gimasbǝtah vi tut.
Be nǝboŋ avan ideh b̃eus gaiug hǝn gǝb̃egǝm hǝn nǝhanan, lav naut ideh a tahw. Imagenan nǝvanuan totibau hǝn nǝhanan, hum ma b̃egǝm sor mai gaiug hǝn b̃ike, ‘Tegai, gaiug gevi rivuh hǝn gǝb̃ebǝtah b̃ivoi.’ Ale len nǝhon nǝvanuan p̃isi lotohan mai gaiug, dereh getibau.
Husur avan ideh b̃ipatpat gai mǝhat, dereh tegǝm vi ut kǝmas, be ideh b̃igol gai gabag b̃evi ut kǝmas, dereh aGot teputsani.”
Beti aYesu isor mai atenan tousi hǝn b̃ihan ke, “Nǝboŋ gǝb̃ikad nǝhanan tub̃lial o ut mǝdau, sageus nabubur sam̃ gail, aṽam̃ gail, amaheam̃ gail o alat lotosuh pǝpadaŋ lotopul hǝn natite. Gǝb̃igole maienan, dereh leus tǝlmam hǝn gaiug ale enan tevi nǝ-sar-gele-an sam̃ tegǝm hǝn gaiug.
Be nǝboŋ gǝb̃eutaut hǝn nǝhanan, us namǝsal gail, alat nahudhubelit sanor, alat narielit togau mai ametb̃esw gail;
ale aGot tigol navoian van hǝn gaiug. Naut kǝmas lodǝdas lǝb̃isar gel gaiug, dereh nǝ-sar-gele-an tegǝm hǝn gaiug len nǝboŋ alat lotonor lǝb̃ile mǝhat dan nǝmatan.”
Nǝboŋ galit sua, tohan maii, tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, isor mai aYesu ke, “Avan ideh b̃ihan len nab̃iltihanan topat len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot, navoian siGot igol ikab hǝni!”
AYesu ikel maii ke, “Avan sua eutaut hǝn nab̃iltihanan ale eus isob̃ur.
Len namityal hǝn nǝhanan esul naslev san hǝn b̃ikel mai alat tous galit ke, ‘Mǝtegǝmai, husur natit p̃isi eutaut tia.’
Be loŋit nǝholito, logǝrasi maiegai: Esua ike, ‘Ereh! Numadhaṽur nǝtan sua ale nimasvan hǝn nǝb̃erisi.’
Sual am ike, ‘Ereh! Numadhaṽur nab̃uluk tosǝŋavur lotoum ṽiruaru ale nimasvan hǝn nǝb̃eum risi lan gail.’
Sua tǝtas am ike, ‘Ereh! Numadhalah ŋai, ŋa nodǝdas nǝb̃egǝmai.’
Ŋa naslev etǝlmam, ikel ur nǝsa lotokele mai amasta san. Beti amahean naim nǝlon ipaŋpaŋ habat ale ikel mai atenan ke, ‘Giŋad tutut vi lan nab̃iltip̃isal mai nap̃isal gail len nab̃iltivile, ale sǝhar namǝsal gail gǝmai, mai alat nahudhubelit sanor, ametb̃esw gail mai alat narielit togau.’
Sǝdareh naslev ike, ‘Nasub̃, nǝsa gotokele, nugol p̃isi, be naut kǝmas alaten lotosob̃ur, nǝhanian isob̃ur ipat sal.’
Beti amahean naim isor vari ke, ‘Gevi lan nap̃isal, husur napisbihol gail, taltal hǝn nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃egǝm vi lan naim sagw hǝn b̃epul.
Husur nukel mai gaiug, galit ideh notous galit a m̃o, asike luhan ris nǝhanian len nǝhanan sagw.’”
Nab̃iltiluṽoh luyar mai aYesu, ale ipair van hǝn galito, ike,
“Avan ideh b̃egǝm hǝn ginau b̃elǝmas masuṽ hǝn ginau sǝhor nǝbathudud san sum̃an tomǝtahun bun atǝman mai anan, asoan mai anatun gail, aṽan mai aṽavinen gail, o nǝmauran san am, ale elǝboi b̃evi ahai susur sagw.
Avan ideh asike b̃ipat nǝhai balbal san ale husur ginau, gai edǝdas b̃evi ahai susur sagw.
Husur gamit ideh b̃ike b̃eum hǝn naim sahsah vi mǝhat; gai tebǝtah bai hǝn b̃ep̃uruŋ tuan nǝvat hǝn b̃elǝboii ke ihau hǝn naim b̃ihav m̃au a?
Asike b̃imaienan, tehir nǝpaudesen san be edǝdas b̃eum p̃isi, ale dereh nǝvanuan p̃isi lotorisi, letub̃at sor vilesi, ke,
‘Geris atenan. Etub̃at um hǝn naim be edǝdas b̃eum p̃isi.’
O nakiŋ ta be ia gol nǝb̃alan mai nakiŋ togon be sabǝtah hǝn b̃ebunusi bai ke, nasoltia tovi 10,000 san elǝboi b̃ib̃al sǝhor togon tokad 20,000 togǝm hǝn b̃ib̃al maii m̃au a?
B̃inau ke edǝdas b̃ib̃al sǝhori, esul avan sua san tosor m̃osi mai nakiŋ togon nǝboŋ totoh a tut sal, hǝn b̃eusi ke, ‘Nǝb̃alan tinoŋ mabe?’
Imagenan, gamit ideh asike b̃eriŋ gab̃ulan natit p̃isi san, gai edǝdas b̃evi ahai susur sagw.
“Nǝtas ivoi len nǝhanian, be nabus hǝn nǝtas b̃imasig hǝn b̃edub̃e, tegǝm vi tas tǝtas am mabe?
Nǝtas enan sanor hǝn b̃igol nǝtan b̃ivoi, sanor hǝn b̃igol natib̃uluk len naut sogsog b̃ivoi hǝn nǝtan, nǝvanuan p̃isi lubar hǝni ŋai. Avan ideh tokad nǝdariŋan hǝn b̃esǝsǝloŋ, tesǝsǝloŋ buni.”
Boŋ sua nǝvanuan nǝtaks gail mai alat nǝsaan logǝm tǝban aYesu hǝn lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝni.
Ale naFarisi gail mai ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo loŋit nǝholito, lusor mǝtmǝtan hǝni ke, “Atenan ehǝhaṽur hǝn alat nǝsaan, ale ihan tu mai galito.”
Imagenan ikel nǝb̃ol p̃usan egai mai galito, ike,
“Gamit ideh b̃ikad nasipsip tovi 100 ale esua b̃imasig, timabe? Dereh teriŋ lotovi 99 len nǝmarireu ale tidoŋ tosua tomasig van vǝsab̃i.
Nǝboŋ tosab̃i tonoŋ, eriŋi len nǝbathuvǝson, ikemkem.
Ale nǝboŋ tovahim, ekis nabubur san gail mai alat lotosuh pǝpadaŋ, logǝm b̃onb̃on. Ike, ‘Mǝtehǝhaṽur mai ginau husur nusab̃ nasipsip sagw tomasig!’
Nukel mai gamit ke, imagenan, len nǝmav dereh tikad nakemkeman tǝban avan ideh topair dan nǝsaan van hǝn aGot b̃esǝhor nakemkeman tǝban alat lotovi 99 lotonor, o lotonau ke lotonor, ke nǝpairan dan nǝsaan sanor hǝn galito.”
Ale aYesu isor am ke, “Napǝhaṽut ideh, b̃ikad nakoin lotovi silva tosǝŋavur ale esua imasig, gai timabe? Dereh tepigau nam̃ial, tesisir lohoim, ale doŋ vahvahuri van vǝsab̃i.
Ale nǝboŋ tosab̃i ekis nabubur san gail mai alat lotosuh pǝpadaŋ, legǝm b̃onb̃on. Ike, ‘Mǝtehǝhaṽur mai ginau husur nusab̃ nǝvat sagw tomasig.’
Imagenan, nukel mai gamit ke, aGot mai aŋel san gail lukemkem nǝboŋ nǝvanuan nǝsaan ideh topair dan nǝsaan san.”
Ale aYesu isor tǝtas ke, “Ikad naulum̃an sua tokad anatun ulum̃an eru.
Ahai a tahw ikel mai atǝman ke, ‘Tata, nahudhutite b̃evi esagw nǝboŋ gǝb̃imat, gilavi mai ginau gagai.’ Ale gai epǝpehun natit p̃isi mai anatun gǝlaru.
Sǝdareh ahai a tahw elul hǝn natit p̃isi san, ivan iyar vi lan nǝkantri a tut. Ale len naut enan emǝdas nǝvat san len nǝmauran tosa.
Nǝboŋ nǝvat p̃isi san tohav, ikad nǝboŋ nǝhanian tob̃uer len nǝkantri enan kavkav, ale atenan etub̃at par hanian.
Ŋa ia tah mai nǝvanuan sua len nǝkantri enan tosǝvati vi lan nǝmarireu san gail hǝn b̃evǝŋan nabuai gail.
Nǝmal ihat atenan van ike tihanukub hǝn nab̃ilit naṽit nǝhai tovǝŋan nabuai hǝni, be avan ideh sǝlav natideh maii.
Nǝboŋ nǝnauan san tovan vǝmasil, ike, ‘Numabe? Alat lotoum setǝmagw lukad nǝhanian isob̃ur mai hudhuhanian tosuh, be gegai ginau numat hǝn nǝmalkǝkatan!
Dereh nile mǝhat, nivan hǝn atata sagw ale nikel maii ke, “Tata, nugol nǝsaan vi tǝban aGot len nǝmav mai nugol nǝsaan vi tǝban gaiug,
sanor hǝn gǝb̃ike anatum̃ hǝn ginau am. Gol ke nehum nǝvanuan nauman sam̃ ŋai.”’
Ale nǝboŋ tole mǝhat tonoŋ, ivan hǝn atǝman. Be nǝboŋ toyaryar a tut sal, atǝman eris lǝboii, nǝlon itaŋisi ale igam van hǝni, elugum̃ gati, esum̃ nǝtarhon.
“Beti anatun isor maii ke, ‘Tata, nugol nǝsaan vi tǝban aGot len nǝmav mai nugol nǝsaan vi tǝban gaiug. Sanor kasi hǝn gǝb̃ike anatum̃ hǝn ginau am.’
Be atǝman ikel mai naslev san gail ke, ‘Mǝtetutut, lav nahurabat tovoi buni gǝmai, ale kole lan. Siriv hǝn nariŋ len nǝŋarhuvǝlan, kol naributbut len narien gǝlaru.
Liv natuhb̃uluk tokǝnoh gǝmai, tibuni, utaut hǝni, ale datihan, datehǝhaṽur,
husur anatugw egai imat tia be imaur tǝtas am, imasig tia be evisi am.’ Ale lotub̃at hǝn nahǝhaṽuran.
“Len nǝboŋ enan ahai a m̃o itoh marireu. Nǝboŋ togǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝn naim, esǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝwalan hǝn navus beltaŋ mai nǝsavan,
ŋa ekis naslev sua, ale eusi nǝsa tovisi a im.
Ale isor vari ke, ‘Aṽam̃ etǝlmam, ale atǝmam̃ etibun natuhb̃uluk tokǝnoh husur aṽam̃ imaur, etǝlmam.’
Ahai a m̃o, nǝlon ipaŋpaŋ, emǝtahun b̃eb̃is lohoim ale atǝman evivile, isor ṽǝhṽǝhi.
Beti isor var atǝman ke, ‘Geris! Len nasihau isob̃ur noum sam̃, ale sǝkad nǝboŋ ideh notopair dan nǝsa gotokele. Be sǝkad nǝboŋ ideh gotolav natuhnani mai ginau hǝn nǝb̃ikad nahǝhaṽuran mai nabubur sagw gail.
Avil nǝboŋ anatum̃ togǝmai, aten boh tohan p̃is natit p̃isi sam̃ len alatpǝhaṽut lotop̃ur hǝn nibelito, gotibun natuhb̃uluk tokǝnoh m̃osi!’
Beti isor malum̃lum̃ ke, ‘Anatugw, gaiug gutoh akis mai ginau, natit p̃isi sagw evi esam̃.
Datimasgol nahǝhaṽuran, datimaskemkem bathut aṽam̃ enan imat be gagai imaur, imasig be gagai evisi.’”
Beti aYesu isor tǝtas mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Ikad naulum̃an sua topul hǝn natit isob̃ur tokad nab̃iltivanuan nauman tokǝtkǝta tǝban natit p̃isi san. Amahean enan esǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-kel-uri-an ke nǝvanuan nauman san emǝdas natit san gail.
Ale ekisi gǝmai, beti eusi ke, ‘Nǝsaganan notosǝsǝloŋ hǝni len gaiug? Gikel ur nǝsa gotogole len nauman sam̃ hǝn natit p̃isi sagw, husur nauman enan sam̃ hǝn na-kǝtkǝta-tǝban-an esib.’
Nab̃iltivanuan nauman isor len gai gabag ke, ‘Nimabe? Husur amasta sagw ibar hǝn ginau dan nauman sagw. Nǝsǝdaŋ hǝn nakiran; nahurugw isa hǝn nǝb̃eŋir nǝvanuan hǝn nǝvat.
Ganan! Nolǝboi nǝsa nǝb̃igole hǝn ke, nǝboŋ nǝb̃esib hǝn nauman sagw nǝvanuan gail dereh lekis ginau vi lohoim salito.’
Imagenan, ekis nǝvanuan ṽisusua lotokad nǝkabut simasta san. Eus esua ke, ‘Gukabut simasta sagw evis?’
Isor vari ke, ‘Natram naoil naoliv tovi 100.’ Ale ikel maii ke, ‘Lav nǝkabut sam̃ gǝmai, gebǝtah, gitos 50 tutut.’
Beti eus togon am ke, ‘Ale gaiug, gukad nǝkabut evis?’ Ale isor vari ke, ‘Nǝhad nawit tovi 1,000.’ Ale ikel maii ke, ‘Lav nǝkabut sam̃ gǝmai, gitos 800.’
Naut kǝmas nab̃iltivanuan nauman sanor, amasta san isor ivoi hǝni husur elǝlǝgau hǝn gai len namitisau san. Imaienan! Naur ta damǝŋai hǝn navile a pan lukad namitisau hǝn naṽide silat lotosum̃an galito be anatun nam̃ial lǝsǝkad namitisau hǝn naṽide silat navile a pan.”
AYesu isor am ke, “Nukel mai gamito, lav nǝvat hǝn navile a pan hǝn b̃esusupah mai nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃egǝm vi bubur samito. Ŋa nǝboŋ nǝvat b̃ihav, dereh aGot tikel nahǝhaṽuran mai gamito len naut a im vi sutuai.
“Avan ideh togolgol tonor len natit tovis, gai am igolgol inor len tosob̃ur, ale avan ideh togolgol sanor len natit tovis, gai am igolgol sanor len tosob̃ur.
Asike mǝtb̃etǝgau b̃inor hǝn nǝvat mai natit gail hǝn navile a pan, asike aGot eriŋ natit tosob̃ur san len navǝlamito.
Ale asike mǝtb̃inor hǝn natit sinǝvanuan tile, ase teriŋ natit len navǝlamito hǝn b̃evi samit gabag?
Naslev ideh edǝdas b̃evi slev simasta toru len nǝboŋ tosua. Dereh temǝtahun bun tesua ale telǝmas bun togon o dereh tidaŋ len tesua ale tinau ke togon tovi ut kǝmas. Mǝtodǝdas mǝtb̃eum siGot tovi amasta samito mai nǝvat tu tovi masta samito.”
Nǝboŋ naFarisi gail lotolǝmas bun nǝvat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan, lusor viles aYesu.
Ŋa ikel mai galit ke, “Gamit boh mǝtupatpat gamit mǝhat len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail, avil aGot elǝboi nǝlomito. Husur natideh nǝvanuan gail lotodaŋ lan len nǝnauan salito, lotolǝŋon masuṽ hǝni, evi pahsago len nǝnauan siGot, emǝtahun buni.”
AYesu isor am ke, “Nalo siMoses mai natosian sihai kelkel ur gail, lupat van vǝbar nǝboŋ siJon. Husur nǝboŋ siJon, namtukel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot, totaltal hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi hǝn lǝb̃eb̃is lan.
Idaŋ hǝn nǝmav mai navile a pan arb̃eb̃uer, be idaŋ sǝhori hǝn nǝmap̃irhǝt natosian hǝn nalo b̃imasig.
“Naulum̃an ideh totiṽos hǝn asoan ale tolah mai napǝhaṽut tile, atenan igol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan. Ale naulum̃an ideh tolah mai napǝhaṽut asoan totiṽos hǝni tia, aulum̃an enan igol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan.”
AYesu isor am ke, “Ikad naulum̃an sua tokad natite tosun nahurabat toboŋboŋ tokab. Len nǝboŋ p̃isi ikad nakontit tosob̃ur sǝhor nǝsa tonor hǝn nǝmauran san, ale akis ihan len nahǝhaṽuran hǝn nǝhanian tovoi ŋai.
Len nametlǝkau san loriŋ namǝsal sua tovi manus ipat, nahǝsan aLasarus.
Ike tihanukub hǝn nasughanian toteh dan natev sitenan tokad natite. Nalipah gail luŋol nǝmanuŋ san gail.
“Nǝboŋ tobar nǝboŋ san, amǝsal imat ale aŋel gail lupati, riŋi tǝban aApraham len nǝmav. Atenan tokad natite am imat ale lutavuni.
Len nǝhab nǝmatan, len na-lǝŋon-isa-an san tovan vǝsa masuṽ, ekǝta vi mǝhat ale eris aApraham mai aLasarus tǝban.
Ŋa ikai van hǝni ke, ‘Tata Apraham, gilolosa hǝn ginau ale sǝvat aLasarus hǝn b̃etur nagelhǝŋarhuvǝlan len nǝwai, b̃imosmos hǝn b̃eriŋi len nameagw b̃esusus. Nibegw epǝŋas vǝsa masuṽ len nǝhab egai.’
Avil aApraham isor vari ke, ‘Anatugw, nau gat natit sam̃ gail tovoi gotokade len nǝmauran sam̃, ale natit gail tosa aLasarus tokade. Be gagai elǝŋon ivoi am len nǝlon ale gaiug golǝŋon isa.
Natgalen imaienan, be ikad natsual am. AGot eriŋ nab̃iltib̃ur tosǝŋav tosareh hǝn b̃epǝpehun ginamito dan gamito, hǝn ke alat lotoke lǝb̃ivan dan naut egai van hǝn gamito, lodǝdasi. Ale alat lotoke lǝb̃egǝm hǝn ginamito dan naut enan lodǝdasi.’
Ŋa isor vari ke, ‘Beti neus gaiug, Tata, ke golǝboi gǝb̃esǝvati van hǝn nǝbathudud sagw,
husur nukad aṽagw erim, ale elǝboi b̃ikel nalǝlǝgauan mai galito hǝn ke, salegǝm len naut na-lǝŋon-isa-an egai.’
Be aApraham ike, ‘Lukad natosian siMoses mai ahai kelkel ur gail. Ivoi ke lesǝsǝloŋ husuri.’
Ike, ‘Aoa Tata Apraham, be avan ideh len naut nǝmatan b̃ivan hǝn galito, dereh lipair dan nǝsaan salito.’
Beti aApraham ikel maii ke, ‘Asike lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ husur aMoses mai ahai kelkel ur gail, asike logǝgel hǝn nǝnauan salit hǝn lǝb̃edǝlom avan ideh, naut kǝmas tole mǝhat dan nǝmatan.’”
AYesu ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Natit lototaltal hǝn nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃igol b̃isa, lǝb̃iteh dereh legǝmai, avil atenan togol lototeh, dereh nǝmauran san tisa vǝsa batbat.
Atenan, b̃igol avan ideh b̃igol nǝsaan, ivoi am hǝn atenan ke lubaŋis gat nab̃iltivat tom̃orm̃ori len naholoan ale bar hǝni len tas.
Mǝtelǝlǝgau hǝn gamito. Aṽam̃ b̃igol nǝsaan, kel maii ke togol nǝsaan, ale b̃ipair dan nǝsaan san, gerub̃ati dani.
B̃igol nǝsaan van hǝn gaiug vǝha-mǝlevru len nǝmariboŋ tosua, ale b̃etǝlmam van hǝn gaiug vǝha-mǝlevru toke, ‘Nupair dan nǝsaan sagw,’ gerub̃at nǝsaan galen dani.”
Ale ahai pispisul gail lukel mai Nasub̃ ke, “Gigol nadǝlomian sinamito tetibau am!”
Ŋa Nasub̃ ike, “Mǝttǝkad nadǝlomian tokǝkereh hun namisurhumastat, mǝttalǝboi mǝttakel mai nǝhai malperi egai ke, ‘Gimakuv ale gimabul gaiug len tas,’ ale dereh tǝmaienan.
“Mǝttǝkad naslev totivtiv nǝtan marireu o tokǝtkǝta tǝban nasipsip, nǝboŋ tovahim dan nǝmarireu, gamit ta be take, ‘Gǝm tutut, gebǝtah, gihan’?
Aoa, sǝmaienan. Take, ‘Geutaut hǝn nǝhanian m̃os ginau, sun nahurabat tonor ale lav nǝhanian mai ginau vir nǝhanan mai namunan b̃inoŋ. Ale nǝboŋ gotogole b̃inoŋ golǝboi gǝb̃ihan, gǝb̃emun.’
Amasta esipa vi tǝban naslev togol nǝsa tokele a? Aoa!
Imaienan hǝn gamit am. Nǝboŋ mǝttogol natit p̃isi aGot tokel mai gamit hǝn mǝtb̃igole, mitike, ‘Namtovi naslev kǝmas ŋai; namtugol nǝsa aGot tokele ŋai.’”
Len nǝyaran san, nǝboŋ tovi Jerusalem, aYesu iyar len navilah hǝn naut a Samaria mai a Kalili.
Nǝboŋ tobar navile sua, naulum̃an tosǝŋavur lotokad naleprosi lobubur maii. Loil a tut
ale lukai habat ke, “Yesu, Masta, gilolosa hǝn ginamito!”
Nǝboŋ toris galito, ikel mai galit ke, “Mitia ṽusan gamit mai ahai tutumav gail.” Ale len nǝyaran salit van, lumaur, luveveu.
Galit sua, nǝboŋ toris ke tomaur, etǝlmam van, eputsan nahǝsan aGot habat.
Ale iteh len tan, ekǝta vi pan bathurien aYesu ale esipa vi tǝban. Be gai evi auleSamaria.
Beti aYesu ike, “Be savi tosǝŋavur lotoveveu a? Lotomǝlapat, galit lutoh a be?
Sǝkad avan ideh hǝn totǝlmam hǝn toputsan nahǝsan aGot, be ametb̃os egai ŋai a?”
Beti ikel maii ke, “Gile mǝhat, givan; nadǝlomian sam̃ igol gumaur.”
Boŋ sua naFarisi gail lous aYesu ke, “Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot tegǝm ŋais?” AYesu isor var galit ke, “Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot sagǝm len nakǝtaan.
Avan ideh asike ike, ‘Geris, ipat gegai!’ o ‘Ipat ea!’ husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot satopat mai gamito.”
Beti ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke, “Len nǝboŋ b̃egǝmai, dereh mǝtelǝŋon ke mǝteris nǝmariboŋ ideh siNatun Nǝvanuan, avil asike mǝtorisi.
Nǝvanuan gail dereh likel mai gamit ke, ‘Geris, gai sage!’ o ‘Geris, gai saga!’ Samtedǝlom galito, samtehusur galito.
Husur aNatun Nǝvanuan, len nǝboŋ san, tesum̃an nasǝm̃oropun tom̃ias nǝmav kavkav.
Be a tahw hǝn natgalen b̃evisi, timaslǝŋon tisa hǝn natit b̃isob̃ur ale naur ta damǝŋai limasmǝtahuni.
Naṽide lǝb̃ikade len nǝboŋ gail siNatun Nǝvanuan dereh lehun naṽide silat lototoh len nǝboŋ siNoah gail.
Nǝvanuan gail luhan, lomun, lulah mai ludam̃ hǝn nǝlahan gail van vǝbar nǝboŋ aNoah tob̃is len nab̃iltib̃ot totibau masuṽ lotokisi hǝn nǝak. Beti nab̃iltius eus, nilev egǝm van, natit p̃isi imasig.
Imagenan len nǝboŋ gail siLot. Luhan, lomun, loṽur natite, lop̃ur hǝn natite. Lumabul tite mai loum hǝn naim gail.
Be len nǝboŋ aLot toriŋ naut a Sotom, nǝhab mai nǝsalfa aruteh dan nǝmav van, navile kavkav imasig.
Timaienan len nǝboŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃evisi len nǝdaŋan san.”
AYesu isor am ke, “Len nǝboŋ enan, avan ideh b̃itoh a mǝhat len navurun naim timasgam tutut dan naim san, satimariŋ hǝn b̃itariv natit san gail. Ale avan ideh len nǝmarireu tu satetǝlmam vahim hǝn b̃ipat natideh.
Mitinau gat asoan aLot.
Avan ideh b̃igol risi ke b̃etǝgau gat nǝmauran san, dereh timasig. Be avan ideh b̃idam̃ hǝni ke b̃imasig, dereh aGot tigol timaur vi sutuai.
Nukel mai gamit ke, len nalenmariug enan dereh nǝvanuan eru aripat len nǝmel b̃esua; aGot tilav kuv tesua ale togon tipat.
Napǝhaṽut eru arelis dasdas namisurhuwit len naut tesua ŋai; aGot tilav kuv tesua ale togon titoh.”
<range>
Beti ahai susur gail lousi ke, “Dereh tevisi a be, Nasub̃?” Isor var galit, isor kǝta ke, “Len naut ideh natit tomat topat lan, nab̃iltiman tohanhan natit tomat dereh lemǝlah gǝm b̃on ei. Avan tokad namǝtan elǝboi b̃erisi.”
Beti aYesu ib̃ol mai galit ke limassor tuṽ tabtab, nǝlolit sateur na-sor-tuṽ-an, letǝgau gati.
Ike, “Len nab̃iltivile sua ikad nǝmatsistret samǝtahw len aGot, tonau ke nǝvanuan gail lotovi ut kǝmas.
Ale len nab̃iltivile enan ikad abatunau pǝhaṽut togǝm akis hǝni hǝn b̃eŋiri ke, ‘Gigol tinor hǝn ginau hǝn asike aenemi sagw b̃emǝdas ginau am.’
Idareh, nǝmatsistret emǝtahuni van vǝbar toke, ‘Nǝsamǝtahw len aGot, ale nǝvanuan gail lovi ut kǝmas hǝn ginau.
Be husur ke nǝbatunau enan toŋir batriŋriŋ hǝn ginau, nupetǝmas hǝni! Dereh nigol tinor hǝni hǝn asike b̃eŋir akis hǝn ginau van nimat.’”
Beti Nasub̃ ike, “Mǝtesǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa nǝmatsistret tosa tokele!
AGot dereh tigol tinor hǝn galit totabtabuh len galito, lotokai van hǝni len nalennǝyal mai nalenmariug a? Dereh tevǝlo hǝn b̃evi tarhǝt salito a?
Ao, nukel mai gamit ke dereh tigol nanoran hǝn galit tutut. Avil nǝboŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃egǝmai, dereh tisab̃ nadǝlomian len navile a pan o teb̃uer?”
AYesu ikel nǝb̃ol p̃usan egai mai galevis lotonau ke lotonor be lunau ke nǝvanuan tile gail lǝsavi natideh. Isor kǝta ke,
“Naulum̃an eru arovi mǝhat vi lan naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot hǝn arb̃isor tuṽ. Gǝlar togon evi Farisi, togon evi vanuan nǝtaks.
NaFarisi eil, isor tuṽ van hǝn gai gabag ke, ‘Got, nosipa len gaiug husur ke ginau nǝsasum̃an alat galenan, nǝvanuan gail lotogǝgǝras hǝn lǝb̃ilav kuv nǝvat, alat lǝsanor, alat lotogol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan, o sum̃an ategai am tovi nǝvanuan nǝtaks.
Nǝsǝhan vǝha-ru len nawik p̃isi, noviol hǝn nahudhut tosua dan tosǝŋavur notokade.’
Avil togon tosor tuṽ, eil a tut, salǝŋon ke tekǝta vi mǝhat vi lan nǝmav be len na-lǝŋon-isa-an san isar batut, ike, ‘Got, gilolosa hǝn ginau, rub̃at nǝsaan dan ginau notovi vanuan nǝsaan!’
Nukel mai gamit ke, atenan ivahim, nǝsaan san imarub̃at. Len nǝhon aGot, atenan inor, savi naFarisi. Bathut avan ideh b̃ipatpat gai mǝhat, dereh tegǝm vi ut kǝmas be ideh togol gai gabag tovi ut kǝmas, aGot dereh teputsani.”
Nǝvanuan gail losǝhar anatulit gail am van hǝn aYesu, hǝn b̃eriŋ navǝlan len galito hǝn navoian b̃egǝm hǝn galito. Nǝboŋ ahai susur gail lotorisi, losivoh len galito.
Be aYesu ekis galit gǝmai, ike, “Mitidam̃ hǝn natuhtǝtai gail legǝm hǝn ginau, samtikai tas galito, husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot evi silat lotosum̃an galito.
Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke, avan ideh asike b̃ehǝhaṽur hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot hum natuhtǝtai, asike asike eb̃is lan.”
Naulum̃an sua toil a m̃o eus aYesu ke, “Hai p̃usan gotovoi, nimabe hǝn nǝb̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai?”
Ale aYesu isor vari ke, “Imabe gotokis ginau ke notovoi? Sǝkad avan ideh tovoi—aGot sǝb̃on ŋai.
Gaiug golǝboi nakelean todaŋ gail lotoke: ‘Sagigol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan, sagigol avan ideh timat, sagevǝnah, sagelibliboŋ—len nakotan am sageliboŋ, putsan atǝmam̃ mai anam̃ len nǝnauan sam̃.’”
Atenan ike, “Nǝboŋ notovi tuhtǝtai vǝbar damǝŋai nugol natgalenan p̃isi.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, ikel maii ke, “Natesual am gupar. P̃ur hǝn natit p̃isi gotokade ale pǝpehuni mai namǝsal gail. Ale dereh gikad nakonviolan aGot totǝgau gati m̃os gaiug len nǝmav. Beti gegǝm husur ginau.”
Avil nǝboŋ atenan tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan, nǝlon isa husur ke topul hǝn natit tosob̃ur.
Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝta van hǝni ike, “Idaŋ masuṽ hǝn alat lotopul hǝn natite lǝb̃evi lan natohan pipihabǝlan aGot.
Mǝtolǝboii ke idaŋ habat hǝn nǝkamel b̃eb̃is tur len nab̃urhunil sǝsod. Idaŋ sǝhori am hǝn nǝvanuan topul hǝn natite b̃eb̃is len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot.”
Be alat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan lousi ke, “B̃imaienan, ase teb̃is lan? Sǝkad avan ideh b̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai.”
Ale aYesu ike, “Natideh nǝvanuan todǝdas b̃igole, aGot elǝboi b̃igole.”
Ale aPita ike, “Geris, ginamit namtoriŋ sinamit p̃isi tia hǝn namttohusur gaiug.”
Ale aYesu ikel mai galit ke, “Nusor kitin mai gamit ke, avan ideh toriŋ naim o asoan o aṽan gail o tata mai nana o anatun gail m̃os natohan pipihabǝlan aGot,
dereh tikad natgalen p̃isi tisob̃ur tǝtas am len nǝboŋ eg ta damǝŋai len navile a pan. Ale len nǝboŋ b̃egǝmai len nǝmav dereh tikad nǝmauran vi sutuai.”
AYesu esǝhar tosǝŋavur pisan toru san lutoh sǝb̃olito, ale ikel mai galit ke, “Datovi mǝhat vi Jerusalem, ale natit p̃isi ahai kelkel ur lototosi husur aNatun Nǝvanuan, dereh lisarpoh.
Alatevis a Jerusalem leriŋi len navǝlan alat lǝsavi Ju. Dereh lisor vilesi, lisor mǝdasi, leṽulaii,
lebilas habat hǝni ale ligol timat. Be len nǝmariboŋ titor dereh tile mǝhat tǝtas.”
Ahai susur gail lǝsalǝboi natideh lan. Namilen esusuah dan galito gol ke lǝsalǝboi nǝsa aYesu tosor husuri.
Nǝboŋ aYesu tovan pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Jeriko, ametb̃esw sua ebǝtah gǝgarhǝp̃isal, eŋir nǝvanuan gail hǝn nǝvat.
Nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn naluṽoh toṽot eus ke nǝsa tovisi enan.
Galit lukel maii ke, “AYesu ta Nasaret satoyar van.”
Ale ikai ke, “Yesu, aNatun siTevit, nǝlom̃ titaŋis ginau, gol tivoi hǝn ginau!”
Ale alat lotoyar a m̃o losivoh lan hǝn b̃emǝdau, ris tokai habat am ke, “ANatun siTevit, nǝlom̃ titaŋis ginau, gol tivoi hǝn ginau!”
Ŋa aYesu eil, ale ikel ke lesǝhar atenan gǝm hǝni. Nǝboŋ togǝm pǝpadaŋ aYesu eusi ke,
“Guke nigol nǝsa hǝn gaiug?” Ale ike, “Nasub̃, nuke nekǝta.”
Ale aYesu isor maii ke, “Gekǝta! Nadǝlomian sam̃ igol gumaur.”
Vǝha-sua ŋai ikad nakǝtaan ale ehusur aYesu, isal suh nǝyalyalan siGot. Nǝboŋ nǝvanuan p̃isi lotorisi, galit am loputsan nahǝsan aGot.
Beti aYesu eb̃is len naut a Jeriko ale iyar tur lan.
Ikad aulum̃an sual ei nahǝsan aSakias; gai eil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan nǝtaks gail ale epul hǝn nǝvat mai natite.
Ike terisi ke aYesu ase, be husur top̃itol edǝdasi bathut ke naluṽoh lotoil kǝkol hǝn gai.
Ŋa igam vi m̃o ale epǝlau len nǝhai sikam̃or hǝn b̃eris aYesu, husur ke dereh tiyar van ei.
Ale nǝboŋ aYesu tobar naut enan, ekǝta vi mǝhat ale ikel maii ke, “Sakias, gimariŋ tutut. Damǝŋai nimastoh len naim sam̃.”
Ŋa imariŋ vi pan tutut ale ike “Ivoi,” mai aYesu, ikemkem habat.
Nǝvanuan p̃isi lotoris natenan loŋit nǝholito, lusor mǝtmǝtan hǝni ke, “Gai evi lohoim sinaulum̃an nǝsaan hǝn b̃itoh maii.”
Avil aSakias ile mǝhat, ikel mai aYesu ke, “Geris, Nasub̃, len nahudhut toru hǝn natit p̃isi sagw, gagai ŋai nulav nahudhut tesua mai namǝsal gail. Ale nǝb̃egǝras avan ideh hǝn nǝb̃evǝnah, dereh nisar gel vǝha-vat hǝni!”
Beti aYesu ikel maii ke, “Damǝŋai nǝ-lav-kuvi-an dan nǝsaan egǝm bar naim egai. Bathut ategai am evi sua len nǝpasusan siApraham.
Husur aNatun Nǝvanuan egǝm hǝn b̃idoŋ alat lotomasig, hǝn b̃ilav kuv galit dan nǝsaan.”
Nǝboŋ nǝvanuan gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan, aYesu ib̃ol p̃usan, husur egǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Jerusalem ale lunau ke natohan pipihabǝlan aGot b̃evisi ta bogai.
Imagenan aYesu ike, “Aulum̃an sua len nǝbathudud toil a m̃o len nǝkantri san eutaut hǝn b̃evi lan nǝkantri sual a tut hǝn ab̃iltikiŋ ei b̃itabtabuh lan hǝn b̃etǝlmam b̃egǝm vi kiŋ hǝn naut san.
Ale ekis naslev lotovi ulum̃an tosǝŋavur gǝmai, ilav namina tosǝŋavur mai galit ṽisusua, ike, ‘Mǝteum len nǝvat galenan vir natǝlmaman sagw.’
Be alat len nǝkantri san lomǝtahun buni ale losul galit galevis a tahw hǝni hǝn lǝb̃ikel mai nab̃iltikiŋ ke, ‘Namtsalǝŋon ategai hǝn b̃evi kiŋ sinamito.’
Naut kǝmas, egǝm vi kiŋ ale nǝboŋ totǝlmam episul hǝn alatenan gai tolav nǝvat mai galit ke legǝmai. Ike telǝboi nǝvat lotosǝhori len nǝvat tolav mai galito.
Esua toil a m̃o egǝm ike, ‘Nasub̃, namina sam̃ episan esǝŋavur am.’
Ale ikel maii ke, ‘Nauman sam̃ ikab, govi naslev tovoi! Husur ke gotodaŋ len natenan tokǝkereh, dereh gekǝtkǝta tǝban nab̃iltivile tesǝŋavur.’
Beti sual am egǝm ale ike, ‘Nasub̃ namina sam̃ episan erim am.’
Ŋa nakiŋ ikel maii ke, ‘Gaiug, dereh gekǝtkǝta tǝban nab̃iltivile terim.’
Beti naslev tile am egǝm ale ike, ‘Nasub̃, namina sam̃ bogai; noruŋ gole len natuhtaol hǝn nǝb̃esusuan buni.
Nomǝtahw len gaiug husur gutaltal, nǝkadum̃ ehǝhaiv, gulav kuv nǝsa gǝsariŋi, gotǝtariv nǝsa gǝsǝmabule.’
Nakiŋ isor vari ke, ‘Govi naslev tosa vǝsa! Len nasoruan sam̃ gotomadhakele, neṽusan gaiug hǝn nǝsaban sam̃. Gaiug gukele ke nudaŋ taltal, nǝkadugw ehǝhaiv, nulav kuv nǝsa nǝsariŋi mai notǝtariv nǝsa nǝsǝmabule.
B̃imaienan, husur nǝsa gǝsariŋ nǝvat sagw len nalulutar hǝn ke nǝboŋ nototǝlmam nǝtǝlav nǝvat enan mai naintǝres han?’
Ale ikel mai alat lotoil tǝban ke, ‘Lav kuv namina dani ale lavi mai atenan tokad namina tosǝŋavur.’
Ris lotoke, ‘Nasub̃, gai ikad namina tosǝŋavur tia!’
Isor var galit ke, ‘Nukel mai gamit ke, nǝvanuan p̃isi lotoum tovoi len nǝsa lotokade, dereh nilav natit am mai galito, avil avan ideh tom̃idol, avan ideh saum savoi len nǝsa tokade, dereh nilav kuv tokǝkereh gai tokade dani.
Be galen p̃isi lotovi enemi sagw gail, lotomǝtahun ginau notovi kiŋ salito, sǝhar galit gǝmai, ta bubun galit len nǝhogw!’”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ, iyar tab vi mǝhat vi Jerusalem.
Nǝboŋ tovan pǝpadaŋ hǝn natuhvile eru, a Petfas mai a Petani, len naut lotokisi hǝn Naṽehuh Oliv, esǝvat ahai susur eru,
ike, “Mǝrevi lan navile ea topat a m̃o. Nǝboŋ mǝrb̃eb̃is lan dereh mirisab̃ natuhtoŋki totahǝtah ei, avan ideh sǝsah lan sal. Sah rub̃ati ale sǝhari gǝmai.
Avan ideh b̃eus gamǝr ke, ‘Mǝrorub̃ati hǝn nǝsa?’ mirikele ŋai ke, ‘Nasub̃ timaskade.’”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tosǝvat gǝlar tonoŋ, aruvan ale arusab̃ natit p̃isi hun aYesu tokele.
Nǝboŋ artosah rub̃at natuhtoŋki enan, amahean gail lous gǝlar ke, “Mǝrorub̃ati hǝn nǝsa?”
Ale arusor var galit ke, “Nasub̃ timaskade.”
Beti arosǝhari van hǝn aYesu, arob̃ir hǝn nahurabat sǝlaru len natuhtoŋki ale arugol aYesu ebǝtah sǝŋaṽuti.
Len nǝvanan san, luṽolsan nahurabat salit gail metp̃isal.
Nǝboŋ togǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut nap̃isal tovi pan len Naṽehuh Oliv, naluṽoh hǝn ahai susur gail kavkav, len nahǝhaṽuran salito, lotub̃at kai, putsan nahǝsan aGot habat husur namerikel p̃isi lotorisi tia.
Lukai ke, “Got igol ivoi hǝn atenan, nakiŋ togǝm len nahǝsan Nasub̃ aGot! Natǝm̃at len nǝmav mai nalotuan tivan hǝn aGot toyalyal buni!”
Be naFarisi galevis len naluṽoh lusor mai aYesu ke, “Hai p̃usan, kai tas ahai susur sam̃ gail!”
Ris aYesu tosor var galit ke, “Nukel mai gamito, naut tab̃ut hǝn galito, nǝvat galegai lǝtǝkai.”
Nǝboŋ togǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Jerusalem, toris nab̃iltivile enan, itaŋisi
ale ike, “Ivoi am ke gamit mǝttalǝboi nǝsa tǝlav natǝm̃at mai gamito nǝboŋ damǝŋai, be aoa, esusuah dan gamito.
Nǝboŋ tosa dereh tegǝm hǝn gamito. Len nǝboŋ enan aenemi samit gail dereh lisah tuan nǝtan tisahsah vi mǝhat hǝn b̃ipat kǝkol hǝn nab̃iltivile samito, lidar vis gamito hǝn lǝb̃eil garu gol gamito.
Ale ligol nab̃iltivile timasirsir, gamit mai anatumit mitimaienan. Ligol ke asike ikad nǝvat ideh b̃epǝlah gat togon. Dereh timagenan husur mǝtsaris lǝboi nǝboŋ aGot togǝm hǝn gamito.”
Beti aYesu eb̃is len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot ale etub̃at hut alat lotop̃ur hǝn natit gail ei.
Ikel mai galit ke, “Natosian siGot ike, ‘Naim sagw tevi naim na-sor-tuṽ-an,’ avil mǝtugol ke egǝm ‘naut susuah sinǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah gail!’”
AYesu ep̃usan len nǝboŋ p̃isi len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot. Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail am, lohisi hǝn lǝb̃igol b̃imat.
Be lǝsǝsab̃ nap̃isal hǝn lǝb̃igole, bathut nǝvanuan p̃isi lolǝŋon buni ke lesǝsǝloŋ hǝni.
Len nǝboŋ sua, nǝboŋ aYesu toṽusan nǝvanuan gail len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot, mai tokel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi, ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail, logǝm hǝni.
Lukel maii ke, “Gugol natgalenan len nǝdaŋan sise? Ase ilav nǝdaŋan hǝn na-il-a-m̃o-an egai mai gaiug?”
Isor var galit ke, “Neus gamit hǝn nausian sua bai. Kel mai ginau,
nǝbaptaisan siJon, egǝm len aGot len nǝmav o len nǝvanuan?”
Lusor vahvah mai galit gabag ke, “Datb̃ike, ‘Egǝm len aGot,’ dereh teus, ‘Husur nǝsa mǝtsadǝlomi?’
Be datb̃ike, ‘Nǝvanuan,’ dereh nǝvanuan p̃isi letubun gidato, husur lodǝlomi ke aJon tovi ahai kelkel ur.”
Ŋa lusor vari ke, “Namtsalǝboi as tolav mai aJon.”
Ale aYesu ike, “Ginau am, asike nukel mai gamito ke na-il-a-m̃o-an sise topat len ginau hǝn nǝb̃igol natgalenan.”
Beti etub̃at kel nǝb̃ol p̃usan egai mai nǝvanuan gail, ke: “Avan sua imabul nǝhol nakrep ale idam̃ hǝni van hǝn alat lotokǝtkǝta tǝban nǝhol hǝn lǝb̃irentem, ale len nǝyaran san gai ivan ebǝlav.
Len nǝboŋ nakrep tomen, esǝvat naslev sua van hǝn alat lotorentem nǝhol hǝn lǝb̃epǝpehun nakrep galevis tovi esan. Avil luṽasi, losǝvati van, sǝlav natideh.
Ŋa amahean nǝhol esǝvat naslev sual am, be gai am lugol maien hǝni, luṽasi, lugol isa hǝni, ale losǝvati van, sǝlav natideh.
Ŋa esǝvat sual am tǝtas ale luṽab̃ub̃uri, lubar hǝni vivile.
Amahean ike, ‘Nigol nǝsa? Nigol timaiegai ke: dereh nesǝvat anatugw ulum̃an notolǝmas buni hǝn ke hum ma nahurulit b̃isa, ale lǝb̃igol b̃inor hǝni.’
Be nǝboŋ alatenan lotorisi, lusor utaut hǝni ke, ‘Atenan, nǝboŋ atǝman b̃imat, gai tikad nǝhol balai; datiparu buni hǝn datb̃ikad nasugsugur san p̃isi!’
Ŋa lubar hǝni dan nǝhol nakrep ale luparu buni.” AYesu isor am ke, “Amahean nǝhol dereh tigol nǝsa hǝn galito?
Dereh tegǝmai, tigol alat lotorentem nǝhol limat, ale tilav nǝhol nakrep enan mai ideh tile.” Nǝboŋ nǝvanuan gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan, luke, “Natenan satimaienan!”
Be aYesu ekǝta inor van hǝn galito ale ike, “B̃imaienan, namilen natosian egai topat len nǝb̃e sua ta sutuai nǝsa? “‘Nǝvat, nǝvanuan na-um-im-an gail lotomǝtahuni, gai egǝm vi vat sua ŋai b̃elǝboi b̃igol naim b̃ihav mai b̃inor.’
Nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝb̃iteh len nǝvat enan, dereh limab̃urb̃ur, mai avan ideh, nǝvat b̃iteh lan, dereh tipat dole.”
Beti ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo mai ab̃iltihai tutumav gail ludas p̃isal hǝn lǝb̃itah gat aYesu len namityal enan ŋai bathut lolǝboii ke len nǝb̃ol p̃usan enan isor tas galito. Avil lomǝtahw len nǝvanuan gail.
Beti lokǝta bunusi ale losǝvat nǝvanuan galevis lotogǝrasi ke lotokitin hǝn lǝb̃isab̃ nǝsaban len nasoran san hǝn lǝb̃eriŋi len navǝlan mai nǝdaŋan seuleRom tovi gavna.
Imagenan nǝvanuan nagǝgǝrasan gail lousi ke, “Hai p̃usan, namtolǝboii ke gaiug gotosor, gotop̃usan tonor. Naṽide sam̃ ep̃itoṽ van hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi, ideh satile, ale gop̃usan hǝn nap̃isal siGot len nakitinan.
Inor hǝn datb̃eṽur nǝtaks van hǝn aSisa m̃au a?”
Avil aYesu ekǝta lǝboi na-sor-gǝrasi-an salito ale ikel mai galit ke,
“Ṽusan ginau hǝn natenarius tesua. Nǝhon mai nahǝsan ase arupat lan?” Ale luke, “ASisa.”
Ikel mai galit ke, “Imagenan, lav mai aSisa nǝsa tovi seSisa, ale lav mai aGot nǝsa tovi siGot.”
Ale lodǝdas lǝb̃isab̃ nǝsaban ideh len nasoran san ei len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail. Lup̃aŋ len na-sor-vari-an san, ale lǝsasor am.
NaSattiusi galevis (lotoke na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan eb̃uer), logǝm hǝn aYesu. Lousi
ke, “Hai p̃usan, aMoses itos m̃os gidato ke, aulum̃an ideh, aṽan b̃imat be asoan b̃itoh mai anatun b̃eb̃uer, atenan timaslah mai nǝbatunau hǝn b̃ikad anatun gail m̃os aṽan.
Ale boŋ sua ikad alatmiṽan lotomǝlevru. Ahai a m̃o ilah mai apǝhaṽut sua, be imat, anatun eb̃uer.
Aṽan tohusur ahai a m̃o ilah mai nǝbatunau,
beti aṽan tohusuri am imaienan. Alatmiṽan lotomǝlevru lumat maienan p̃isi, anatulit eb̃uer.
Namǝkot alitenan tu imat.
Ale namtous gaiug ke, b̃imagenan, len na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan, napǝhaṽut enan dereh tevi asoan ase? Husur ke alatmiṽan lotomǝlevru p̃isi lulah maii.”
Ŋa aYesu ikel mai galit ke, “Nǝvanuan len navile a pan lulah mai ludam̃ hǝn nǝlahan.
Avil alat aGot totabtabuh len galit hǝn lǝb̃itoh vi sutuai, mai hǝn lǝb̃itoh len na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan, galit, asike lulah, avan ideh asike idam̃ hǝn lǝb̃ilah.
Ale lodǝdas lǝb̃imat am, husur losum̃an aŋel gail, lovi anatun aGot gail bathut togol lotole mǝhat dan nǝmatan.
Be len nǝb̃olan husur nǝhai topaŋ, aMoses boh isor vǝhoti ke, alat lotomat lule mǝhat dan nǝmatan husur ekis Nasub̃ hǝn ‘aGot siApraham mai aGot seIsak mai aGot siJakop.’
Gai savi aGot silat lotomat be evi aGot silat lotomaur, husur len nabunusian siGot, galit p̃isi lumaur.”
Ahai p̃usan galevis hǝn nalo lusor vari ke, “Gokitin ahai p̃usan!”
Beti avan ideh sail b̃uri hǝn b̃eusi hǝn nausian ideh am.
Be aYesu eus galit ke, “Nǝvanuan gail luke aKristo, aGot totabtabuh lan, evi anatun ulum̃an siTevit mabe?
Husur aTevit, gai ikele len nalob̃ulat hǝn Nǝb̃e gail ke: “‘Nasub̃ aGot ikel mai aMasta sagw ke, “Gebǝtah tarhǝt len nǝmatu sagw,
vir nǝb̃eriŋ aenemi sam̃ gail pipit nariem̃ gǝlaru hǝn lǝb̃evi ut kǝmas.”’
Imaienan aTevit b̃ekisi hǝn ‘aMasta,’ evi anatun mabe?”
Nǝboŋ nǝvanuan p̃isi lotosǝsǝloŋ, aYesu ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke,
“Mǝtelǝlǝgau hǝn ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo. Lolǝmas hǝn lǝb̃iyaryar mai nahurabat tobǝlbǝlav lotosuni. Lolǝmas hǝn nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃ike, ‘Ivoi,’ mai galit len nǝmaket, lolǝmas nǝhai bǝtbǝtah tovoi ŋai len naim nab̃onb̃onan, mai lolǝmas hǝn lǝb̃ebǝtah rivuh len nǝhanan gail.
Lulav kuv p̃is naim mai nasugsugur sibatunau pǝhaṽut gail, be len nagǝgǝrasan salito len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail, lusor tuṽ ebǝbǝlav. Alatenan dereh lipanis sǝhor alat lǝsǝmaienan.”
Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ, eris alat lotokad natite nǝboŋ lotoriŋ naviolan salito len nabokis hǝn nǝvat len naim siGot.
Beti eris nǝbatunau namǝsal sua toriŋ natuhkoin eru artovi kopa.
Ike, “Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke, nǝbatunau egai tovi mǝsal eviol sǝhor galit p̃isi.
Husur galit p̃isi loviol kinit naviolan gail dan tosob̃ur lotopul hǝni, be dan tokǝkereh topar, alitegai eviol hǝn natit p̃isi san hǝn b̃imaur lan.”
Nǝboŋ ahai susur san galevis lotosor husur naim siGot ke epǝhas buni hǝn nǝvat tobilbil mai naviolan gail van hǝn aGot, aYesu ike,
“Natgalen mǝttorisi, dereh len nǝboŋ gail lǝb̃egǝmai, asike ikad nǝvat ideh b̃epǝlah gat togon, dereh limasirsir p̃isi.”
Ŋa lousi ke, “Hai p̃usan, natgalenan levisi ŋais? Ale dereh tikad nǝsa b̃eṽusan nǝboŋ hǝn natgalenan lǝb̃isarpoh?”
Isor var galit ke, “Mǝtelǝlǝgau ke avan ideh sategǝras gamito hǝn mǝtb̃isab, husur dereh tisob̃ur legǝm len nahǝsagw like, ‘Ginau boh aKristo!’ mai, ‘Pǝpadaŋ nǝboŋ tegǝmai!’ Samtehusur galito!
Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke, ikad nab̃iltib̃alan gail mai nǝb̃alan tomǝtahun alat lotoil a m̃o, samtemǝtahw. Husur natgalenan limasvisi a m̃o, be nǝboŋ lǝb̃imadhavisi, savi nagilen sal.”
Beti ikel mai galit ke, “Naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut sua dereh tib̃al mai naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tile, ale nǝvanuan sekiŋ gail dereh lib̃al mai nǝvanuan sekiŋ tile gail.
Len naut tile gail dereh tikad nab̃iltidu gail, tipar hanian mai tikad navilesir gail. Dereh tikad natit b̃evisi, nǝvanuan p̃isi ninelit b̃epil lan, mai natetǝtan toyalyal len nǝmav.
Avil a tahw hǝn natgalenan, galit dereh litah gat gamito, ale lemǝdas bun gamito. Dereh lilav gamit vi lan naim nab̃onb̃onan mai naim nǝbaŋisian gail. Dereh lesǝhar gamit vi lan nakiŋ mai gavna gail sil nahǝsagw.
Len nǝboŋ enan dereh tipat len gamito hǝn mǝtb̃ikel kot na-kel-uri-an tovoi husur ginau.
Imaienan, mitinau sǝhoti ke samteutaut hǝn mǝtb̃isor gol gamit gabag.
Bathut dereh neviol mai gamito hǝn nasoran mai namitisau hǝn nǝnauan tokitin hǝn ke, aenemi samit gail ledǝdas lǝb̃isor var gamito o lǝb̃isor tas gamito.
Atǝmamit, anamit, aṽamit gail, amaheamit gail mai nabubur samit gail am dereh leriŋ gamit len navǝlan aenemi samit gail. Dereh leriŋ gamit galevis len nǝmatan.
Nǝvanuan p̃isi dereh lemǝtahun bun gamito sil nahǝsagw.
Be nasivurumito dan navurumito asike imasig.
Len nǝ-daŋ-b̃uri-an samito dereh mitikad nǝmauran vi sutuai.
“Be nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris naut a Jerusalem, navǝshǝsoltia gail lotodar visi, len nǝboŋ enan dereh mǝtelǝboii ke pǝpadaŋ timasirsir.
Beti alat lototoh len naut a Jutea, limasgam mǝtahw dani vi lan naut tobaŋ ṽehuh. Ale alat lototoh len navile enan limasriŋi, mai alat lotosuh marireu saleb̃is lan.
Husur nǝboŋ galenan levi nǝboŋ hǝn nǝpanismen, hǝn natit p̃isi natosian gail lotokele lǝb̃isarpoh.
Nulolosa hǝn alat lǝb̃etian mai alat lǝb̃evǝhasus len nǝboŋ enan! Husur len naut egai dereh tikad na-b̃iltilǝŋon-isa-an mai nǝlol paŋpaŋ topansem nǝvanuan galegai.
Nab̃u nǝb̃alan gail lita bun galito hǝni, ale aenemi salit gail dereh libaŋis gat galit beti sǝhar galit vi tut vi lan nǝkantri p̃isi. Ale nametb̃os gail dereh lipal sar nab̃iltivile Jerusalem, il a m̃o hǝni van vǝbar nǝboŋ salit b̃esib.
“Natit tiltile gail levisi hǝn namityal, nahǝbati mai nam̃eso gail. Len navile a pan, nǝvanuan gail len nǝkantri gail dereh lemǝtahw, ledǝdarŋab̃u, nau tuhatuh hǝn nǝwalan hǝn nǝtas mai nahǝbasodum̃.
Nǝvanuan gail dereh nǝlolit tiṽonṽon len namǝtahwan salit mai nǝ-vatvat-viri-an hǝn nǝsa b̃evisi len navile a pan. Husur nǝdaŋan gail len nǝmav dereh lekurkur.
Beti len nǝboŋ enan dereh leris aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃egǝm len nǝmavukasw, len nǝdaŋan mai nǝyalyalan totibau.
Nǝboŋ natgalenan lǝb̃etub̃at visi, mǝteil gǝgat tinor husur asike idareh nǝ-lav-kuvi-an samito dan nǝmauran hǝn navile a pan, dereh tihav.”
Beti ikel nǝb̃ol p̃usan mai galit ke: “Mǝteris nǝhai nafik mai nǝhai p̃isi am.
Nǝboŋ lotodum̃oh, mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃eris lǝboii ke nǝboŋ naut pudpud b̃egǝm pǝpadaŋ.
Imagenan, nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris natgalenan b̃evisvisi, mǝtelǝboii ke natohan pipihabǝlan aGot satogǝm pǝpadaŋ.
Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke, naur egai asike lumat vǝbar natgalen p̃isi lǝb̃isarpoh.
Nǝmav mai navile a pan dereh arimasig balai, avil nasoruan sagw asike imasig boŋ ideh.
“Mǝtelǝlǝgau hǝn ke samtetǝrog, samtigol naṽide tosa len natǝrogan mai samtinau masuṽ hǝn nǝmauran len navile a pan o nǝboŋ enan dereh tegǝm ale mǝtosǝhoṽut lan hum mǝttobat len nǝhai tata.
Husur dereh tegǝmai len galit p̃isi lotosuh len navile a pan kavkav.
Mǝtehulahul tabtab, ale sor tuṽ ke mǝtelǝboi mǝtb̃igam yav dan natgalen p̃isi pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃evisi, ale mǝtb̃eil len nǝhon aNatun Nǝvanuan.”
Ŋa len nalennǝyal p̃isi aYesu ep̃usan len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot, be len mariug ivan vatoh len Naṽehuh Oliv.
Ale nǝvanuan p̃isi lulele dudulan som̃ilan hǝn lǝb̃evi lan naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot hǝn lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝni.
Len nǝboŋ enan Nǝhanan hǝn Nabǝta Sǝkad Nayis lan, lotokisi hǝn nǝPasova, egǝm pǝpadaŋ.
Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo luke lisab̃ nap̃isal ideh hǝn lǝb̃igol aYesu b̃imat, be savi len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail husur lomǝtahw len galito.
Beti aSetan eb̃is len aJutas lotokisi hǝn aIskariot, gai tovi sua len ahai susur lotovi 12.
Ale aJutas ivan hǝn ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o silat lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn naim siGot hǝn b̃isor mai galit husur nap̃isal ideh hǝn b̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlalito.
Lohǝhaṽur masuṽ ale ludam̃ hǝn lǝb̃ilav nǝvat nasilva maii.
Ale aJutas idam̃, beti idas p̃isal hǝn b̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlalito nǝboŋ naluṽoh lǝsǝtah maii.
Beti nǝmariboŋ hǝn Nǝhanan hǝn nabǝta sǝkad nayis lan egǝmai. Len nǝboŋ enan lotutumav hǝn natuhsipsip hǝn nǝPasova.
AYesu esǝvat aPita mai aJon, ike, “Mirivan vautaut hǝn nǝhanian hǝn nǝPasova hǝn datb̃ihani.”
Ale arousi ke, “Guke namreutaut hǝni a be?”
Isor var gǝlar ke, “Nǝboŋ mǝrb̃eb̃is len nab̃iltivile, naulum̃an sua topat nab̃iliwai topul dereh tebubur mai gamǝru. Mǝrehusuri vi lohoim tob̃is lan
ale kel mai amahean naim ke, ‘Ahai p̃usan eusi ke: “Narum̃ simetb̃os gai be? Nuke nihan Nǝhanian hǝn nǝPasova mai ahai susur sagw gail lan.”’
Atenan teṽusan gamǝru hǝn nab̃iltirum̃ tokad natit p̃isi dattolǝŋoni. Mǝreutaut ei.”
Ŋa aruvan, arusab̃ natit p̃isi hun tokel mai gǝlaru, ale aroutaut hǝn nǝPasova.
Nǝboŋ namityal hǝn nǝhanan togǝmai, aYesu ipat hǝn nǝtarhǝgarin hǝn b̃ihan. Ale ahai pispisul san gail lub̃on maii.
Ale ikel mai galit ke, “Nolǝŋon buni tia ke nihan nǝPasova egai mai gamito a tahw hǝn nǝb̃elǝŋon b̃isa.
Husur nukel mai gamit ke, asike nuhani am vir nǝsarpohan han len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot.”
Nǝboŋ tolav nab̃iliwai, tosipa hǝni, ike, “Mitilav nab̃iliwai egai ale pǝpehuni mai gamit gabag.
Husur nukel mai gamit ke, gagai van asike nomun tas nǝwain vir natohan pipihabǝlan aGot b̃egǝmai.”
Nǝboŋ tolav nabǝta, tosipa hǝni, eb̃uri, beti ilavi mai galito, ike, “Egai nibegw notoviol hǝni m̃os gamito. Gol timaiegai hǝn mǝtb̃inau gat tin hǝn ginau.”
Len naṽide top̃itoṽ, nǝboŋ lotohan tonoŋ ilav nab̃iliwai ike, “Egai nab̃iliwai hǝn na-kel-gati-an veveu aGot tota gati len nǝda hagw, nǝda hagw b̃isel m̃os gamito len nǝmatan sagw.
Be atenan b̃eriŋ ginau len navǝlan aenemi sagw gail, navǝlan atenan ipat len natev mai navǝlagw.
Husur aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tivan sum̃an aGot toriŋ gati tia, avil atenan b̃eriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan aenemi san gail, dereh nǝmauran san tisa vǝsa batbat.”
Beti lotub̃at usus gabag hǝn galito ke, ase len galit tigol natenan.
Lotub̃at ṽitṽituh len galit gabag husur galit ta be etibau sǝhor galito.
Ŋa aYesu ikel mai galit ke, “Len navile a pan, nakiŋ hǝn nametb̃os gail, lupatpat galit mǝhat len nǝdaŋan salito; ale nametb̃os gail lokis alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn galito hǝn ‘Na-vi-tarhǝte-an salito.’
Be gamit samtimaienan. Ideh len gamito totibau masuṽ, gai timasgǝm sum̃an ahai a tahw. Ale ideh len gamito toil a m̃o, timasgǝm sum̃an nǝvanuan toum kǝmas sinǝvanuan tile.
Husur ase etibau am, atenan tohan len natev, o atenan toum hǝn b̃ilav nǝhanian maii? Len nabunusian silat navile a pan evi atenan tohan len natev. Avil len gamito, evi ginau boh notoum kǝmas samito.
Gamit boh mǝtutah mai ginau akis, naut kǝmas nap̃isal sagw todaŋ nǝboŋ nǝvanuan gail lotomǝtahun ginau.
Sum̃an aTǝmagw tolav na-il-a-m̃o-an len natohan pipihabǝlan mai ginau, imaienan, gagai nulavi mai gamito.
Dereh mitihan, mǝtemun len natev sagw len natohan pipihabǝlagw ale mǝtebǝtah len nab̃iltihai bǝtbǝtah gail hǝn mǝtb̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan len nahǝmar lotovi 12 seIsrael.
“Simon, Simon, geris, aSetan eus aGot hǝn b̃isab̃ gamito ke mǝtumabe, hum naulum̃an hǝn nǝhol todardar hǝn nǝhad m̃os namisurhuwit b̃iteh tur lan, be nǝsogsog p̃isi han b̃esuh.
Avil nusor tuṽ m̃os gaiug tia hǝn ke, nadǝlomian sam̃ asike iteh. Ale nǝboŋ gǝb̃ipair tǝlmam, gigol galit lotovi ahai susur gail am ke lidaŋ am.”
Be aPita ikel maii ke, “Nasub̃, noutaut hǝn nǝb̃itah mai gaiug van hǝn naim bǝbaŋis mai nǝmatan!”
Ris aYesu tosor vari ke, “Nukel mai gaiug, Pita, natoulum̃an asike ekǝkǝraiko damǝŋai vǝbar gǝb̃ikel vǝha-tor hǝni ke gǝsalǝboi ginau.”
Beti aYesu ikel mai galit ke, “Nǝboŋ notosǝvat gamito, nǝpaus, nǝhad mai naributbut tob̃uer, mǝtom̃idol hǝn natideh a?” Ale lusor vari ke, “Ao.”
Ikel mai galit ke, “Be gagai, atenan b̃ikad nǝpaus timaspati mai tipat nǝhad sǝsǝŋon am. Ale asike b̃ikad nab̃u nǝb̃alan, timasp̃ur hǝn nahurabat naut susus san hǝn b̃eṽur b̃esua.
Husur nukel mai gamit ke, natosian egai siGot timassarpoh len ginau ke, ‘Len nǝnauan salit loriŋi hum alat lotosa.’ Ale nǝsa lototosi husur ginau egǝm bar nǝsarpohan han ta bogai.”
Ŋa lukel maii ke, “Geris, Nasub̃, nab̃u nǝb̃alan toru!” Be gai ike, “Tinoŋ!”
Beti aYesu evivile, ale iyar vi lan Naṽehuh Oliv hum naṽide san. Ahai susur san gail lohusuri.
Nǝboŋ tobar naut enan, ikel mai galit ke, “Mitisor tuṽ hǝn asike mǝtb̃iteh len nǝsaan totaltal ke mǝtehusuri.”
Ivan dan galito vǝbar naut avan ideh b̃elǝboi b̃etuṽ hǝn nǝvat lan, etǝŋedur, ale isor tuṽ.
Ike, “Ita, b̃evi nalǝŋonian sam̃, lav kuv nab̃iliwai hǝn na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an egai dan ginau. Avil nǝsa gotolǝŋoni tevisi, savi nǝsa notolǝŋoni.”
Ale aŋel sua hǝn nǝmav evisi hǝni ale igole idaŋ.
Len nǝnauan san mai nǝlon totuhatuh masuṽ, isor tuṽ habat van van napilal san etub̃ hun nǝda toturtur len tan.
Nǝboŋ tole mǝhat dan na-sor-tuṽ-an, etǝlmam van hǝn ahai susur gail ale isab̃i ke lotopat, nibelit emǝhav husur nalolosaan.
Ŋa ikel mai galit ke, “Imabe mǝtupat? Mitile mǝhat, sor tuṽ hǝn asike mǝtb̃iteh len nǝsaan totaltal ke mǝtehusuri!”
Nǝboŋ tosorsor sal, naluṽoh sua egǝmai. Ale aJutas tosua len tosǝŋavur pisan toru, gai eil a m̃o. Egǝm ben aYesu hǝn b̃esum̃ nǝtarhon,
avil aYesu eusi ke, “Jutas, gumabe? Gaiug gosum̃ nǝtarhogw hǝn gǝb̃eriŋ ginau, aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan aenemi sagw gail a?”
Nǝboŋ alat lotohusur aYesu lotoris nǝsa b̃evisi, luke, “Nasub̃, namtib̃al mai galito hǝn nab̃u nǝb̃alan a?”
Beti galit sua itai naslev seb̃iltihai tutumav, ta kotov nǝdariŋan nǝmatu.
Avil aYesu ike, “Mitinoŋ, samtimagenan!” Ale ibar nǝdariŋan, gole imaur.
Beti aYesu ikel mai ab̃iltihai tutumav gail, alat lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn naim siGot mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn naJu gail ke, “Imabe mǝtogǝm, lav nab̃u nǝb̃alan mai nǝbatw gail gǝmai hǝn mǝtb̃itah gat ginau hum notovi vanuan nǝb̃alan toke tib̃al mai alat lotoil a m̃o?
Len nǝmariboŋ p̃isi nutoh mai gamit len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot be mǝtsǝbar ginau. Avil gagai evi namityal samito mai namityal hǝn nǝdaŋan hǝn nǝmargobut.”
Beti lutah gat aYesu, losǝhari van vi lohoim seb̃iltihai tutumav. APita ehusur galit van, be sǝyar pǝpadaŋ.
Nǝboŋ lototuŋ nǝhab rivuh len naholǝvat todar vis naim ale lototitileh b̃onb̃on, aPita ebǝtah, tah mai galito.
Beti naslev tǝbarehreh erisi nǝboŋ tobǝtah ale nǝsalsalumean hǝn nǝhab tom̃iasi. Ale ekǝta mǝtaltal van hǝni, ike, “Ategai am itah mai atenan!”
Avil aPita isor tasi ke, “Litegai, ginau notǝtan hǝn gai!”
Beti sǝdareh ŋai togon torisi, ike, “Gaiug am, govi galit sua!” Avil aPita ike, “Aoa Tegai, savi ginau!”
Ale husur nǝhaua tosua tovan, sual am isor sab̃i, ike, “Ategai boh itah maii, bathut gai am evi auleKalili.”
Avil aPita ike, “Tegai, notǝtan hǝn nǝsa gotokele.” Vǝha-sua ŋai, nǝboŋ tosor sal, natoulum̃an ekǝkǝraiko.
Nasub̃ ipair, ekǝta inor van hǝn aPita, ale aPita inau tǝlmam hǝn nasoruan siNasub̃ nǝboŋ tokel maii ke, “A tahw hǝn natoulum̃an b̃ekǝkǝraiko damǝŋai, gaiug dereh gikel vǝha-tor hǝni ke gǝsalǝboi ginau.”
Ale aPita evivile, itaŋ lolosa masuṽ.
Alat lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn aYesu lotub̃at sor vilesi van, luṽasi, ṽasi, ṽasi van,
lubaŋis gat namǝtan ale loususi ke, “Sss Hai kelkel ur, ase toṽas gaiug?”
Ale lukel natit isob̃ur am, losǝvari vǝsa tibatbat.
Nǝboŋ naut tolan nǝSanhitrin lub̃onb̃on. Alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail, ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo lobǝtah len nab̃onb̃onan enan. Ale losǝhar aYesu van hǝn galito.
Luke, “Gǝb̃evi aKristo, aGot totabtabuh lan, kel mai ginamito.” Avil ikel mai galit ke, “Nǝb̃ekǝmaienan mai gamito, asike mǝtodǝlom ginau,
ale nǝb̃eus gamito, asike mǝtusor var ginau.
Be gagai van aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tebǝtah len nǝmatu siGot hǝn b̃ikad nǝdaŋan.”
Galit p̃isi lousi ke, “Gaiug m̃au, aNatun aGot a?” Ale isor var galit ke, “Gamit mǝtuke ginau boh.”
Beti luke, “Datsalǝŋon avan ideh am hǝn b̃ikel ur nǝsaan ategai tokele. Husur gidat sǝb̃odato datosǝsǝloŋ hǝni len nabuŋon gabag!”
Beti, naluṽoh kavkav hǝn nǝSanhitrin lule mǝhat, sǝhari van hǝn aPilate.
Lotub̃at sor tas aYesu, il hirhir lan ke, “Namtusab̃ ategai ke tosǝhar suluṽ nǝvanuan sinamit gail len nap̃isal tosa. Ikai tas na-ṽur-nǝtaks-an van hǝn aSisa, mai gai ike tovi aKristo, aGot totabtabuh lan tovi a kiŋ sua.”
Ŋa aPilate eus aYesu ke, “Gaiug govi kiŋ seJu gail a?” Ale isor vari ke, “Gaiug boh gukele.”
Beti aPilate ikel mai ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai naluṽoh gail ke, “Nusab̃i ke ategai sǝkad nǝsaban.”
Avil lutaltal ke, “Gai ipair hǝn nǝnauan sinǝvanuan gail hǝn nap̃usanan san len naut p̃isi a Jutea, gol loluṽoh b̃al taṽtaṽor. Etub̃at a Kalili vǝbar naut egai!”
Nǝboŋ aPilate tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni, eusi ke gai b̃evi auleKalili.
Ale nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ lǝboii ke aYesu totoh pipihabǝlan aHerot Antipas, esǝvati van hǝn aHerot, gai am totoh len naut a Jerusalem len nǝboŋ enan.
Nǝboŋ aHerot toris aYesu ehǝhaṽur masuṽ, husur sutuai elǝŋoni tia ke terisi, bathut esǝsǝloŋ hǝn naholan tohusuri, ale ike teris aYesu b̃igol namerikel ideh.
Ŋa aHerot eusus nausian tosob̃ur be aYesu sasor vari.
Ale ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo, lusor idaŋ, lusor lol paŋpaŋ ke aYesu tosa.
Beti aHerot mai nasoltia san gail loŋit nǝholit van hǝni hum gai tovi ut kǝmas, lusor vilesi. Lukol nahurabat bilbil lan ale losǝvati tǝlmam van hǝn aPilate.
Len nǝboŋ enan ŋai aHerot mai aPilate gǝlar gabag arogǝm vi bubur beti. Husur sutuai arovi enemi sǝlar gabag.
Nǝboŋ aPilate tokis ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o mai nǝvanuan gail tonoŋ,
ikel mai galit ke, “Mǝtosǝhar ategai gǝm hǝn ginau hum ke avan sua tosǝhar suluṽ nǝvanuan gail len nap̃isal tosa. Nǝboŋ notoususi len nǝhomito, nǝsǝsab̃ nǝsaan ideh len ategai mǝttosor tasi, kel ke tosa.
AHerot am sǝsab̃ nǝsaan ideh lan, husur aHerot esǝvat tǝlmam hǝni gǝm hǝn gidato. Ale imasil ke, ategai sagol natideh tonor hǝn b̃imat sile.
Imaienan, dereh nigol lebilas masuṽ hǝni ale telǝboi b̃ivan.”
<range>
Avil galit lub̃on, kai habat ke, “Sǝhar ategai vi tut, aParappas tevivile m̃os ginamito!”
(Alat a Rom lutah gat a Parappas tia, bar hǝni len naim bǝbaŋis sil togol nǝvanuan lotoluṽoh, b̃al taṽtaṽor len nab̃iltivile hǝn lǝb̃emǝdas nǝgavmen, mai igol avan sua imat.)
APilate isor van hǝn galit tǝtas am bathut ike teriŋ aYesu tivan.
Avil lukai habat van ke, “Timat! Timat len nǝhai balbal!”
Len na-vǝha-tor-an aPilate isor van hǝn galit ke, “Imabe? Igol nǝsa tosa? Nǝsǝsab̃ kas nǝsaan ideh lan tonor hǝn b̃imat sile. Imaienan dereh nigol ke lebilas masuṽ hǝni ale neriŋi tivan.”
Avil lukai susumar husur aYesu ke timat len nǝhai balbal, ale ludaŋ b̃ur aPilate.
Ŋa aPilate eriŋi ke tigol nǝsa lotolǝŋoni.
Ale atenan lotousi, aParappas totoh len naim bǝbaŋis sil togol nǝb̃alan hǝn b̃emǝdas nǝgavmen mai togol nǝmatan, eriŋi evivile. Avil eriŋ aYesu len navǝlalito hǝn lǝb̃igol nǝsa lotolǝŋoni hǝni.
Nǝboŋ nasoltia gail lotosǝhari van, lutah gat aSimon, auleSairin sua toyar marireu gǝm vi lan naut a Jerusalem ale loriŋ nǝhai balbal lan hǝn b̃ipati husur aYesu.
Ale nǝvanuan isob̃ur masuṽ lohusuri. Galevis lotovi alatpǝhaṽut lois, luṽosṽos nibelito, lutaŋisi.
Be aYesu ipair van hǝn galit ke, “Tob̃taJerusalem gail, samtitaŋis ginau be mititaŋis gamit gabag mai anatumit gail.
Husur len nǝboŋ b̃egǝmai nǝvanuan gail dereh like, ‘AGot igol navoian van hǝn alatpǝhaṽut lotobutoh, nǝhad hǝn natǝtai gail lǝsǝpasus, mai nasus gail lǝsavǝhasus!’
Beti ‘dereh lisor mai nab̃iltiṽehuh gail ke, “Rus vi pan bar ginamito!” Lisor mai natuhṽehuh gail ke, “Kabut gol ginamito!”’
Husur ke nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃igol natgalenan nǝboŋ nǝhai tomaur sal, nǝsa b̃evisi nǝboŋ nǝhai b̃iŋod?”
Ikad naulum̃an eru, artob̃ur kotov nalo silat aRom, ale losǝhar gǝlaru van hǝn lǝb̃igol arb̃imat mai aYesu.
Ŋa nǝboŋ lotobar naut lotokisi hǝn Nabǝlashukadhutǝmat, loriŋi itahǝtah len nǝhai balbal ei, gai mai naulum̃an eru artosa, esua len nǝmatu san, togon len nǝmair.
AYesu ike, “Ita, gerub̃at nǝsaan egai dan galito, husur lǝsalǝboi nǝsa lotogole.” Beti lubar hǝn nǝvat hǝn lǝb̃isab̃i ke as tikad nahurabat san gail.
Nǝvanuan gail loil, lokǝta bunusi. Ale nǝvanuan totibau salit gail lob̃it nabuŋolit van hǝn aYesu, lusor vilesi. Luke, “Gai ilav kuv nǝvanuan tile gail; b̃evi aKristo siGot, aGot totabtabuh lan, tilav kuv gai gabag!”
